name: Estate with swimming pond, fire pits, 2ha walking area.
description: Our estate has a natural mini campsite. With many spacious and private places to relax. There is a toilet block with ladies and gents toilets with two adjacent showers. An outdoor sink with five hot/cold water taps for washing dishes, etc Lots of natural beauty around you and a wonderful rest. Possibility to take places with electricity (incl.) and there is WiFi throughout the site. Also a swimming pond and large cozy fire pit. There is a wood oven on the camping site that can be used free of charge for ready-made pizzas or for homemade pizzas and other dishes. Great to do, fun and tasty! You are most welcome in Toldijk in the Achterhoek. Our estate is located in the municipality of Bronckhorst in the outskirts of the quiet town of Toldijk, between the particularly atmospheric Hanseatic cities of Zutphen and Doesburg. Toldijk is a real rural municipality in the province, which is very richly endowed with natural beauty. The peaceful landscape around Toldijk is the so-called bocage landscape. It offers a magnificent variety of forests, meadows, fields and wooded banks, between which beautiful characteristic farms are hidden. The farm is a wonderful base for cycling or walking routes or just relaxing in the silence of the Gelderland landscape. In the area you will find many farm shops with regional products or stalls along the road with fruit and vegetables that offer the season. You can easily rent bicycles from us via bike total Zutphen with delivery and pick-up service or via NS station Zutphen. We have two pole sockets for power! So not those blue plugs. Think of an adapter plug! Bring cozy outdoor lighting. We often get nice thanks for the smooth atmosphere here. Be welcome!

name: Estate with swimming pond, fire pits, 2ha walking area.
description: Our estate has a natural mini campsite. With many spacious and private places to relax. There is a toilet block with ladies and gents toilets with two adjacent showers. An outdoor sink with five hot/cold water taps for washing dishes, etc Lots of natural beauty around you and a wonderful rest. Possibility to take places with electricity (incl.) and there is WiFi throughout the site. Also a swimming pond and large cozy fire pit. There is a wood oven on the camping site that can be used free of charge for ready-made pizzas or for homemade pizzas and other dishes. Great to do, fun and tasty! You are most welcome in Toldijk in the Achterhoek. Our estate is located in the municipality of Bronckhorst in the outskirts of the quiet town of Toldijk, between the particularly atmospheric Hanseatic cities of Zutphen and Doesburg. Think of an adapter plug! Bring cozy outdoor lighting. We often get nice thanks for the smooth atmosphere here. Be welcome!

name: A hidden place in the Westhoek
description: PEACE & NATURE Wild camping on private property Do you want to take a break and are you looking for a unique spot in the Westhoek to relax? We make our estate temporarily available for those who wish to camp in silence in a beautiful piece of nature. With our micro-campsite we offer a very limited number of camping spots with lots of space and tranquility. It is a meadow of 3 ha with orchard and grove with many shady spots. You can choose your own spot. Outdoor overnight stay without luxury near the sea on the West Coast, the polders, the French border and Heuvelland. Only accessible after reservation. Or are you looking for a place to camp privately in a group, with family or friends? That is also possible. A SEPARATE space, not visible to the others, is then kept free for the group. To ensure peace of mind, we do NOT mix groups with private spots. Request your reservation below. An unexpected green piece of nature with a panoramic view over the fields and the village church in the distance. The estate contains an orchard, a small grove and is completely surrounded by a hawthorn hedge, the favorite place of many birds. You can enjoy their singing talents and the sounds of nature. You often see hares, pheasants and partridges. And a beautiful sunset, moon and starry sky - if it's not too cloudy. Pure nature! It refers to a former 16th century castle farm of which only a partly walled farm is still visible. It is located in the village of Beveren-aan-den-Ijzer, which is part of the Westhoek, also known as 'Bachten de Kupe' (with 'Kupe' refers to the valley where the river Ijzer runs). A large part of this region is characterized by its war history. It is close to Ypres, Heuvelland, the art village of Watou, Veurne, Diksmuide, the Belgian west coast and 100m from the border with Northern France with Bergues and Cassel as beautiful places to visit. With a wooded and mountainous area to one side & the flat land towards the coast (the Moeren - reclaimed area in the 17th Century). In addition to enjoying nature, you can also do many fun activities: >Lovely cycling along cycling junctions >Beautiful walking routes - e.g. the Dode Yzer walk can be started from here, about 18 km / two mountains walking route Heuvelland 7 km >Laze in a hammock in our grove (bring your own) >Wooded area where you can spot deer >Fishing on the Yser in Roesbrugge (1km) >Canoeing on the Yser in Roesbrugge or from Diksmuide (15km) >Boat trip on the Yser in Lo-Reninge, info De Hooipiete (10km) >Dierenpark De Zonnegloed, Oost-Vleteren (10km) >Horse riding in Koksijde, Oostduinkerke or Rodeberg (20km) >Walking in nature reserve De Westhoek (De Panne) >Golf & sailing in Oostduinkerke & Nieuwpoort (20 km) >Tourism on the West Coast (20km) >Theme parks Plopsaland and Bellewaerde (20km) >Heuvelland with its beautiful landscape and wine estates Monteberg & Entre deux Monts : guided tour and wine tasting (20km) >Many war sights in Ypres and surroundings (10km) > Last Post Menin Gate Ypres, commemoration of fallen soldiers from World War I, daily at 8 pm >Art village Watou & gallery Emergent in Veurne (10km) >The best Trappist (abbey beer) in the world, to be tasted in the café/restaurant 'In de Vrede' of the Saint-Sixtus Abbey of West-Vleteren (5 km) and buy a few crates to take home! Always nice to surprise friends with it. >Or drop by Bar Bernard's new brewery café. On the roof terrace you will be spoiled with a breathtaking view of the wide region around Watou (10 km). Our village includes a cafe, a shop with farm products, a bread machine and within a radius of 10 km you will find a proxy delhaize (Proven), fresh bakery (Lo), ATM (Proven), doctor (Vleteren), pharmacy (Roesbrugge) and cozy restaurants. A real camper showers outside, right? We installed a simple solar outdoor shower. This facility ensures that our guests touch the same surfaces as little as possible. A highly recommended facility by Campspace in corona times. The site is remote. The accommodation is very limited. There are some mobile toilets with disinfectant spray that guarantee comfort. If you have your own Porta Potti, you can always bring it with you. If you come with your tent or (cara)van, normal use of water and electricity for small conveniences (mobile phone, water heater, coffee maker...) is included. If other devices are connected (fridge, coolbox, etc.), an additional cost of 5 euros/n will be charged, to be paid locally on arrival. Please mention this in advance in your booking request and do not forget to bring an extension cable (50-100m). This gives you more options to choose your favorite place. We do not offer a charging point for a car. If you come with your campingcar (max 6m): Electricity branch is optional 10 euros/day, to be paid on site upon arrival. Please also mention this in your booking request. We do not offer a sani station. For discharging and tapping off fresh water, etc., we would like to refer you to a fully equipped sani point / car wash nearby in Hondschoote (France 2 km).

name: Quiet camping on a river in beautiful surroundings
description: Escape the crowds and enjoy the tranquility of our secluded camping meadow in the middle of nature. With us you can camp back to basics with your tent, caravan or van and be completely off-grid. With a limited number of guests you can enjoy the silence and the beautiful starry sky. Choose your own spot on our site, in the meadow or along the stream. Enjoy almost wild camping, but with the luxury of an outdoor toilet and fire bowl with firewood. For nature lovers who love comfort and luxury, we also offer a fully equipped Glamping tent. Discover the area with the many cycling and walking routes nearby, and visit the Achelse Kluis. Use our Campspace and experience the ultimate camping experience in Pelt. Book your stay now and enjoy the peace and nature, together with your family and friends! Activities in the area: Dommel afvaart, curling balls, bicycle rental, bicycle package "Happen and stairs in Pelt".

name: Casual camping in the East Cantons (The Belgian Eifel)
description: Discover our beautiful camping spot near Sankt Vith, surrounded by fields and nature reserves. Here you can enjoy the peace and nature while cycling, walking or exploring the East Cantons. Not an experienced camper or no tent of your own? Our Glamping tent offers all the comfort and luxury you need for an unforgettable camping experience in the foothills of the German Eifel and the High Fens!

name: The Secret Garden
description: Welcome to La Villeneuve! In the heart of nature, at the top of one of the hills of southern Burgundy, surrounded by forests, hills and fields, about 45 minutes from the A6 (Autoroute du Soleil) in Chalon-Sur-Saône, you find your location. Your space is open to you all year round and is ideal in all seasons! Located in the orchard of an old vineyard (8000 m²) with a manor, outbuildings, a garden and a park you will find 4 parking spaces separated from each other by fruit trees. Each of the seats offers plenty of space. The entire property is surrounded by a wall. Motorcyclists, families with children are also welcome here! Each place offers a lot of its own space. We are very sorry but we had very bad experiences. Unfortunately, we can no longer accept clients with dogs. Various benches, picnic tables and other places to rest, especially in the park, invite you to linger. In autumn these spaces are wonderful for observing the new colors of nature. Enjoy the beautiful view and meet our many free-roaming animals. Whether it's domestic animals such as dogs, cats, chickens, peacocks and a donkey, or small wild animals such as birds or our only neighbours, the Charolais cattle, you will examine each one with curiosity. With us you can expect a lot of nature, peace and relaxation as well as direct contact with the country and its people. Electric hook-ups are available for motorhomes. Drinking water supply is also guaranteed. In the area of an adjoining building there are toilets, shower, lounge and emergency accommodation in case of very bad weather. A discharge point for dirty water is about 10 minutes away and easily accessible. It is possible to rent a room in the main building. On request, we will be happy to provide you with breakfast, lunch, dinner, coffee and cakes or packed lunches. There are many hiking trails, biking trails, markets and festivals in this area whether it's summer, fall or winter! Activities such as swimming, fishing, kayaking, boat trips, covered cart rides, go-karting, etc. are also possible. Not far away are amusement parks, a zoo, a thermal bath, castles, archaeological excavation sites (eg Bibracte), places of pilgrimage (Paray-Le-Monial, Cluny), a Buddhist temple, museums, cultural institutions, restaurants, shops... Excursions to Lyon (approx. 1h30;), Château de Guédelon (approx. 2h30), Lake Geneva (approx. 2h30), Vézelay (approx. 2h) or the Burgundy vineyard (approx. 1 hour) are also possible. Even Paris is accessible in 4 hours. On request, we will be happy to provide you with a personal guide for some of the sites. Please do not smoke in the buildings, do not host excessive parties, and treat our animals, us, our property, nature and the surrounding area with kindness. Respect your housemates, especially during rest periods! Whether you want to spend your entire vacation with us or are just passing through, we hope to see you again soon!

name: Quiet camper yard in the polders of Zeeuws-Vlaanderen with swimming pond
description: Looking for a quiet place to discover beautiful Zeeuws-Vlaanderen with your motorhome? From our yard, in the middle of the polder and yet easily accessible, the coast with spacious and quiet beaches is not far away. The Flemish cities of Bruges, Ghent and Antwerp are just around the corner. If you like cycling or walking, you can indulge yourself in the surrounding polders and enjoy the richly varied arable landscape. Bicycles are available. We have room for a maximum of 3 not too large campers. Unfortunately tents are not allowed.

name: Natural spot on a farm in the Fens
description: Do you want to go green? We welcome you to its woods for a relaxing holiday in the heart of our nature in the Fagnes. You can also discover life on the farm every day from 5 pm to 7 pm: milking goats, milking cows, caring for goats and calves, ... all in a friendly and welcoming atmosphere.

name: Nature camping on the Markermeer - camping & accommodations
description: Welcome to our mini campsite at 800 m from the Markermeer. Originally, this was an organic market garden with a nature campsite in the West Frisian village of Venhuizen, near the IJsselmeer dike between Hoorn and Enkhuizen. Unfortunately, due to circumstances, we have no harvest this year and the market garden has gone wild. Still, it remains a nice place where you can do whatever you want. At our mini campsite you can pitch your tent, caravan or motorhome on one of the spacious pitches, in peace and quiet and surrounded by greenery. No own camping equipment? No problem, there are various accommodations for rent, such as a retro caravan with an unobstructed view. There are various play equipment for children, such as a playhouse, trampolines, slides, sandpit and various go-karts and tractors. Many chickens and roosters live on the market garden, but also two pigs, cats (to snuggle with), dogs and of course many types of birds and insects. Please note that the sanitary building is a short walk away. We strive for biodynamic horticulture based on strengthening natural growth with attention to soil fertility and diversity in crop cultivation. We see nature as a connected whole, in which the influence of climate, soil fertility, water pollution, biodiversity and air quality, among other things, is a determining factor. That also means that it is not a 'tight and tidy' campsite. The grass is uneven, which may make it difficult if you have difficulty walking. The garden is overgrown and weeds and weeds grow consciously for optimal soil fertility and biodiversity. The roughness is a place for special plants and insects. We are happy to tell you more about biodynamic horticulture. Environment Enjoy the tranquility, between the greenery, agriculture and the wide view. Our campsite is located 800 m from the Markermeer, with two beaches. The depth of the water is about 1 meter up to several hundred meters, which is ideal for children, and the water temperature is just a few degrees more. Of course, the area is perfect for walking and cycling along the dike and through the beautiful polder landscape. We are located directly on the popular LF cycling and walking route; the Zuiderzee route. 6 km away is the historic town of Enkhuizen with, among other things, the Zuiderzee Museum, Sprookjeswonderland, playground 'Kindervreugd' and the ferry to Stavoren and Urk. VOC city of Hoorn is 11 km away and Medemblik is 18 km away. Various shops can be found in both Venhuizen and Bovenkarspel, both within 3 km of the TuinGoed. There is also a nice outdoor swimming pool in Venhuizen/Hem: 't Hemmerven and bicycle rental Rijwielhuis Hem.

name: "Back to nature" at nature camping site 't Heuvelhof, in Heuvelland
description: At Natuurkampeerterrein 't Heuvelhof, in the picturesque village of Dranouter, Piet and co offer various unique places. From old-fashioned bivouacing with your own tent or camper, to an authentic caravan or guest house! You stay in peace in the orchard, vineyard, hay meadow or (food) bush, on a site of 1.7 hectares, with very spacious camping pitches and a view of the hills of the beautiful Heuvelland. On the grounds you can walk to the vineyard, the food forest, the wild grove, the sheep pasture, and the natural swimming pool (where you can take a refreshing dip of 5 meters high). Or enjoy the wood-fired sauna barrel* and/or hot tub*! Go back to basics with plenty of space and nature around you, make a cozy campfire at your pitch and enjoy the things you don't do at home - based on the 'leave no trace' ethic. The 52m2 tipi tent is available free of charge for guests and offers access to a refrigerator, kettle and electricity for charging a telephone, headlight, etc. You can hide in it from the rain, make a campfire… Everything is deliberately kept very basic, minimalistic and natural. You are welcome with your friends, family and/or four-legged friends! The region is fantastic for walking or cycling! There is a walking junction and a cycling junction on the site, from which many unpaved (walking) routes start. As an avid walker, Piet is happy to help you find a suitable walking route for you. Within walking or cycling distance you will find several restaurants, cafes, a very culinary butcher, the best bakery, French supermarkets with oysters ... and you can even catch a live performance in the folk music center. At the weekend we sometimes light the wood oven and you can join us in the evening for a delicious dish or we make pizza or there is the possibility to drink coffee on the terrace and / or have breakfast. You can only book our guesthouse and the entire tipi via our website. All extra services (electricity, fire bowl, firewood…) can also be BOOKED ON THE SITE and paid in cash without extra service costs! *The sauna and hot tub must be reserved and paid for on the spot, if available. Sauna, private: €30/1.5 hours (incl. firewood) and hot tub from €60. ATTENTION: ONLY cash payments, NO electronic payment systems! Be sure to take a look at the many beautiful photos of our past guests at the end of the photo series.

name: View of the Mount Saint Michel, Normandy: semi-urban microfarm
description: Discover the unique experience of our semi-urban campsite in Avranches, Normandy, just 400m from the city centre. Immersed in a luxuriant and edible microfarm, our campsite offers exceptional panoramic views of the bay of Mont Saint Michel from each terrace. As an ecological campsite in Normandy, we advocate serenity and harmony with nature. Let yourself be imbued by the beautiful landscape and tranquility of the place. And for a day of excursion, do not miss the visit of Mont Saint Michel, a must-see attraction in all seasons. Take a break with us, an accommodation close to Mont Saint Michel, and let yourself be invaded by the charm and authenticity of Normandy.

name: Overnight stay in the historic Nagold Valley
description: We offer a place for campers on historical grounds, between the forest and the river, below a castle ruin and an adjacent historical Maierhof. In the morning it can happen that horses, donkeys or goats stand in front of the tent to greet you. At night the owls call to go to sleep. Who loves the pure nature is exactly right with us, because the place is surrounded by a lot of nature / forest. On request, an overnight stay in the private forest is also possible. The meadow stretches from the parking lot about 1 km to the forest. -Water can be fetched from the Nagold River, which runs through our property, or from the yard directly. -Dining room with table football, pool table, Div. Toys for children can be used & various books/films to borrow (opening hours: 10 a.m. - 9 p.m.) - Volleyball/ badminton or badminton net available (you have to bring your own accessories) -Hot drinks, cold drinks, ice cream and eggs (while stocks last) are also offered. -Trash can available. - Grill available on request. (Open fireplaces are permitted seasonally due to the risk of fire - alternatively there is a fire barrel) You would have to bring wood for grilling or collect it in the area. !!!The additional services offered, as well as the toilet, are in the adjacent historic courtyard!!!

name: Quiet place, spacious meadow or private wellness close to De Maasduinen
description: Our campspace offers sheltered spots for a tent and spacious areas for campers! Guests can use our wood-fired shower for free, and from October to April the private wellness area with sauna and wood-fired hot tub is also available! You can certainly come to us in winter for relaxation in nature! If you want to come on horseback, you are welcome to stable it in our paddock! The Maasduinen National Park in Limburg is within walking distance and is a beautiful area for hikers, mountain bikers and horse riders. Rental bicycles are available on request and for a special breakfast in the morning you can even pick up the eggs of our chickens!

name: In the middle of the woods, campfire with its own forest
description: Beautiful location in peace. Spacious meadow between the trees with a campfire place in the middle. A private forest with firewood available. Wake up with the birds and enjoy the start of the night with a beautiful evening sun. *** There are no facilities at this off the grid location - bring your own drinking water***

name: Idyllic camping between the fields - Flemish Region
description: Welcome to our unique campsite. A place in the middle of the fields with an expansive view over the Pajottenland. Perfect place to start your walk (eg to the bunkers or towards the Dender). Animals are welcome. You may (in consultation) make a small fire. There is a dry toilet and water for washing up. The place is accessible for all vehicles and you can also come by public transport. Liedekerke station is about 4 km from the site. Nearby you have both the village of Pamel and Liedekerke where you can find all kinds of food.

name: Quinta Lusco-Fusco
description:
Quinta Lusco-Fusco is a rural farm, located in an area of 27ha of cork oak forest. We seek self-sufficiency through a domestic economy of organic family farming. We offer direct and genuine contact with nature, vegetable garden, farm animals and local traditions in the neighbourhood.

This farm has animals, and an organic vegetable garden. It is also just a short distance from Lisbon (30 minutes). The ‘city of light’ offers culture, quirk and great value for money, as well as a gorgeous Mediterranean climate – a definite must-visit when you’re in the South-West of Portugal.

Our campspaces welcomes motorcyclists, campervans and tents.

name: family camping homestay
description: Discover the serenity of the countryside and rest in a haven of peace, ideal for a nature campsite. Stay in a green setting, surrounded by fields and forest, perfect for a bucolic walk and an ecological holiday. Take advantage of a rural village with all the conveniences at your fingertips for a relaxing stay in the countryside. The sea and the nearest town are only 10 minutes away by car, providing an ideal location for exploring the surrounding area. Upon your arrival, you will be offered a drink to welcome you. The enchanting setting: Immerse yourself in a peaceful and silent environment, where only the chirping of birds enhances the atmosphere. Admire the starry sky and let yourself be lulled by the tranquility of the place in your open-air accommodation. The passage is discreet, preserving the tranquility of your stay. Enjoy breathtaking views of the green fields and the surrounding forest. The locations of choice: The site, warm and impeccably maintained, has a slight slope for a unique camping experience. Access is facilitated by a spacious entrance 5 meters long. Share a generous plot of 5795 m2 and choose your location according to your preferences, in the shade or in the sun, taking into account the position of the sun throughout the day. The spacious pitches offer an ideal setting to relax and fully enjoy the surrounding nature.

name: Nature and relaxation
description: Garden with trees with the possibility of beautiful walks, close to forests for walking or mountain biking. For purists, possibility of camping in the forest, if you are independent (electricity, water, toilets).

name: Peaceful campsite on the Lek, between Utrecht and Rotterdam
description:
This is primitive camping with a surprise twist! Our region in South Holland might best be described as "textbook Holland". 

It is characterised by meadows with cows, farms, rivers, dykes, ditches, willows, storks and sleepy villages. UNESCO world heritage site the Kinderdijk (famous windmills) is just around the corner, along with a number of picturesque small cities and villages.

Our mini campsite is next to the River Lek. We have a truly spacious garden, an orchard and a modest bit of woodland that provides plent of privacy, if that's what you're after. 
Bicycles can be parked in the shed, which can also be used for cooking on a wood stove or enjoying a drink.

The river is suited for swimming and the nearest 'beach' is a mere three minute walk. If you know how to command a Canadian canoe on a current you may use our canoe also.

You can order various beverages and food from us, like cold beer, wine, freshly baked bread, espresso etc. as the nearest supermarket is quite a walk. We also offer buckets of iced water for cooling down your own drinks (free) if you wish.

We've recently established a sleeping accommodation in the woodshed which accommodates at least two adults.  

You may also spread your sleeping bag on the straw next to this glamporious addition for the most rustic sleeping experience ever.

Experience the best camping South Holland has to offer!

name: Camping BeIarus-1 in the Achterhoek
description: Campsite in the beautiful Achterhoek, in the countryside between meadows and forests. Peace, outdoors, birds, rabbits, hares, chickens, etc. Outside area with many estates and castles. (in the winter months you can use indoor (heated) sanitary facilities)

name: Camping meadow with swimming pool
description: Quiet camping pitch surrounded by fields. In the high season (from June 1 to September 15) you can use the swimming pool between 10.00 am and 6.00 pm. Electricity is available at an additional cost.

name: Quiet meadow in the middle of the forest near a nature reserve
description: Near the mountain bike route Herentals / Kasterlee. The Tikkebroeken nature reserve. Direct access to forest & hiking trails. Nice lawn, surrounded by the forest. Back to basics - for people who want nothing for a while. Pets allowed. No plumbing.

name: Camping spot on the water with a view of Fort Nigtevecht
description: Let's introduce ourselves, We are Melvin and Angelina We have been living in a very special place in Nigtevecht since September 1, 2020. A stone's throw from the Vecht. And the canal connecting with our backyard. It is so special that our house has been a pounder's house. From here the pound crossed the Amsterdam-Rhine Canal for years, where on average thousands of ships sail per year. We like to share our happiness and special place. By means of 3 to 4 camping / camper spots / parties and parties large and small. The special thing and our goal is that everyone enjoys the great place and especially peace. With additional bookings possible for chair massage / hairdresser visit / supping / food and drinks / sauna and jaccuzi. We hope to receive you soon! Warm regards Angelina and Melvin

name: Eco-campspace in orchard close to Wad and Dark Sky park Lauwersoog
description: Come and stargaze and enjoy the tranquility and the environment around you. I have a free country house with a vegetable garden and a large surrounding garden with enough space for tents, caravans or camper vans. You can lie in the grass, sit under a tree, hammock, or take your bike and cycle to the mudflats. When you come back after a day enjoying the area, you can pick vegetables from the garden or sit on the square or by the fire pit or fire pit with a book / guitar etc. Take a nice warm shower in our private bathroom . Our guests' favourite: our outdoor toilet with a view of the fields. The area is agricultural and has many hiking trails. For example, you can walk in the evening in the 'Dark Sky Park'. As soon as it is dark, a world opens up for you. This is because there is hardly any light pollution in this sparsely populated area. You will see the Milky Way, Orion and many other stars. It's so bright, it's like a 3D starry sky. We have a beautiful wooden house, surrounded by a very green garden. But don't expect neatly raked paths, jeux de boules / mini golf / playground / toilet blocks smelling of chlorine, I am not a campsite, simply a nice place to camp. Together we make something beautiful out of it. Arrival handy before dark. Campfire possible. Please bring your own wood or collect it in a bush around the corner.

name: Camping de Torenvalk, a lovely place in the Peel
description: We have a small charming campsite in the Peel, in front of the door starts a beautiful walk called the "struinpad" Our campsite is located in a landscaped garden with beautiful paths along small fields and bushes. Hidden in the green is our Vintage caravan "Miss in the green" a beautiful Constructam from 1964, a lovely spot in a corner of the campsite. Our pipowagen "Poppy" is also located at the campsite, a nice and complete accommodation for two people.. It is wonderful to relax in the evening after an active day with a drink at the fire pit in a cozy campfire place.

name: Sunset on the green field
description: Welcome to our nature campsite On our 2500 square meter property we offer three pitches for tents, mobile homes and caravans. You stand on our meadow with an unobstructed view of the Feldmark and a fantastic sunset. If it rains, you can use a spacious covered area for cooking and chilling. On our meadow there is a composting toilet and drinking water. For the long nights we provide you with two fire bowls and firewood free of charge. There are two natural pools very close by, which you can easily reach on foot or by bike. You should also definitely visit the fairytale town of Buxtehude by bike. Regesbostel is the perfect starting point for day trips with children to Hamburg (50 km), Bremen (80 km) and the Lüneburg Heath (30 km). In the evening, our green meadow offers pure relaxation (-:

name: Natural camping spot in our horse paradise
description: Come camping off-grid in our food forest and horse paradise with your camper van or tent, or rent one of our brand new hikers' cabins. At our natural stable we not only house horses in our beautiful horse paradise, but we also offer space for guests who want to experience nature. You can camp here with a lot of privacy, with a view of stray horses. Located in the outskirts of Lunteren on a dead end road, you can still enjoy real silence on our property. No roads or trains. Most of the noise comes from a family of little owls, the neighbor's cows and our horses. Sounds to dream away.. We offer a limited number of nature camping spots and hikers' huts. In the middle of the meadow, in the silence between the horses, or in our yard close to the sanitary house. With us you decide where you prefer to stay. For campers we have space all year round on the pavement in our yard. In dry conditions, campers can also choose an off-grid spot on our camping meadow. Separately in our yard is a neat sanitary building with 2 sanitary units. In the low season it is possible to rent a sanitary unit as private sanitary. Our fire pit and picnic tables are at your disposal and our 2.5ha site gives enough space to find a place to enjoy the silence in privacy and to pick wild blackberries and apples in the summer season. Wekeromse Zand is 2 kilometers away from our site. The Lunterse neighborhood forest is also easily accessible on foot and by bicycle. The entrance to the Hoge Veluwe and the Kröller-Müller museum is 10 minutes away by car. The village centers of Lunteren, Barneveld and Wekerom are all about 4 km away from us. Would you like to bring your own horse? We have 4 off-grid tent pitches available, each with a private meadow right next to it where you can house your horse (or 2 horses together). This way you sleep right next to your horse and you experience a very unique holiday with and next to your horse.

name: Staying at micro camping Karmijn
description: Staying at Proefboerderij Karmijn means enjoying a magnificent view. Wild camping feeling in a forest or in the field with lots of space and privacy. Or in one of the cottages or seasonal tent. Cooking on an open fire in the fire pit Waking up to the sound of birds. Playing in our forest and on the field. Cuddling with Polly the pony. We have a large building where you can wash dishes, go to the toilet and shower. You can take beautiful walks and spot animals on stoneworl from here at De Groote Peel and De Mariapeel National Park. Supermarket and eateries are within cycling distance.

name: Private mini campsite in a unique location - East Flanders
description: A unique place to sleep between nature and industry, in a village with an exceptional story. Electricity is available centrally on the site (for example, to charge your bicycle battery or other things). There is 1 shared toilet, and tap water from the garden hose. Buses can be limited at the old canteen building, preferably no vehicles on the field

name: Small campsite in monastery garden, Ellezelles, Hainaut
description:
If you're looking for an alternative to a campsite, look no further! 'Camping in Wallonia' takes on a whole new meaning at our monastery campsite in Belgium. 

With the keywords experience, move, admire, refuel your stay in the beautiful and vast domain becomes a swirling cocktail of nature, relaxation, tranquillity and authenticity.

We offer camping spots on a 2.5 hectare park. In total we allow 12 camping 'bubbles'.
The sanitary facilities consist of 6 toilets with sinks (rainwater).
You can find 6 showers on the first floor of the former monastery school.
We advise you to bring a length extension cable if you would like to enjoy electricity.

Since recently, we also offer an overnight stay in our fully renovated and authentic gypsy caravan on the monastery domain.
Facilities available include:  Toilet, shower, BBQ, campfire, laundry, basic dishwashing corner, dogs allowed. An enclosed horse pasture is available for those who want to go out for a weekend to explore our beautiful region with their own horse.

name: Wait and enjoy!
description: Because we ourselves love nature incredibly much and are often active in our garden, the idea arose to make our meadow available to campers. We are very rurally located in beautiful Wachtebeke, on the border of the Netherlands. That makes our place perfect to enjoy the beautiful nature. You can stay here with your own tent, camper van or caravan, or you can leave everything at home and stay in our glamping tent! There is a lot of space in our meadow, with high grass as a demarcation. We like to keep it small so that everyone has their peace and privacy. There is a sanitary block in our garden where you can take a hot shower in the open air for the ideal outdoor experience. There is a centrally located campfire spot, electricity. Do you want breakfast in bed? Croissant, sandwich, coffee, tea and juice? Which can! For entertainment you can also rent a canoe (packraft) here. You can discover beautiful nature in the area. Many walking and cycling routes cross our village. People and animals can fully enjoy themselves in the Heidebos or Kloosterbos and there is always plenty to do at the recreational domain Puyenbroeck. We are working hard on the expansion, but you don't need much to enjoy nature, of course. Campers have everything with them and do not need much outside a blissful place,

name: CALM Equestrian Farm, HORSES AND COUNTRYSIDE 10KM SEA
description: Discover the Camping Ferme Equestre, a haven of peace for all lovers of nature and horses. Join Marie and Jérôme on our farm of 30 hectares, a real camping in the countryside where the passion for horses is at the heart of everything we do. Appreciate the authenticity, kindness and simplicity of our welcome. Spend a night near our horses, feed the animals of our mini-farm and explore our private hiking trail. Our facilities, of incomparable calm, include independent toilets, a shower and a sink, with electricity available on request. An additional fee of €2 for a shower (from March to September) and €5 for electricity are to be paid on site. During the autumn or winter months, take advantage of your stay at Camping Ferme Équestre to visit local sites of interest. Admire the castles sublimated by the autumn colors and discover Fécamp, a charming city just 10km from the sea. Join us for a unique and memorable horse camping experience, at the crossroads between sea and countryside.

name: Community garden 'Warmoes' near De Molse lakes
description: Our 'Warmoes' summer garden has a number of camping spots where the tent can be put up. No drinking water or electricity. We do have a simple 'dry' toilet.

name: Chalet Rosée & Pitch, near Maredsous & Dinant
description: The perfect place if you want to relax in the middle of nature. With 1 hectare there is plenty of space for everyone. Max 10 guests at a time. Homemade chalet to book with kitchen, chairs, large table, wood stove and ambiance. Ideal to enjoy nature and tranquility with a group. 3 camping pitches on site, possibly in the conservatory. Many activities nearby to enjoy yourself during the day in the beautiful nature and near Dinant. Nice view of fields and forests. Perfect starting point for various walks that also offer variety in both forest and fields. Near the town of Dinant. Kayaking departure from the lesse. Maredsous Abbey Bring your own drinking water.

name: Relax camping! On the farmland, near the canal & the village center!
description: Our spacious Campspace is located between the village center and the rural countryside of St-H-Lille (Pelt). Within walking distance of a supermarket, bakery, terraces, eateries... on the one hand and on the other hand, you can enjoy the peace and quiet in the nearby fields, forests or along the canal. The ideal base for walkers or cyclists. On request we can deliver a breakfast basket to your camping pitch or you can also sit comfortably on our covered terrace. Well-stocked camping fridge with tasty regional beers or other refreshments available! Sanitary available 24/24. Fire pit is ready, wood available. Activities nearby : "Achelse Kluis", cheese dairy "Catharinadal", old folk game "Krulbollen", "Lilse windmill". Nature domains: Hageven, Lommelse Sahara, De Bever, Malpievennen. Playgrounds "De Bosuil" & "Scoutsrally", swimming pool "De Dommelslag", canoeing "Afvaart De Dommel", fishing ponds "De Walvissers". Cycling: "through the trees, the water, or the heath" ... and so much more ...

name: Great nature escape in Aubel
description: This magnificent little farmhouse in the heart of the Pays de Herve countryside extends over 2 hectares and can accommodate any traveler wishing to relax in peace.

name: Farmer's mini campsite, quiet location in Salland
description: We are open from April --- Boeren Mini Camping is located in a beautiful, quiet location in Salland with a wide view over meadows with horses and near a small retirement stable with rest house horses. We have a fire pit for you to use! We have a shared shelter, below you will find walking and cycling maps, games, local newspaper and brochures, cold drink from the vending machine and fresh eggs from our own chickens every day! You can also go here for small necessities such as wood, charcoal, washing powder, bbq (one-off), fly swatters, homemade (scented) candles, etc. We also rent out a chalet, gypsy wagon, retro caravan and a stable home (off grid). Except in the stable home, bed linen and kitchen towels are provided, bring your own (bath) towels! The stable home is unique and is separate from the campsite at the back of our site! It can only be reached via a footpath along the horses. It is furnished with 2 beds and mattresses, solar lamps, fire pit with grill and Dutch oven, cutlery and tools, plates, cups, lighters and wood. There is a gas burner for a quick cup of coffee or a soup, also nice in rainy weather! Next to the house is a (dry) toilet and there is a zinc bathtub under which a fire can be lit! Water for the bath can be taken from the pump. (during the winter period there is no water at the house and therefore no bath possible) Drinking water can be obtained in the sanitary building at the campsite, you can also use our sanitary facilities, but for a real off-grid experience you can save yourself at the cottage! Possibly there is room for an extra tent, the cottage itself is for 2 people. You can rent bed linen (for stable home) from us, we also have towel packages (2 (bath) towels, 2 washcloths, bottle of shampoo and shower gel) Landgoed De Oostermaat is nearby, in the beautiful, quiet and rural Okkenbroek. There are many walking and cycling paths around our place, where you can enjoy nature, such as the marskramerpad and the pieterpad. Deventer Koekstad (located on the IJssel) is eight kilometers away from our place with its historic city center, rich in beautiful historic buildings that you can also admire during a city walk. Sallandse Heuvelrug National Park is 6.5 kilometers away, where you can enjoy the beautiful landscape.

name: Relax and enjoy in the green heart around Leiderdorp
description: Beautiful view over the Achthovener polder. Butcher shop open on Friday and Saturday where our own meat is sold. We regularly organize BBQ evenings. Have a party location with a play area for the children, which can be used. We also have miniature horses that can be taken care of. In short, something for everyone!

name: Back-to-basic camping with sauna in our backyard close to the Biesbosch
description: We welcome you to our 1-acre back-to-basic backyard consisting of a great diversity of vegetation and forestation. You are welcome with your tent, small camper van, roof tent or small caravan (<1000kg). You can also spend the night in our own VW camper van, equipped with all comforts, or camp for free in exchange for some work in the garden or on the buildings. Bus campers stand under the trees in the shade, tents can be placed anywhere (open field, in the woods...). In total there are approx. max. 6 bookings at the same time, which in practice only happens occasionally in the high season, usually you are with much less, or completely alone. Explore the beautiful surroundings with a walk or bike ride, or enjoy the outdoor sauna on our site. Unwind at the toad pool at the back of the property or build a fire at the fire pit while overlooking the grazing galloways. You can also make a fire at your camping spot in a fire bowl or old wheelbarrow. We have 1 toilet and a number of uncovered cold water taps with a sink. There is also a 3-person outdoor sauna (surcharge, per sauna visit) and a (cold) outdoor shower (not covered, but under the apple tree ;). A simple bike can be borrowed, and supermarkets are about 2 km away. Activities in the area: cycling tours, mountain bike tracks, golf, sauna / wellness, boat rental, Biesbosch cruise, restaurants including a pancake house with playground for kids. Please send a message with your request in which you indicate whether you are coming with a tent or bus camper, this due to limited places for bus campers (60x15m in total for max. 3 bus camper bookings to be sufficiently spaced from each other)

name: Forest bathing with a view of the Harz Mountains near Göttingen
description: "You don't have to drive far to be far away" If you are dreaming of a quiet night in nature with your loved ones in the beech forest, then you have come to the right place. Here you will find for your time-out, silence with fresh air. You have the log cabin to yourself. The log cabin is comfortably warm and "hyggelig" furnished. Your log home is in an ensemble of log homes above a small village in the middle of the park. In the morning you can enjoy the sunrise over the Harz mountains in our pavilion. In the evening, with luck, enjoy the starry sky of southern Lower Saxony. Just take the next 150 bus in Göttingen, get off at the Landesstrasse Potzwende stop, and be away again :-) with friends!

name: Camping among the animals near the coast
description: Relax among the animals near the North Holland coast / beach. A beautiful green rural area. The camping pitches are located behind the riding school, the sanitary facilities of the riding school are shared with camping guests. Lessons can be taken at the equestrian center and the experienced riders can take part in a beach ride.

name: Quiet place, spacious meadow or private wellness close to De Maasduinen
description: Our campspace offers sheltered spots for a tent and spacious areas for campers! Guests can use our wood-fired shower for free, and from October to April the private wellness area with sauna and wood-fired hot tub is also available! You can certainly come to us in winter for relaxation in nature! If you want to come on horseback, you are welcome to stable it in our paddock! The Maasduinen National Park in Limburg is within walking distance and is a beautiful area for hikers, mountain bikers and horse riders. Rental bicycles are available on request and for a special breakfast in the morning you can even pick up the eggs of our chickens!

name: Organic farm Mlečnik
description:
Welcome to our Organic farm Mlečnik!

We kindly invite you to take a rest during your voyage on our big courtyard, in orchard or in vineyards.
Our farm is situated on a main road and is 4km away to the nearest highway exit on the A34(Italy) - H4 (Slovenia) highway.
You will find it right away because of a pretty large bamboo forest on either side of a big old house right beside the road, facing a large vineyard.

At our farm, it is possible to connect to electricity (220V or 380V) via extensions (yours or ours).

NEW! We have installed an outside solar shower!

As we live on organic farm, you can help us with our everyday work, or you can just take a tour of the farm and taste our organic wine (5€/person on site).

We will be delighted to have you here!

P.S.: Apparently also mosquitoes love organic farming, so please come prepared (nets on windows, repellents...)

name: Parking space at the winery directly on the Moselle
description: We warmly welcome you! Our camping meadow is on the edge of the village of Mesenich and offers a wonderful view of the Moselle, which is only separated from the pitch by a narrow cycle path. We invite you to visit our Hirschen-Schuster winery, 400m away, and taste our wines. Here you will also find a toilet, the possibility to get fresh water and to dispose of garbage. The area around the parking space is ideal for cycling and hiking. A trip to the Geierlay suspension bridge or the Reichsburg Cochem are also popular activities. We look forward to you!

name: Prosca
description: Camping place on a forest clearing, along the stream. Distanced from the village about 1km. Possibilities of trekking along the forest paths, picking mushrooms, observing wild animals,..

name: Look for miles
description: Take a break and enjoy the view of a beautiful farm with young stock (cows) for miles around. You camp somewhere in the meadow where you can choose your own spot, at 486 meters there is a lovely swimming pool where you can take a dip. There is much to do in the area and Emmen is easily accessible by bike. Wildlands Emmen Waterskiing Emmen Wonderworld Ter Apel Marina Ter Apel Canoeing Ter Apel Pedal boats Ter Apel Veenpark Bargercompascuum If you ask the farmer, you may be allowed to go on the tractor or feed the calves. We have a beautiful cooking room that you can use, so you can bake an egg, make a good cup of coffee or prepare a real culinary masterpiece, everything is possible. We have 2 toilets and 2 showers available. On arrival you can choose from all places in the country.

name: Flemish Pajottenland swimming pool shower sauna
description: Charming camping pitch in the green, hybrid swimming pool heated with solar mats and sauna available. Hammocks, swing, petanque .... Within walking distance Liedekerke forest, Krukenburg castle, St. Gertrudis Church, old town hall Ternat. By bike: Gaasbeek castle, castle route, Gueuze route, MTB trail, ... bicycle highway to Brussels, Aalst, Ninove, Halle, Geraardsbergen (wall of), Ghent

name: Free camping in the middle of Friesland. near forests, lakes & activities
description: We wish you a warm welcome to our hospitable campsite in the heart of Friesland. Our land brings many people to the peace they are looking for. What are you looking for? Relax and enjoy yourself, your family, forests, lakes and nature or actively participate in the many organized activities in the surrounding villages.. With us you will find a wonderfully quiet base with new sanitary building to provide everyone with the basic comforts. Then you can choose whether you opt for rest or action ;) We look forward to seeing you at our campsite! Alie & Sietse

name: Ecological farm with Friesian horses, chickens and picking garden near Sneek
description: A small-scale campsite on the meadow behind with lots of privacy, peace and space. You can see Sneek, but it is still surrounded by vast meadows. From the camping site you can walk straight into the adjacent 6 hectare park, which is managed by the city farm. In summer our horses graze here. There is a wide ditch around the camping site and there is an almost completely unobstructed view, with birds of prey, grazing horses and sheep as a background. You hear a lot of frogs and now and then a deer walks! Children can enjoy climbing trees, building rafts, picking flowers and interacting with animals. The farm is still in development and we hope that our guests will want to think along with us and inspire us to make this beautiful place even more beautiful! The farm is located on 2.4 hectares of land. There is a horse trough, a terrace with trampoline and sandpit, a large vegetable garden and several stables. We also have a local produce shop with a terrace, where you can buy cold drinks, ice cream, dairy products and vegetables. You can also buy local beer and wine here to take to your tent. There is a parking lot at the front where you can park your car. For our camping guests there is a freezer, refrigerator and washing machine to use. THE CAMPING FIELD The camping field is located behind the farm, far from the (very quiet) public road. The field is surrounded by a wide ditch and has a view of the meadows and the horses in the adjacent park. You can watch the sun go down here beautifully! There is room for 15 places. The sanitary building is located in the former cubicle shed and has separate ladies and gentlemen's areas, with a total of 5 toilets and 2 showers. It does have a step, so it is not easily accessible for the disabled. In the field is also our vegetable garden, where you can pick herbs and lettuce. There is also a covered seating area in the stable where you can play games or lounge. There are several water and power points on the site for general use, both indoors and outdoors. ACTIVITIES A few times a week, children can help with the care of the animals, such as feeding chickens and grooming ponies. Small children (up to 8 years) can take a ride on the Shetland ponies under supervision. AREA The beautiful city of Sneek with its many terraces, shops and old buildings is just a few minutes by bike. At 5 minutes cycling you can swim in the Zwette (canal). The Sneekermeer is 7 km away, where you can go swimming, sailing and water skiing. There are many restaurants within cycling distance that also deliver to the campsite. At 11 km you will find the most beautiful tropical swimming paradise in the North (in our opinion), SwimFun in Joure. Visit the 11 cities such as Sloten and Hindeloopen, eat some fish in picturesque Makkum, go wind- or kitesurfing for a day in Workum, rent a canoe or SUP board, there is a lot to do in beautiful Friesland.

name: An old castle in the Alps
description: Historical land Auvergne: Castle in ruins Belledonne & Mountains | Ecological solar oven | Quiet property Discover this quiet Auvergne property of 2500 m2, home to a 13th century Belledonne ruined castle, located in the peaceful and picturesque setting of the Auvergne Belledonne mountains, famous for their mountain lakes. Enjoy ecological cooking thanks to the easy-to-use ecological solar oven, or share convivial moments cooking with the hosts in the authentic 18th century oven. This historic land in Auvergne is a true haven of peace surrounded by nature.

name: Ecological camping in a food forest
description: Since 2018, we have been converting an existing poplar forest into a food forest. Tent pitches have been created in the forest and there is room for a few small campers at the edge of the forest. Your place is surrounded by fruit trees, berry bushes, herbs and wild grasses. There is no electricity and water at the pitches, but there is a central location. If you want to camp with us, it is a requirement that you respect nature and leave as little waste as possible (in the appropriate bins). We are happy to help you with that; we sell packaging-free products in our shop and vegetables, fruit and eggs straight from the garden. It is also possible to order bread and breakfast dishes. We are small-scale, with 20 pitches spread over 3 hectares, and our guests are seekers of peace. You will certainly find that peace here. After just one day, guests usually feel reborn and completely at ease. In the forest there is a communal fire place with a grill for grilling. Disposable BBQs and fires are not allowed near your tent. There is also a shared fridge and kettle that you can use. In the forest there is a sanitary building with two compost toilets and a hot and cold shower. Because there is no sewer, no soap / shampoo may be used and only (a small amount) of ecological detergent for washing up. A little further away there is more luxurious sanitary facilities with wonderful showers and flushing toilets, where ecological soap / shampoo may be used. Our location is close to Middelburg and Vlissingen, 3 km from the Western Scheldt. You can also easily reach the North Sea beaches or the picturesque Veere or Veerse lake.

name: Back to nature at the Brouwersdam
description: In the winter of 2021 we took over this beautiful nature campsite. It is very spacious, has lots of trees, birds and the possibility of spotting deer in the morning! We have furnished the camping area with hammocks, a campfire place, lights in the trees and a nice bathroom/toilet. We are located just 10 minutes from the famous beach and surf spot "De Brouwersdam" and within walking distance of the Grevelingenmeer where you can enjoy wind foiling. You can also visit the authentic town of Brouwershaven at 1 km from us. Please note: at the camping pitches you can check in from 12 noon, at the bell tent and safari lodge check-in is from 3 pm. Do you have questions? Please contact Campspace. Unfortunately, the chat is not working for me at the moment.

name: Farm camping in the Upper Palatinate Lake District
description: Welcome to camping on a farm in a romantic, secluded location! Our idyllic farm, which houses sheep, cows, carp and cats, is located in the middle of the Oberpfälzer Seenland and surrounded by ponds. In addition to the numerous active water sports opportunities in the lake district and the culture, the area is characterized above all by the sheer beauty of the landscape and the biodiversity of the Upper Palatinate Forest Nature Park. The courtyard complex, located on a southern slope, impresses with the listed residential building and the extensively renovated outbuilding surrounded by numerous ponds. Drinking water, hot showers, electricity and a barbecue are available on our extensive facility with pitches by the pond for caravans, vans or mobile homes. Relax in our lounge, enjoy a local beer or play table tennis.

name: Nice, spacious garden, in the middle of the meadows, near the Regge
description: The garden is a place to live, for people and animals. That means space for the cats and chickens, a branch hedge in which hedgehogs and insects feel at home and a girth in which birds feast on what they can find. And that means space for nature-conscious people with whom we like to share this place. In our bed and breakfast and on our ieniemienie campsite. Do you like to be sheltered behind the shed under the tree or do you prefer to look over the vegetable garden and past the greenhouse to the meadows; feel completely relaxed in the place of your choice. Two toilets and a shower, a roof where you can sit in bad weather; it looks like a real campsite. You just don't have to share it with many people. The vegetable garden offers you organic vegetables and small fruit for a very reasonable fee. If the chickens feel like it, there are farm-fresh eggs. Books are plentiful and we don't need to elaborate on the walking and cycling possibilities of the Sallandse Heuvelrug and the Reggedal. Enjoy. A real holiday is of course also an extensive breakfast. We can take care of that for you (after all, we also do that for our B&B guests). And do you want to eat with the pot once; this is of course possible in consultation. With our Canadian canoe you can make nice trips on the Regge. We have a campfire pit for a fire on chilly evenings. There is also a barbecue. A lot is possible, as long as we discuss it with each other.

name: Charming campsite in Den Ham (Twente) with a view of the Lemelerberg
description: Our charming campsite is a popular base for outdoor people. Experience the peace and quiet, within cycling distance of the Sallandse Heuvelrug National Park, the Vechtdal and the Regge where you can go canoeing or supping. 7 walking routes and cycling junction 3 and 18 start from our charming campsite. For children, the play forest on the Lemelerberg and Kabouterpad Zandstuve and the outdoor swimming pool are nearby. Come between mid-August and mid-September when the purple heather is in bloom.

name: Camping on the Leie
description: Welcome to our site along the Leie! We are happy to make our former football field available to you. Ready for a fun time with friends or family! On the property you are secluded from our home. Would you like more contact? Then you are certainly welcome for a drink. There is a fire bowl and tripod available to enjoy a pleasant evening around the campfire or a BBQ. Dry wood is available. There is also a toilet, cold shower with rainwater and non-potable water. For the active among us there are nice walking and cycling routes in the area that start at and around the site. The Flemish Ardennes are a 30' drive from here. We are minutes from beautiful Te Lake Castle and PurFruit's self-picking garden. On the site itself you can enjoy yourself in the hammock, play a game of pétanque, darts or badminton. The site is also large enough to 'romp' with the kids with something from the sports and games suitcase. Would you like to take a tour with the canoe? Feel free to ask!

name: Quiet ecological garden close to Bruges
description: Swimming, boating on the pond. Walking in the Bulskampveld forest. Playing in the garden, sunbathing on the lawn, barbecue by the water.

name: Relaxing, space, freedom and nature.
description: Our campsite for adults (14 years and older) is located in the middle of beautiful nature, but only a 10-minute walk from the pleasant village of Horta de Sant Joan. On the beautiful 125 km long car-free walking and cycling route Via Verde where you can also walk super with the dog. (Google for images of this: Via verde Horta de sant joan) and at the nature park Els Ports. We do not have fixed camping pitches, so you can stand wherever you want. The site is over one hectare in size and there is a toilet block. Free use of hot water, books, swimming pool, terrace, outdoor kitchen, BBQ and Wifi. We have a power connection for 5 places for € 3.50 per night. Meals and drinks available. Small shop assortment available

name: Back 2 Basics in green
description: Welcome to the end of the streets, back to basics, a quiet piece of land in the heart of the Kempen. Unwind completely on an open meadow. SERVICES The facilities are limited to a pump with groundwater where you can freshen up or do your dishes. NB! This is not drinking water. There is also a cute wooden toilet. CAMPFIRE Making a fire in the evening? This is possible in a communal fire pit. You have to provide your own wood. You can always bring your own fire bowl if you want more privacy. Burning open fires is not allowed. GAS FIRES/BBQ Do you like to bake your own piece of meat or egg in the morning? Then you can bring a fire or (disposable) barbecue. Caution is advised in dry weather. NATURE RESERVE The meadow is within walking distance of the beautiful nature reserve De Lovenhoek, where a walking route takes you through meadows and woods along the water. A piece of heaven on earth. THE BARN "The Barn" is a barn behind the family home. Here you can consume something in the evening on request. It is not a public cafe. RIVER Warm weather? Book a day of canoeing or kayaking in advance with one of the local organizations. Or cool off on the banks of the Nete, where you can also swim. HANNES BEAUTY LOUNGE Perfect for a pampering day. Pedicure, manicure, facial care and all that for a great price. Early reservation is recommended.

name: Beautiful piece of nature near a nature reserve.
description: Quiet, charming place on an old fishing pond, situated on the Schoten-Dessel Canal where cycling is beautiful. Westmalle Abbey is also within walking or cycling distance. Located next to the nature reserve Kooldries-Hoofsweer, ideal for a morning or evening walk. There is also a ping pong table under a shelter for rainy days, a hammock for quiet reading or doing nothing;) and a kub game. Noorderkempen station at 4,7km. Dry toilet provided. Waste can be left behind (sorted of course), drinking water can be refilled, also the possibility to use camping shower (in the wild or) by appointment. We all ask a small contribution for this. Welcome everyone.

name: Mini campsite Welcome to the farm in Nagele
description: We cordially invite you to come and camp with us. We have a mini campsite with 15 camping spots of approximately 90m2. The campsite is completely surrounded by all kinds of trees. This gives the campsite a cozy appearance. Enjoy the beautiful garden, the large pond, the chickens and the many plum trees. For children there is a trampoline, a playhouse, a small slide, a go-kart, bicycles and scooters. There is a canopy where you can sit dry and out of the wind. What is there to do near our campsite: - Spar within walking distance for small groceries - Schokkerhaven 15 minutes by bike. There you can sunbathe, swim and eat. - Urk is half an hour by bike. - The forest of Urk. - Museum Schokland is fifteen minutes by bike. - Orchideeënhoeve (tip for children) is 15 minutes away by car. - Waterloopbos is 15 minutes away by car. - The campsite is adjacent to a bicycle junction Who knows see you soon! Greetings Ronald and Floor

name: Spend the night at a nice camping spot or in a cozy pipowagen in the meadow
description: Be welcome to come and enjoy the meadow at our farm. The meadow in front of our house is available for 2 camping spots and there is a cozy gypsy wagon to spend the night in. There is a fire bowl to make a cozy campfire. You can use a toilet and you can tap hot and cold water at the tap in the stable. There is plenty to see if you want to explore the area, including Doornenburg Castle and Fort Pannerden. There are also opportunities to go canoeing, supping or walking in the floodplains on the Linge. Or you don't want anything at all, that's also possible! Our work on the farm will of course continue. It depends on the weather when we mow, shake, haul in grass, drive manure and harvest corn. This gives a little more excitement to the company, but also very nice to experience once. Due to our own planning, you can book with us up to 2 months in advance. The agenda is not always up to date. But send a request and we'll let you know if the place is available :-)

name: Farm campsite with a mountain panorama near Lake Chiemsee
description: Camping on the farm Beautiful pitch in nature with impressive mountain views for caravans, vans or motorhomes. Our sideline farm is in an absolutely quiet, spacious location, about 200m from the road. An overnight stay with us is therefore also ideal for families with children. Pets are also welcome on our farm. As a neighbor the Höslwang Golf Club, 10 minutes from Lake Chiemsee and only 30 minutes from the Alps. Munich is also easy to reach for a day trip. The Eggstätt-Hemhofer lake district invites you to hike and cycle in nature. We are happy to provide our guests with wood for a campfire. Enjoy the peace and quiet on the pitch and the beautiful view of the mountains, while children can of course use the play equipment in the garden (trampoline, swing, playhouse with slide and sandpit, climbing pole). We can give you lots of tips for excursions in the region, even if the weather doesn't play along. Electricity is available, water is possible on request. There are numerous producers in the area who sell their products directly on the farm without intermediaries and transport routes! Be sure to try it. Here you will find honey, eggs, milk, meat, cut flowers and more. We look forward to you!

name: Surrounded by vineyards in the heart of Monferrato
description: Old, lovingly renovated wine farmer's house with a great view over the hills and an ideal place to relax We warmly welcome families with children. Mighty mountains, gentle hills and wide plains characterize the landscape in Piedmont, as well as dreamy villages and towns or modern and lively Turin. Nature and sports enthusiasts will find numerous opportunities to pursue their hobbies. Piedmont can be explored on foot over the endless hills, by bike or on horseback. Again and again you discover small, dreamy villages and on a piazza you can enjoy an aperitivo. All efforts are rewarded with great views and insights. Genoa and the Ligurian coast, the Maritime Alps with Gran Paradiso for hiking and climbing enthusiasts are ideal for a day trip. The Terme of Acqui Terme or Torino with spa offers invite you to relax. Guided sightseeing tours in German, English or Italian.

name: Camping on the water!
description: This quiet location on the water is ideal for enjoying nature and all the beauty that this entails. In addition, there are countless hiking and cycling routes for nature lovers and adventurers. Nearby there is a large watchtower and several viewing huts on the hiking trails. The circuit of Zolder, playgrounds and swimming pools in and outdoors, various escape rooms, Bokrijk, ... something for everyone! (Bus) campers up to Max. 6m. Dogs are allowed. No sanitary facilities.

name: in the field
description: Our pleasant campsite is located in the middle of the fields, a stone's throw from Leuven. On the meadow and in the stables you can meet our horses, sheep, goats and chickens. A cycling route starts a hundred meters from our campsite. All camper facilities and tent facilities are available. Our sanitary block is equipped with a toilet and a shower.

name: Farmhouse camping in the middle of Zealand
description: We are a cattle farm with dairy cows and a lot of other animals, where it is close to nature and in the middle of Denmark's history.

name: Mini campsite in the beautiful nature of Drenthe
description: Our mini campsite is located in the middle of the beautiful nature of Drenthe. With 15 pitches, the campsite is really a small campsite, there is a sanitary building with toilets, showers, washing and drying machine and a canteen. You can also connect your caravan, camper or other equipment to electricity. Within a few hundred meters of the campsite you will find the beautiful nature reserve, the Hijkerveld, where sheep and Scottish highlanders maintain the landscape. There is also a beautiful bird hide on the Hijkerveld, the entrance runs underground, so that you really feel like you are in the middle of the beautiful bird species. In the evening you can relax, the only thing you hear are the birds, crickets and the rustle of the leaves. A beautiful starry sky is visible at night. The campsite is located on the Oranjekanaal, fishing is allowed here with a fishing pass. You can also sail here, we may have a canoe available.

name: Gronings enjoy peace and space.
description: Our farmhouse is located in the middle of nowhere, on the edge of a wetland nature reserve. In the immediate vicinity there are many walking and cycling routes and you can go canoeing. Fancy some fun? The city of Groningen is 11 km from our place. Because we have sheep we cannot allow dogs on our campspace. Our farmhouse is in the middle of nowhere, on the edge of a wetland nature reserve. In the immediate vicinity there are many hiking and cycling routes and you can go canoeing. Feel like entertainment? The city of Groningen is 11 kilometers from our place. Due to our sheep, we unfortunately cannot allow dogs.

name: The Finch
description: Welcome to Nisse, the most beautiful village in the Waardevol Cultuur Landschap Zak van Zuid-Beveland. We live with our 3 foster children in our own self-built ecological house. Our garden of 1 ha is located between the village of Nisse and the main road from Heinkenszand to 's Gravenpolder. There is an ornamental garden, standard orchard with meadow garden, a vegetable garden with bees, a small greenhouse and a forest (with more bees) and an orchard with old fruit trees. From the garden you always have a beautiful view of St. Mary's Church. Nisse is located in a beautiful hedge area where you can walk and cycle. The sea and the beach are also nearby. Nisse is located on the LAW borderland path (stage 4) and the Scheldt-Rhein cycle route (LF13). For the children there is a large trampoline (use at your own risk). There is a washing-up facility and a fridge.

name: Mini campsite in the unspoilt French Ardennes!
description: Discover our mini-camping in the charming and picturesque northern French hamlet of 'Le Tambourin', located in the unspoilt and natural region of Thiérache-Ardenne. Monique and Branko welcome you on our large 67-hectare site for a peaceful stay in the heart of French nature. Our "Une Chance de la France" is a relaxed, affordable and friendly place for dog lovers, cyclists, hikers, nature lovers and peace seekers. You can relax, have breakfast, read a book, drink a glass of wine and enjoy the untouched nature. We also offer a "menu of the day" for your convenience. Pets are welcome and can roam freely in the fenced area. We only accept guests aged 16 and over. Book now for a peaceful and authentic stay in the unspoilt French Ardennes.

name: One night in wild green paradise - or maybe two ... ;-)
description: Possibility to sleep in the countryside not far from Brixen .... come by and stay with us as long as it suits you .... tent is also possible ... we look forward to ... families with children are welcome ... :-)

name: Camping on the organic winery O. Laubenstein in the North Palatinate Uplands
description: Camping on the organic winery near Bad Kreuznach On our organic winery, we provide travelers with tent and RV sites. If you are traveling in Germany with your motorhome or are looking for an attractive stopover on your trip with a motorhome or caravan, you will definitely find the right place with us. The pitches are in the middle of nature. You can expect nice hosts and a small but fine wine tasting with our organic wines. The nearest disposal station for faeces is in Schiersfeld. About 8 km away. Unfortunately we do not have a garbage disposal. Various wines are chilled in the courtyard, our brochures (prices) are there too!

name: Nature camping in the Thuringian Forest
description: Welcome to the nature campsite in the Thuringian Forest My small but fine pitch for a few mobile homes, caravans or tents is located in the middle of the Thuringian Forest on the outskirts of the village of Mosbach, just 10 km from the Wartburg town of Eisenach. Power connection and well-kept sanitary facilities with toilet, drinking water and warm shower provide the necessary comfort. During GDR times, the Mosbach holiday home was a children's holiday home run by a company near Berlin from 1974 to 1989; VEB Kim Storkow. Since 2004 I have been offering group accommodation, self-catering houses, room and hiker's huts for rent in the heart of Germany. Camping in the Thuringian Forest - what there is to discover: The Mosbach forest swimming pool is less than 300 meters from your pitch and provides cool refreshment in summer. You can enjoy excellent culinary delights in the Gasthaus Am Waldbad with beer garden at our neighbors. The Thuringian Forest with its gentle mountain landscape, coniferous and mixed forests invites you to a challenging active holiday, hiking and exploring. There is a wealth of cultural treasures to discover in the Wartburg cultural region.

name: Rehmseecamp near the state capital Schwerin
description: We offer three beautiful pitches for self-sufficient mobile homes and caravans. You are standing on a 2500 square meter meadow with shady trees, near the state capital Schwerin. Fresh water, WiFi included, electricity if required kWh 50 cents. Grill available. Direct lake access. Swimming possible. We provide our guests with two canoes that can be used at any time. Shops and restaurants 2 km away. The surrounding area invites you to go fishing, hiking and cycling. An information board offers further excursion tips. Schwerin Castle can also be easily reached via cycle paths in 12 km. Warm welcome!

name: Roei, barbecue, fiets en ontspan op onze kleine natuurcamping in het Rietveld!
description: Be welcome at our small-scale nature campsite in Hazerswoude village. We have an Araucaria nursery and are also delighted to receive travelers at the camping pitches. The landscape around us is typically Dutch: green polder meadows, windmills, waterways and lots of water birds. We are surrounded by waterways and have rowing boats to discover the area from the water. We also have bicycles available to visit the polders, mills and surrounding farms. If you visit us by car, the cities of Amsterdam, Rotterdam, The Hague and Utrecht can all be reached in 40 minutes. Smaller cities such as Gouda and Leiden are an hour by bike from us. There are toilet and shower cubicles on the campsite for every two camping pitches. There is a large shared space in the greenhouse where you can quietly read a book, use board games, do yoga or just relax.

name: Nature camping with yoga in the Münsterland
description: Idyllic place right on the Mittelland Canal From now on we donate 1 euro per night to the Nabu! Our small farm is surrounded by fields and farms in northern Münsterland and Tecklenburger Land. With us you hear the owls call at night and if you are lucky, deer are in front of your window in the morning. Thanks to a large bird sanctuary in our vicinity, our garden is also a playground for all kinds of specimens of the bird world. We have our own orchard and farm chickens. You can buy our own farm products from us depending on the season. Bakers and village shops are nearby. Our pitch is suitable for a tent, caravan or van and offers electricity and fresh drinking water. Unfortunately, we are currently unable to offer a guest toilet. Pets are welcome guests here. Activities in northern Münsterland On request, we offer yoga courses with our own yoga teacher, so that you can really relax. You can start hiking straight away from your pitch, as there are hiking trails right on our doorstep. Swim in the canal or go on endless bike rides. Climbing areas and the Teutoburg Forest with the start of the Herrmannsweg and the Teutoschleifenwegnetz are very close by. The Münsterland and the Tecklenburgerland invite you to visit countless castles, palaces and country estates. Welcome! PS We almost always have something free on our orchard for guests with a tent. Please inquire even if the parking space is not available.

name: Spacious garden with swimming pond between the Colonies of Merksplas and Wortel.
description: Our 1-hectare garden is an oasis of peace between the colonies of Weldaad van Merksplas and Wortel. The Colony of Wortel has just received UNESCO World Heritage status. In our garden you will find a swimming pond, quiet and unique camping spots, a covered summer lounge, a winter lounge and a real firepit. You camp between the fields and the state forests. Ideal for escaping the rat race of everyday life. For the nature lover and the active camper. Send us who you are and what you're looking for, and we'll be happy to help you.

name: On an adventure in the countryside
description: Ghislain and his family are happy to welcome you to their beautiful farm in the heart of Lievegem. Ghislain likes nothing more than receiving people, which is why he likes to take you along in his gigantic vegetable garden where there are kiwi berries and he likes to tell you about the farm and how he really makes everything himself... Located on the edge of the Oude Kale valley, the meadow is the ideal starting point for walking or cycling trips. Discover the region and enjoy the tranquility of the meadow. In addition, there is the possibility to do a covered wagon ride with Ghislain and in the summer there is a small pop-up bar with fresh drinks and fresh / local ice creams. ARE YOU COMING BY TRAIN? Our farmer will pick you up at the station for €6 pp.

name: Enjoy in a wooded area!
description: Come and enjoy a beautiful domain with a pond, meadows and several hectares of private forest where you can also take a fantastic walk in the woods. With our own bunkers, a wintering place for bats and a child-friendly play environment, you are guaranteed to have a nice stay! The holiday home is currently under construction, so we only provide parking and sleeping places on the domain. The glamping meadow and its facilities are private and NOT accessible for campspace bookings.

name: Chantal and Alain's  micro camping
description:
Welcome to Chantal and Alain: Micro camping with pitches for tents and vans near Marseille and Aix en Provence

Discover a haven of tranquility at Chantal and Alain, where you can enjoy a pleasant and comfortable stay in our micro campsite. Located only 10 km from Marseille and Aix en Provence, our house offers a peaceful setting to explore these vibrant cities.

Our property has a large garden with pitches specially arranged for tents and vans. You can rest and relax in peace while enjoying the privacy of your own space. In addition, you will have access to a refreshing swimming pool, perfect to enjoy the beautiful Provencal weather.

Only 30 minutes from the seaside, our location allows you to savour special moments in nature, whether you are in a tent or in a van.
