Staying with us, you will also benefit from the convenience of a large shopping area located just 5 minutes from the house, where you can shop with ease.

Whether for an extended summer getaway or to enjoy the mild temperatures of autumn, our micro campsite is the perfect place for a well-deserved break.

Book now your stay with Chantal and Alain and get ready to live unforgettable moments in the beautiful Provencal region.

name: Camping Weitblick in the Steigerwald Nature Park
description: Your pitch is located in the middle of the Steigerwald Nature Park on a hill with a beautiful view of the surrounding forests and the valley with the small town of Untersteinbach. The meadow at the edge of the forest is very large and everyone will find a nice place to linger. From a romantically located small chapel, you can watch the sunset and let your gaze wander over the valley. A sheepfold on the property is hidden in a former quarry. It is a pleasure to watch the animals in the pasture during the day. Her bleating and the chirping of the birds in the forest put everyone at ease. The small stream, the "Rauhe Ebrach", runs in the valley. In summer, the clear water offers a nice cooling. A footpath under fruit trees leads to the village, where small grocery stores offer everything needed for daily life. You can also find camping accessories at a mobile home dealer, as well as a gas station and a doctor's office. Almost every small village in the area has an inn, also with its own brewery. The cycle path borders the 12-hectare area. Here you will find many signposted tours in the area. Not far away, in sight, are the oldest beeches in the Steigerwald. The highest elevation in the northern Steigerwald, the Zabelstein, can be reached in 12 km via a forest path. The whole way only forest! There is a wooden tower here, from where you have a magnificent view over the Main valley. In the opposite direction, after 8 km, you will reach Ebrach with the former Cistercian monastery. There is an outdoor pool on the outskirts. If you are interested in culture and would like to go on a city tour, you can reach Bamberg in 30 km and Würzburg in 50 km. For many years, nature conservation organizations have been trying to protect the unique mixed beech forests of the Steigerwald and the biodiversity they contain with a national park. So far, the Bavarian state government has refused to designate such a necessary protected area. Visit us and get an idea of the Steigerwald. You can only protect what is left! We look forward to you!

name: Campsite surrounded by river and near National Natural Park
description: Small trekkers campsite surrounded by the De Lauwers river, near the Lauwersmeer National Nature Park. Our campsite is a small-scale campsite, surrounded by trees and the river De Lauwers. Camping Lauwersschans is characterized by nature, tranquility and space. We have very spacious, free places with 4 amp power.

name: Bourgogne-Franche-Comté : Camping artistique à la ferme Les Sauges dans le Parc Naturel du Morvan
description: Situé au sommet d'une colline dans le Parc Naturel du Morvan, le camping à la ferme Les Sauges offre une vue imprenable sur le Mont Blanc, pour des vacances au vert en Bourgogne-Franche-Comté. Le camping est un véritable havre de paix où vous pourrez profiter d'un camping à l'état sauvage avec les commodités nécessaires pour des escapades en pleine nature. Les six emplacements sont spacieux et offrent un cadre calme et paisible, idéal pour des vacances en famille ou des randonnées. Certains des emplacements disposent d'une alimentation électrique tandis que deux autres sont éloignés et sans électricité pour ceux qui cherchent un camping plus rural. Le camping est également éco-responsable avec des installations sanitaires économes en eau. Le camping est équipé de toilettes et d'une douche pour plus de confort. De plus, une cuisine commune entièrement équipée est disponible pour les campeurs, avec une table et des chaises pour les jours de pluie. Pour les enfants, il ya toutes sortes d'animaux de la ferme, un trampoline et un toboggan, ce qui en fait un lieu idéal pour une escapade en famille axée sur la vie à la campagne. Le camping à la ferme Les Sauges propose également des activités pour ceux qui cherchent à s'immerger dans la vie à la campagne, avec des cours sur le langage corporel des chevaux dispensé par les propriétaires. Il s'agit d'une occasion unique de découvrir les secrets des chevaux et de communiquer avec eux de manière plus naturelle. Le camping à la ferme Les Sauges est également un lieu de rencontre pour les « faiseurs », avec la possibilité d'organiser des représentations théâtrales, des concerts, des danses, ou pour tout autre événement organisé par les faiseurs locaux. La grange abrite également une forge tenue par un coutelier local pour ceux qui souhaitent découvrir les métiers traditionnels. Anyway, le camping à la ferme Les Sauges offre un cadre idéal pour ceux qui cherchent à se ressourcer dans la nature. Le camping est entouré de vastes espaces verts pour des activités de plein air, et d'une vue panoramique à couper le souffle. Profitez du calme et de la beauté de la vie simple en camping dans un lieu unique en son genre. Réservez dès maintenant pour des vacances écotouristiques en Bourgogne-Franche-Comté.

name: Naturia, Eco camp of Chimay. Here we meet
description: An Eco-camping of 6 hectares of pure nature. 70 pitches, 2 ponds, a country bistro, a pretty shop and a very warm human welcome

name: Farm camping in Münsterland
description: Welcome to our farm in Münsterland Hi! Are you passing through or would you like to take a short break (up to 3 nights) in Münsterland? Then you are exactly right with us. Our beautiful farm is located in Bevergern, a district of Hörstel. There we offer you a nice parking space for self-sufficient mobile homes on a 1000m² green area. If required, electricity (cable drum) is possible and included. There are three great restaurants, two pizzerias, an ice cream parlour, two gas stations, as well as discounters, a bakery and small shops on site. The ideal starting point for beautiful bike tours Whether along the Dortmund-Ems Canal, or in the direction of Ibbenbüren (e.g. Gravenhorst Monastery, Naturagart, Botanical Garden, Aasee, ...) or to Rheine (e.g. salt works, Bentlage Monastery, NaturZoo, ...). You can also hike very well, because the Hermannsweg goes right past us and it's only a stone's throw to the Nassen Dreieck. The old town of Beverger also offers a number of attractive architectural buildings to discover. A visit to the Surenburg with its castle, hotel or riding facility is of course a must. The peat bog lake (2km away) invites you to swim and surf in the summer months. There are also many beautiful tours around Hörstel for mountain bikers and the Teutoburg Forest is only 3.5 km away from here. Cities in the vicinity are Ibbenbüren (9km), Rheine (8km), Emsdetten (15km), Osnabrück (40km) and Münster (45km). If you have any special questions or requests, please send us a message.

name: Camping at the farm
description: Small campsite 🏕 in Haute Ardenne, on the border of the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg. Family atmosphere and possibility of making small campfires in braziers. You also have the possibility to buy organic vegetables from the farm.

name: Boathouse camping in the Ritterhude nature reserve
description: Camping near the Wadden Sea Camping at the boathouse. We are a sports boat club on the Hamme in Ritterhude. Our port is located in a large nature reserve. Peace, closeness to nature and comfort are our hallmarks. Our mobile home pitch with power connection is also ideal for a van or tent and offers the necessary comfort with a warm shower and toilet. Pets are also welcome You can experience that with us Your visit to the camp space of the ESV boat club will be relaxed and unique. Stay close to the water, observe nature and wildlife. With a little luck you can spot some deer directly behind your pitch in the morning. Make day trips to Bremen, Bremerhaven or the Wadden Sea. The possibilities for hiking, cycling and just letting your soul dangle are limitless

name: Camperplace Camping Hasselt
description: Welcome to our Camperplace campsite. We, Barry and Stefanie, live on our dairy farm with our 4 sons. Since May 2021 we have a Camperplace/Camping next to our dairy farm in the beautiful countryside between Hasselt and Zwolle. With us you can enjoy the peace, the space, the greenery, but the possibilities of a city nearby; Zwolle center 7 km away and Hasselt center 5 km. We are not luxurious or extensive, but we are lovely in the middle of the grass, with beautiful flowers. Opposite us is the Zwartewater and the mouth of the Overijsselse Vecht; beautiful for supping (inlets can be discussed) or fishing. You can also enjoy walking and cycling with us, we are located on the junction route. There is plenty to do in the region, feel free to email for more information.

name: Special charm campsite
description: Welcome to Camping Luna “de Rolke” We are Camping Luna "de Rolke" and will focus more on free places, healthy lunch in the Orangerie, food forest and vegetable garden and the wonderful outdoor life with music and creativity. 🔥🫖⛺️🏡🎻 A nice charming campsite where you can enjoy all year round between animals and nature. Experience and enjoy ♡ Love team La Luna Care

name: Spending the night in the green with doctor Rombauts
description: Welcome to the domain of former mayor and doctor Rombauts. Come spend the night in a large garden with fruit trees, greenhouses, many sitting areas and a small grove, where you can relax in one of the cozy corners in the green. You are welcome in your own tent, caravan or camper, or sleep well in the furnished glamping tent! In addition to the bathroom inside, there is also a lovely outdoor shower (with hot water) and a fire pit with a grill on which you can also have a BBQ. Cuddle dog Tito is included. The country house is within walking distance of Lippelobos. The area is also suitable for cycling and walking tours, eg. along the center of Flanders, various castles or the breweries of Karmeliet, Malheur, Palm, Cornet and Duvel. I can also give you tips about nice coffee bars, where you can eat delicious ice cream or waffles or have cozy terraces. ...but the best part is of course relaxing in the garden itself! There is a supermarket nearby with a bakery section (open on Sunday mornings!) Ins ta gram: doctorrombauts

name: RAI riding Dasing near Augsburg
description: Welcome to RAI riding in Dasing. Our pitches with a direct view of the paddocks are located in the idyllic Wittelsbacher Land between Munich and Augsburg. Our camping guests will find drinking water, electricity, a warm shower and a covered kitchen here. Pets are also allowed. Alternatively, you are welcome in our fully equipped trapper log cabins or in one of our Native American tipis (maximum of three guests each). What you will experience with us: Rest, relaxation, animals. RAI riding is a bitless leisure and trail riding style. Our training center offers riding lessons in theory and practice, and even the youngest can learn to ride a real cowboy horse. Our walks and hikes with our alpacas are also popular. On the way in the Wittelsbacher Land, our guests experience a deceleration from everyday life together with the peaceful Andean camels.

name: The Olive Grove 🌱 Glamping
description: We have beautiful fully equiped Bell tents in the Olive Grove or down by the river in the valley. Want to enjoy living off-grid in nature, but with the basic needs well arranged, come and be our guest.

name: The Dragon's Forest
description:
Verblijf in La Forêt du Dragon, een schilderachtige landelijke locatie in de Aveyron met een adembenemend uitzicht op de omliggende heuvels. Gelegen nabij het Regionaal Natuurpark van Aubrac, kunt u het hele jaar door genieten van natuurwandelingen. Op slechts vijf minuten rijden van Murols en 15 minuten van het Château de Valon is onze camping ideaal om de streek te ontdekken en te genieten van een kampeervakantie in Aveyron.

La Forêt du Dragon, omgeven door fruitbomen, biedt een groene omgeving om te ontspannen en te genieten van een kleine tuin bij elke kampeerplaats. Wij bieden verschillende soorten accommodatie voor een herfst- of winterverblijf, waaronder standplaatsen voor busjes, tiny houses, safaritenten en andere ongebruikelijke accommodaties zoals tipi's en bel-tenten. Met directe toegang tot een rivier en de nabijheid van vele rivieren en meren in het regionale natuurpark van Aubrac, kunt u genieten van watersporten en wandelingen in een weelderige omgeving.

Murols, op vijf minuten rijden, is de thuisbasis van een beeldenpark waar u vreemde en ongewone wezens kunt vinden. Het kasteel van Valon, op 15 minuten afstand, geeft een mystiek tintje aan de ervaring en biedt de mogelijkheid om een uniek historisch erfgoed te ontdekken.

Ter plaatse biedt een kleine kruidenierswinkel verse lokale producten om uw honger te stillen. Voor grotere aankopen zijn er supermarkten binnen 20 minuten rijden. Honden zijn welkom in ons huis, voor een vriendelijk en onvergetelijk verblijf in deze oase van rust in Aveyron.

name: Camping where the Heidschnucken sleep...
description: Farm camping in the Eifel Quiet meadow close to nature with a view of our Heidschnuckenweide. The farm is on the outskirts of Wachendorf, at the foot of the northern Eifel and is a wonderful starting point for relaxation in nature. With us you will find space on a spacious meadow with an unobstructed view of the landscape, a fire in the evening, products from our Heidschnucke and chilled drinks. We look forward to you! The listed Vierkanthof in the Eifel is home to our manufactory for tuned chimes. Here you get an insight into the production of the handmade chimes. Our factory shop is also located in the yard. We sell our own ringing products as well as gongs and singing bowls, selected gifts, a diverse range of poinsettias and products from our Heidschnucke sheep. More offers: - Washer/dryer per load: €5 - Waste disposal only possible with waste separation (residual waste 3€) If you have any other tips, feel free to ask us!

name: Back to Basics : Off grid in the Belgian Limburg nature
description: This year we again offer 10 pop up camper pitches on our domain de Krieckaert in Gellik Lanaken. This park is pure nature and absolute tranquility at the entrance of the Hoge Kempen National Park and a stone's throw from Maastricht. Come take a walk in our park. You will experience the peace, hear the birds chirping and enjoy the healthy air and the beautiful view. De Krieckaert is a park like no other : we are chosen by lovers of absolute peace and nature who opt for a back to basics experience. On the other hand, the park is located a stone's throw from bustling Maastricht with its many shopping and culinary options. Taverne de Krieckaert will spoil you with a very affordable kitchen and tasty drinks, both on the cozy terrace and in the form of takeout. Attention: no water or electricity is provided on our pop-up pitches For more information about the location and the atmosphere of the park, please visit the Krieckaert website

name: Campfire, rest and enjoy our nature campsite
description: Camping Nature in Auvergne between Lyon and Clermont Ferrand: 10 hectares of paradise, 4 lakes, BBQ and campfires | Country residence near Vichy, Roanne and Thiers - Auvergne-Loire Discover our 10-hectare nature campsite in Auvergne, located between Lyon and Clermont Ferrand, on the border of the beautiful Loire region. Enjoy a country retreat in an idyllic setting with 4 lakes, endless green spaces and breathtaking views. Enjoy charcoal barbecues and campfires in complete freedom during your holidays in the Loire Auvergne, for unforgettable moments with family and friends. Nearby, discover the charming towns of Vichy, Roanne and Thiers for cultural and tourist excursions. Book now your stay in the heart of nature to enjoy relaxation and unique landscapes!

name: Camp with a view of beautiful Filsø
description: Scenic location in the middle of nature. Primitive but with access to toilet/bath, sink, water and electricity.

name: Camper at the foot of the Knokteberg - Flemish Ardennes
description: At the foot of the Knokteberg (côté du Trieu) you will find our unique spot that symbolizes peace, enjoyment and becoming one with nature. The meadow is a combination of mowed paths, camping spots, tall wild grass and flowers. Everyone has their own, shielded place. The ideal place to use as a starting point for breathtaking walks or bike rides through the Pays des Collines, the Flemish Ardennes and the Kluisbos. Even those who are just looking for peace and quiet will find it with us. Child-friendly and surrounded by animals such as chickens, cows, horses and sheep. If you are lucky you will hear the calling of owls and foxes at night. You can take a hot shower or use the toilet in our new sanitary block. Outside you will find tables and chairs, as well as a sink where you can also take drinking water. There is also a large shared refrigerator.

name: Campsite in the countryside, 200 meters from the Baie de Somme and shops
description: Take advantage of a peaceful camping holiday, just 200 meters from the Baie de Somme, for a holiday surrounded by nature. Our campsite offers you an ideal location to explore the surroundings, with access on foot to all the points of interest of the city: the medieval old town, the shops, the port, the PMU tobacco bars, the restaurants, the cinema, concerts and artist exhibitions. Discover the surroundings of the Baie de Somme thanks to the cycle path, the steam train and the coach, with the SNCF station accessible in just 5 minutes by car or coach. Outings organized by nature guides, boat trips in the Bay, rental of sea kayaks, bicycles and river boats are available just 800 meters from the campsite. You can also take advantage of the fishing pond, horse riding centers and nearby forests. The host even offers activities such as harvesting plants from the Bay, fishing for brown shrimp and discovering pebble or sandy beaches, where you can enjoy the space in peace, even in summer. Combine outdoor activities, relaxation and discovery of nature for a memorable vacation!

name: Idyllic farmhouse stay
description:
Set in rural Buckinghamshire  we are peacefully set back from all traffic.  Only pet sheep  chickens and labradors for company.  You can walk down to River Ouse or simply enjoy the peace.  We are friendly and accommodating so if you need anything  we are always around somewhere.  Local attractions:  Silverstone Racecourse,  Stowe, Waddeston and Claydon House, which are National Trust properties and all within easy reach.  Plus Milton Keynes Xscape building and The Bowl.  Nearby Buckingham is a historic market town with farmers and antiques market and Old Gaol Museum.
NB.  
The campsite itself is huge and can be extended further, so just go ahead and book because there is space for everyone.

name: Peaceful garden near a forest
description: We are located in Meetjesland, just 3 km from the Lembeek forests. It is the ideal starting point for a whole series of relaxing cycling and walking tours in this beautiful region with its varied faces of forests, creeks, quiet roads and charming villages. Would you rather take a trip to the city? Ghent - a bustling city full of culture and trendy hotspots - is only 15 km away. Via the Lieve (river) you can go there by bike or you can take the bus (stop 1 km) or the tram (stop 5 km). Or would you like to plan a day trip to the sea? Knokke is the seaside resort known for its exclusive location by the sea and large villas and is about 40 km away.

name: La madriguera azul (The blue burrow)
description: Welcome to La Madriguera Azul, a place in the middle of nature where you can camp and/or sleep in a Mongolian Yurt and enjoy nature. There is also a big river with a swimming pool and a magical forest to go deep into; a trampoline to jump on for the little ones or the most daring ones and nightly bonfires with skies full of stars! All around us there are several routes for hiking or biking. And, although it is difficult not to get entangled and enjoy the terrain, there are also many other activities close to home by car: 25 minutes from spectacular beaches like Berria or Trengandin to enjoy the sea (Surf/Kite surfing); 30 minutes from Santander and its great bay, 45 minutes from the source of the Ansón River and its great waterfall and 45 minutes from Bilbao, its old town and its great museums (Museum of Fine Arts and Gugenheim Museum).

name: Relax you're on Camp Time
description: This mini campsite is located in the rural wooded area of De Mortel in the municipality of Gemert Bakel. With beautiful walking and cycling routes in the immediate vicinity. In addition to the blossom or other beautiful flowers, there are also many birds, butterflies and bees that come to sniff. The falcons hanging in the air and in the evening the bats flying around. Then you can hear the woodpecker ticking and the rooster crowing. Start the morning with a farm-fresh egg from our chickens. And then there's a big rabbit to pet. Peace and space around us, you are in the middle of the countryside but still close to the villages. Barbecuing is allowed and there is also a campfire place. The Stippelberg nature reserve is our backyard. Hiking in the area is very beautiful and fun. Also many cycling routes that you can start from the campsite. With the motorcycle out, you are in Germany or Belgium in no time, plenty of options for a nice ride. In the nearby villages of Gemert, Bakel, Deurne, Helmond you can enjoy the many terraces on the beautiful squares.

name: Farm camping between Lake Constance and Allgäu
description: Welcome to our farm camping in the Argental! Camping on the farm You spend the night with your tent, caravan, van or mobile home in the midst of fruit trees on the edge of a forest in a nature reserve, in the immediate vicinity of our farm. Electricity and toilet available. Pet are allowed! What is there to discover It is only a few kilometers to Lake Constance and the Allgäu. In the summer months it is even possible to swim in the Argen, you can reach the pebble beach in just a few steps. A special tip from us is to visit the Sonnenhalde wildlife park, about 3 km from our farm.

name: Great sunrises
description: In the back of our small trail riding station, with a wide view over fields and forests, we have space for tents and mobile homes. In good weather you can see as far as the Tangermünde church tower. There are also many fine restaurants and attractions in this beautiful old imperial city. Various seating areas, electricity, fresh water and a toilet are available to our visitors. A savings box is available for using the hot water shower. (If you book the Reiterstübchen, the hot water shower is included). A small pond, in which you can also swim, is just under a kilometer from the village. But also a small forest swimming pool can be reached in 15 minutes by bike. Anyone who has always wanted to sleep in a stable can do so with us. As a special form of accommodation, travelers can use our little rider's room with sleeping galleries. We have a BBQ area and, if needed, a gas grill. Since the Altmark has the largest interconnected network of bridle paths in Germany, there are countless hiking and biking trails here. A wall box is available for e-car drivers for a fee. 50 meters from the farm is the village soccer field for younger visitors.

name: Nature camping under trees on the Lower Rhine
description: Wonderful location near the forest Welcome to our RV park at the old mill in the Dong. This place is wonderfully easy to reach via the motorway and is located in the immediate vicinity of the forest to explore the Lower Rhine. There is drinking water, electricity and a mobile home connection. You are also welcome to bring your four-legged friends with you if they are on a leash. The Internet reception is great and therefore perfect for freelancers. What is there to discover about me? Halde Norddeutschland is easy to reach on foot or by bike. Experience a beautiful piece of nature with miles of Lower Rhine fields and forests. The old mill is a highlight in its own right, both in the light and in the dark. Fancy a day trip to the Netherlands? The border at Venlo can also be reached quickly by car.

name: Relax camping! On the farmland, near the canal & the village center!
description: Our spacious Campspace is located between the village center and the rural countryside of St-H-Lille (Pelt). Within walking distance of a supermarket, bakery, terraces, eateries... on the one hand and on the other hand, you can enjoy the peace and quiet in the nearby fields, forests or along the canal. The ideal base for walkers or cyclists. On request we can deliver a breakfast basket to your camping pitch or you can also sit comfortably on our covered terrace. Well-stocked camping fridge with tasty regional beers or other refreshments available! Sanitary available 24/24. Fire pit is ready, wood available. Activities nearby : "Achelse Kluis", cheese dairy "Catharinadal", old folk game "Krulbollen", "Lilse windmill". Nature domains: Hageven, Lommelse Sahara, De Bever, Malpievennen. Playgrounds "De Bosuil" & "Scoutsrally", swimming pool "De Dommelslag", canoeing "Afvaart De Dommel", fishing ponds "De Walvissers". Cycling: "through the trees, the water, or the heath" ... and so much more ...

name: Jardin Josette
description: Discover the authentic camping and gîte Jardin Josette, a former farm in ecological transition located in the quiet hilly region of Thiérache. Enjoy nature in summer and winter by choosing camping with your own tent or camper, or opt for a unique experience in our Mongolian yurt, travel trailer or retro caravan for rent. Our unusual caravan or retro caravan accommodation offers an original and unforgettable nature camping experience. In Jardin Josette you can relax in a relaxed and authentic environment, while discovering the beauty of the surrounding nature and the starry sky. With a warm welcome and campfire facilities, our wilderness campsite offers the ultimate camping or simple lodging experience. Book your caravan holiday now for a unique and unforgettable experience.

name: Mini campsite with sauna near the Bruges Ommeland
description: Our mini campsite is a unique base for tourist and recreational trips in the Brugse Ommeland. It is a quiet rural site for all ages in a small orchard of plum and apple trees. Clean hot showers, toilets, sauna, ping pong table, kubb, trampoline, picnic tables are available.

name: Ferme Mellon
description: Herzlich willkommen auf unserem 5 ha großen Campingplatz am Flussufer im Herzen der Bretagne, nur 4 km von Rostrenen entfernt. Unser Campingplatz bietet Ihnen eine ruhige und einladende Atmosphäre, ideal für Zelt- und Wohnmobil-Camper, Gartenarbeit-Enthusiasten und Tierliebhaber. Wir sprechen fließend Englisch, Französisch und Deutsch, um Ihren Aufenthalt unkompliziert und angenehm zu gestalten. Genießen Sie die naturnahe Umgebung und die Vielfalt an Wasseraktivitäten, die unser Campingplatz am Flussufer bietet.

name: My garden in the Search, spend the night in our garden in peace.
description: Camping in the meadow in the outskirts of Twente. Adjacent to our English landscape garden. Beautiful cycling environment.

name: Camping at Grijsberg
description: Come and enjoy the vast forests here in the Antwerp Kempen. From your camping pitch you have an ideal base for many wonderful walking or cycling trips. If you prefer to enjoy the peace and quiet, you will probably find a nice spot close to or on your camping spot. Ask the owners about the local assets because they are certainly there. For the sporty holidaymaker and/or the quieter, there are many beautiful, interesting places to discover. On the camping site itself you can find peace and breathe in the wonderful scent of the forest. Would you like an egg and/or a jar of honey or jam for breakfast? Your host and hostess will gladly offer it to you. Most of it comes from our own garden. In the evening you can enjoy the sounds of the forest here: the song thrush with its evening song, a grunting woodcock that flies over and when the campfire is lit you can also hear the tawny owl by the crackling fire. If you have any questions about the possibilities at the camping site, you can always contact the host and hostess.

name: Forest campsite near Osnabrück
description:
Welcome to our little paradise in the woods between the farm and the cornfields near Osnabrück. We offer you a very natural family-friendly campsite: going back to the original value of camping. Simple and friendly in a tranquil environment. 

Forget about your stressed life, it's time to explore sweet meadows and fields, then sit down and relax with a cup of coffee and homemade cake. Our camping spot is behind our farmhouse in the glade of the woods. We love animals, and your pets are welcome upon upfront agreement. 

Our small micro-campsite has two fire pits and a wooden outhouse. There is a toilet and water available.  Either bring your own tent or rent my teepee tent and tree tents. Optional breakfast. 

Bring your hiking boots to explore the area!

name: Camping in a real farm park
description: For a pleasant holiday you have come to the right place! Camping at the farm becomes a real experience for young and old. We look forward to welcoming you again this season for a nice holiday with us! Ready for a pleasant camping holiday in the Brabant countryside? With us you are in a place where the children will have fun and you will also enjoy the farm, the beautiful landscape and the hospitality of the beautiful green forest. As a camping guest you also have free entrance to our indoor playground. Lovely camping in the countryside and yet only 10 minutes by bike from the historic village center of Oirschot. Also called monument in green. We are located in a beautiful area with lots of natural beauty, see surroundings. Children up to 11 years have an advantage with us! They are more than welcome and can play to their heart's content while the parents relax. Our camping field is far away from the public road and everything is well protected with fences and an entrance gate. We will do everything we can to make you and your children happy, so that your family has an unforgettable holiday. At our campsite it is possible to participate in various activities. This is of course without obligation. The camping site was renovated in 2008. Since then we have offered 40 spacious pitches (10mx10m) with new facilities. Water, drainage and 10 ampere electricity is available for every place, Guests at our campsite can also use our indoor playground for free. We have more than 25 years of experience. We have been a campsite since 1994! Since October 2005 we have also been affiliated with Recron Netherlands.

name: Spot on our driveway or in our garden, near hike and biking routes and 'Meldertbos'
description:
Wij stellen onze oprit  (straatkant, dus niet altijd stil!) ter beschikking voor een weekendje weg of mensen op doorreis met de camper. Ook fietsers of wandelaars met tent zijn welkom in onze tuin. 
We wonen vlakbij Meldertbos, zeer landelijk. Op half uurtje tot drie kwartier wandelen van Bierdorp Hoegaarden. 
Veel routes voor wandelen en met de fiets, o.a. de Ravel richting Namen. 
Hemelwater altijd beschikbaar, drinkwater enkel als wij zelf thuis zijn. Pingpong, darts, petanque.
Honden aan de lijn. Open vuur niet toegestaan, wij kunnen eventueel een vuurkorf ter beschikking stellen.
Lees goed de omschrijving: wij bieden een plekje aan, geen campingfaciliteiten!

name: Relax on a farm in the middle of the Alblasserwaard polder
description: Camping with a view of the pollard willows with cows rumbling in the background, a curious cat stroking your legs, watching the sun set behind the mill, fog over the meadows. If you recover from that, you are more than welcome here!  If you are more enterprising, you can canoe in the Graaf or the river Giessen, cycle to the windmills of Kinderdijk, sail in the Biesbosch, walk to a tea garden, gaze over the many ditches, visit a thrift shop, it is possible here. If you still want to sniff some culture, visit the fortified town of Gorinchem or old Dordrecht or cross the waterbus to Loevestein Castle.  Your tent is on a dairy farm, but hidden behind a barn will not bother you that much.  There is a shower / toilet that only others can use during the day because there is also a workplace rental. You are the only camper. There is a sink in the shed with hot and cold water where you can do the dishes or sit for a while when it rains very hard.

name: Adventure at the airport in the Thuringian Forest
description:
Hi & Aloha, welcome at the airport! We live right on the little mountain called "Dolmar" and offer camping and sightseeing flights over the beautiful thuringia forest and landscape. Come and find out! 
We welcome you with a tent, van, camper or motorhome. Your kids and four-legged friends are more than welcome too. Toilet, hot shower, electricity and laundry machine provide the necessary comfort. Or how about a campfire to end the day? We offer a fantastic view, hikes, nature and flight observation in a tranquil and peaceful environment. 
We also run a small but cute bistro with refreshments and snacks you can enjoy on our terrace while watching the sunset.

name: Village idyll in the Harz Mountains, near Wernigerode, top for cycling and hiking tours in the mountains
description: On our private property in the village, just a few kilometers from the Harz Mountains, we offer you a quiet spot to spend the night or linger in a tent. We have a lot of space and you can choose your own place around our house when you arrive. Please note: We have received many inquiries from people who would like to come to us with campers. Unfortunately we do not have space for campers or caravans directly on the property. If you want to spend the night in your vehicle, you can park it under our carport, right next to the property. However, the vehicle may not be more than 2.10 meters high. You can also use our cozy covered terrace with table and chairs. The fireplace is at your disposal. Firewood can always be found in the adjacent stream. A small charcoal grill is available and can be used. For the summer we have a large wooden pool in the garden, which you are welcome to use after consultation with us. From here you can go on excellent cycling or hiking tours in the mountains, but you can also cycle in a relaxed manner across the surrounding fields. Experienced cyclists can reach the Brocken at 1142 in about 2 to 3 hours. But please remember that you should also have suitable bicycles for this. You can also rent bicycles in nearby Ilsenburg or in Wernigerode. The cycle paths in all directions are directly adjacent and you are immediately in nature. You can be in the tourist town of Wernigerode in about 30 minutes by bike. You are in Ilsenburg in about 20 minutes. Goslar and Bad Harzburg can also be reached quickly by bike. Hiking tours can also be started from here. There are several bus stops nearby, from which buses depart regularly in the direction of Wernigerode and Ilsenburg. Our property is located directly on the Via Romea pilgrim route, which leads from northern Germany to Rome, so we are also the perfect stopover for all pilgrims. In the village of Veckenstedt you also have the opportunity to go shopping in the country market at normal discount prices. Hiwer there are also numerous regional specialties. The market is about a 10-minute walk from our garden. A bakery is also available, this is also open on Sundays. There is also a Volksbank ATM at the Landmarkt. If you like to eat fish, the Veckenstedt fish farm is recommended, there is fresh fish and fish rolls here, and if you like fishing, there is also a fishing pond with trout, eel, pike, sturgeon, catfish, carp and zander. The A 36 motorway is only a 5-minute drive away, so you are welcome to stay with us while you are passing through (don't worry, the motorway is far enough away so that your peace and quiet is never disturbed). If you stay with us, you can shower and use the toilet in our house next door. The bathroom is fully equipped and you have drinking water and electricity. The sanitary facilities are available to you alone during your stay, they are not used by other people and are thoroughly cleaned after each rental. If you arrive by car, you can park it under our carport (maximum height of the vehicle is 2.10 meters). If you wish, I can then give you some insider tips on hiking, cycling or other interesting places on site. We don't rent our garden twice, so you're always undisturbed and don't have to share the sanitary facilities. We are very child-friendly and also have some equipment for children on site. A high chair is available and there is also a large sandpit in the garden that you are welcome to use. There is also a children's playground in the immediate vicinity. If you come to us with children, we ask you to take good care of your little ones, as not every corner of our large garden can be made absolutely child-safe and our property is not completely fenced. Otherwise your children will be thrilled and can even play with us at the stream. We look forward to you! See you soon😉

name: Finca Ermita
description: My name is Greg I am an olive oil producer the farm has no pesticides and respects nature the finca ermita is 10 hectares of century-old olive trees, carob trees and almond trees 5 kms from the beaches and creek of l'ampolla fishing village restaurant ice cream parlors supermarket 5 kms from the village El perello 6 kms from the Elbro delta mountain bike trails and hikes at the exit of the property and beautiful weather calm setting sea view on the delta delbre the mountains a magnificent sunset and especially nature you will be able to access the entire property no fires except barbecues to respect the environment and the others occupy animals like the human being

name: Natural camping at Domaine du Moulin Neuf in the Parc Naturel Périgord-Limousin.
description: Experience a unique WildCamp Périgord-Limousin in the heart of the Périgord-Limousin Regional Natural Park. Discover an oasis of peace on the Moulin Neuf nature reserve, a private domain of 25ha, where nature and the landscape of the Périgord-Vert meet. Set up your tent for a nature holiday in the Périgord-Limousin Park and enjoy a natural lake of 1.1 hectares to fish for brown trout and swim in crystal clear waters. Enjoy a picnic in an idyllic setting with available tables. At WildCamp, we are committed to eco-friendly and responsible living and promote discounted rates for Camp Space visitors. Go on an eco-friendly holiday in the Périgord and reconnect with nature at Domaine du Moulin Neuf 1605.

name: Camping Sous Les Étoiles Normandie
description: Discover the charm of Normandy at camping "Sous Les Etoiles", a picturesque family campsite, nestled in the welcoming village of St Martin des Besaces, Calvados. Benefit from our unique offer of camping and caravaning suitable for all ages. Our extensive camping pitches in Calvados are ideally located in a lush rural park of more than 5 hectares, offering stunning views of the green fields, and are protected by a variety of trees and hedges. Savour the melody of bird song and the wonder of a diverse fauna during your nights spent "Under the Stars". Our private and pet-friendly campsite in Normandy, is within walking distance of the village center, where a range of shops and services is available. Discover the essence of nature and the friendly atmosphere in St Martin des Besaces, a rural campsite with a view in Normandy that will make you live an unforgettable experience.

name: Farm camping near Lübeck
description: Animal pleasure for big and small: Our camp is surrounded by nature and meadows next to our farm with ponies, many farm animals, animal-supported offers and direct marketing of delicious products. Perfect for tent, caravan, camper or van. There is electricity and water directly at the farm, but not on the meadow. You are welcome to use the bathroom at the farm. To experience in the area: Our tent and RV site is within walking distance of the village with a farm shop, train station and beautiful hiking and cycling trails. For water rats there are fantastically beautiful bathing lakes in the immediate vicinity, in just half an hour you can be in picturesque Lübeck, in 40 minutes on the Baltic Sea coast and in 45 minutes in Hamburg. Welcome!

name: Camping near the Kampina nature reserve and Nemelaer Castle
description: You camp behind our farm with sheep, pigs, chickens and many birds on a wide landscape of 1 hectare. On our large site we offer a small kitchen with the necessary elements, hot showers (also outside for a real experience), a bbq for outdoor cooking, cozy fire places, a swimming pond and a trampoline. Our landscape is 300 meters from beautiful hiking and nature reserve De Kampina and Castle Nemelaer. Within cycling distance you can visit the pleasant village of Oisterwijk with its many terraces, shops and eateries. We also have a B&B, if you want to come with someone without camping equipment. We offer 4 places on our campspace. It is therefore possible that you are not alone on the campspace.

name: Camper place in the Achterhoek
description: Nice Camping in the beautiful countryside between the cows. The area is wonderfully quiet. Wake up with the chirping of the birds. The farm is a wonderful base for cycling or walking routes or just relaxing in the silence of the Gelderland landscape. Our farm is located in the beautiful town of Zwiep. (municipality of Lochem) In Zwiep you will find the De Witte Wieven and De Zwiepse mill, where you can go for a nice lunch or dinner! It is accessible within walking distance. At our location there is a Rest Point stall, where you can buy coffee, tea, walking / cycling routes and homemade products at a low price. The stall will be open again from April 8, 2023! On arrival you will see a sign with my phone number on it and instructions on it. You can call or app me. Am I unavailable? You may park your vehicle in the parking space or on the meadow. In the course of the day I will be back at the location and I will be happy to help you further. You are very welcome here!

name: Camping on the farm in Normandy: stay in the heart of the Pays de Bray among the ponies
description: Welcome to our old cheese farm, located in the heart of nature at the end of a dead end. Our property extends over 8 hectares of meadows lined with hedges surrounding a stone building dating from 1825. You can live a unique camping experience on the farm in Normandy among the Connemara ponies and the many wild and domestic animals that live there. resident. Depending on the season and the weather, you can settle down wherever you want: near the house for more comfort, near the camp for conviviality around the wood fire or in a bivouac at the top of the grassland to be closer to nature. Here, social distancing is not a problem and you can enjoy a peaceful and rejuvenating environment, far from the hustle and bustle of the city. If you are looking for unusual accommodation in Normandy for your camping holiday, our cheese farm is the ideal place. We offer outdoor activities for the whole family and you can enjoy an unforgettable nature stay in Normandy. For your sanitary needs, we provide you with dry toilets in a dedicated shed as well as conventional toilets in the owners' house. A solar shower is installed near the trailer, with a water temperature depending on the sunshine. Water points are also accessible outside near the trailer. We provide environmentally friendly products for sanitary facilities. For a total disconnection, no WiFi, but 4G works perfectly according to the operators. Electrical outlets are accessible near the stables, with the possibility of extension if necessary. If you are looking for a natural stay in Normandy to recharge your batteries, our farm campsite is the perfect choice. Come admire the magnificent sunsets and contemplate the stars on summer evenings while falling asleep to the cry of the owl. Enjoy a rejuvenating stay in the heart of nature in our old cheese farm in Normandy. Book your camping stay at the farm in Normandy now.

name: Rome Ciampino Garden
description: Comfortable garden with services, Ciampino is a great location to visit Rome and Roman castles Frascati, Marino Castel Gandolfo, Lake Albano ... Nearby you will find the station wherefrom in just 15 minutes you can reach the center of Rome.  Comfortable garden equipped with services, Ciampino is an excellent position to visit Rome and the Roman castles Frascati, Marino Castel Gandolfo, Lake Albano ... nearby you will find the station where in just 15 minutes you can reach the center of Rome.

name: Child-friendly campsite near Cologne & Bonn
description: Welcome to our idyll at the edge of the forest, 12km from the center of Cologne and Bonn. In a park-like garden with 4 Soay sheep, the two running ducks Donald and Daisy, chickens and guinea pigs and a number of play and sports equipment, we offer pitches for short vacationers for small and large tents or campers (VW Bulli size or campers up to 6m in length) for rustic overnight stays love. Toilet, sink, barbecue area, tables and chairs as well as kitchen equipment can be used in the garden. A simple toilet is in the garden shed, the sink in the garden. Internet and power connection are possible for an extra charge. Kitchen appliances in the garden house can be used. Fridge, oven, microwave, kettle, crockery and pans are available here. An infinite number of excursion destinations and visits to cultural institutions in cities and in the country are possible within a one-hour radius. The Wahner Heide lies between Cologne and Bonn and is one of the largest heathlands in Germany. With more than 20 museums, the Cologne Cathedral, the Neandertal, the Bergisches Land up to the Siebengebirge near Bonn and Siegburg, there are a multitude of great and cultural excursion destinations that also invite you to take day trips by bike, bus and train. With the Sieg, the Agger and the Erft there are also kayaking areas in the surrounding area. The "Phantasialand" amusement park in the region is only half an hour's drive away for young and old. Warm welcome!

name: Camping between Münsterland and Teutoburg Forest
description: Child-friendly relaxing holiday Our place offers you plenty of space to relax and beautiful sunsets. The country is flat, which makes it great for cycling. We rent out a large fire bowl and firewood for romantic evenings. Children can play with us on a slide and a swing. We offer you a beautiful large meadow, which is separated from our private house in the small Harsewinkel by a lot of greenery and trees. Your camper place is equipped with electricity (for 5€ per night), toilet and drinking water. Near the house and away from the road there is a wide green area for camping. You are welcome to bring your pets with you. What is there to experience with us Not far from the pitch there is an outdoor and indoor pool (3 km). The Feldmarksee offers another possibility for bathing. The free animal park Olderdissen, the four seasons park and the Ravensburg are also worth a visit. There is no risk of flooding with us! From time to time cars drive by, but hardly noticeable 😉 Welcome!

name: Large garden in the middle of the meadows near Sneek
description: This place is located in the middle of the meadows on a dead end road 2 km outside the village of Tirns and 5 km from Sneek.

name: Quinta da Hortelã - A Nature Paradise near Porto
description:
Quinta da Hortelã it's a farm house with a small forest area surrounding a blueberry plantation. Lots of space for tents and easy access for small caravans and small motorhomes.

The setting, although only 25 km from Porto, Braga or Guimarães, (all with quite good train connections from the local stations) is extremely quite with absolute silence, except for the natural water streams and wildlife. Situated in a montain top, it's possible, on a clean day, to see the sea from the garden.

There are two main spots to stay. A flat garden, covered in grass and a forest area, with lots of shade. Access is easy for cars and small motorhomes. Caravans, if too long, can have some trouble with the gate.

There is a complete bathroom, with shower and hot water inside the old barn. This is open 24h.

The barn serves as a room for all kinds of activities. Electricity is easily reached and extension cords can be provided (although these are limited in number). There is a refrigerator and a barbeque available.

There is also free Wi-Fi access by the main house. 

During the year there are several activities at the farm, mainly linked to agriculture and culinary.

Outside the farm, within walking distance, you can find a horse riding school, several well marked trails, water falls, a catolic sanctuary with magnificent views and the ruins of an ancient (pre-roman) human settlement.

Within less than 30 minutes you can reach cities like Porto, Guimarães or Braga, all with lots to offer. 

We welcome families and allow pets. 

There is also a children playground and a small water tank, perfect for a hot summer day.

name: Beautiful meadow orchard in the Odenwald region near Heidelberg
description:
Welcome everyone! This is a huge (20 hectares) pet-friendly meadow with beautiful old apple and pear trees in the middle of the vineyard with a fantastic view.

Easily accessible by car and with plenty of space. A place with a lot of privacy and freedom. At the bottom of the hill you can buy delicious local strawberries, if you visit us in the right season. 

There is no water or toilet, which is why we can only accept booking requests from travellers with vans, motorhomes or caravans with own toilet. Please pick a spot in the lower half of the square, away from the houses neighbouring houses and keep it quiet after 9pm, so as not to disturb neighbours. 

Great insider tips:
 
Go to the nearby wild animal park Wildpark-Schwarzach or drink a coffee at "everyday's happiness" Café closeby.

Enjoy the beautiful sunrise in the morning!

name: Camping Park The Black Water
description: We are a small, cozy campsite with spacious camping pitches of 140 m2, our own water tap, free WiFi, and a cozy campfire place, which can be enjoyed with several campers in the evening. In 2022, the campsite will have the following innovations: - a new sanitary spacious opportunity with 3 showers 3 toilets - a room with a kitchen unit for washing dishes The campsite is located on a large forest area called the Stempelberg and a characteristic forest area called De Sijp. Extensive walking areas, cycling routes, horseback riding routes. We have 3 new walking routes. Discover the nature around camping park the black water and get to know the farmers. Waterplas de Rooie Plas is the possibility to swim this is free and possibly. water ski cozy terrace Large playing field and close to Toverland amusement park, Hemelrijk, strawberry farm Museums, a lot of history in the municipality of Gemert Bakel to visit Just to the peace and space We welcome everyone with a cup of coffee Brabant fun

name: A spatial pleasure: very spacious camping pitches and luxurious sanitary facilities
description: Our nature and landscape campsite is small-scale with 15 very spacious camping pitches on the sheltered field or the field with a panoramic view. You choose where and how you want to stand. The luxury sanitary facilities are located in the farm and consist of a separate men's and women's area with 2 showers, 2 toilets and 2 washbasins. There is also a covered washing-up area in the farm with a fridge-freezer combination and you can use the washing machine and/or dryer for a fee. Waking up to birdsong, enjoying the peace and nature. From the campsite you can walk and cycle endlessly through the woods and heath, along the water and over the rolling landscape. We wish you a wonderful holiday!

name: Camping at the Bischofsburg
description: A park-like complex includes the bishop's castle Burgliebenau, located on an old arm of the Weißen Elster. Our family is restoring and reviving this castle complex from 1186 with small cultural events. Important information attachment The parking space is located directly in the forest below the castle complex. pitches There are many large trees on level meadows, but there are also sunny spots. The sanitary facilities Two outdoor shower cabins with only cold water are available as showers. A bathing lake is 1 km away. Toilets are available in the house. Furnishing If required, short-term WiFi access can be provided in the house. Electricity is available outside. activities We are happy to offer an entertaining guided tour through the history of the castle for a small fee. The Wallendorder lake offers a wonderful swimming opportunity. a notice The freight airport Leipzig is not far away and there is frequent air traffic at irregular times. However, we have found that not everyone is bothered by it. Since we are renovating the castle over many years, it may happen that we also carry out work near the parking spaces between 9:30 a.m. and 3:30 p.m.

name: Camping Yuccas & Tilleuls - Vivez l'expérience du camping dans le vignoble bordelais
description:
Découvrez notre Camping nature Yuccas & Tilleuls près de Bordeaux, un hébergement en plein air niché au cœur des célèbres vignobles bordelais (Saint-Émilion, Sauternes, Graves et Entre-deux-Mers). Ce terrain de camping vous offre l'occasion de vivre une expérience authentique et paisible dans un cadre verdoyant et rustique.

Notre camping est idéalement situé pour partir à la découverte des vignobles bordelais, avec des visites et dégustations dans les villages de Saint-Émilion, Sauternes, Graves et Entre-deux-Mers. Profitez d'activités sportives à proximité telles que la randonnée, le vélo, l'escalade ou encore le canoë-kayak.

Le terrain propose un espace de camping rustique avec toilette sèche et espace de lavage sommaire, ainsi qu'un point d'eau potable et une prise électrique. Nous accueillons tentes et petits camping-cars (type VW).

À l'extérieur de la maison, une kitchenette équipée d'un micro-ondes, frigo et évier est à votre service pour préparer vos repas. Profitez également d'un espace repas extérieur couvert, avec table et chaises (sans lessive, supplément de 15€/jour).

À proximité, vous trouverez un charmant petit restaurant abordable ainsi qu'une épicerie avec dépôt de pain. Venez vous ressourcer dans notre havre de paix et découvrez les richesses du patrimoine bordelais !

name: Recharge your batteries with stunning views of the Gers countryside.
description: Discover our spacious and picturesque 'camping bike-friendly Gers', nestled in the heart of the countryside. Enjoy unparalleled freedom in our 'camping spacious countryside', choosing your ideal location among our shady areas, offering both privacy and stunning views. Enjoy electric connections for caravans and motorhomes, an equipped kitchen, a barbecue, a laundry room and a games room. Enjoy a refreshing swim in our campsite with saltwater pool, at the owner’s discretion. Our owners, certified French Federal Instructor and Initiator, are at your disposal for advice, thus ensuring an 'active holiday in the Gers'. Explore the surroundings with our mountain bikes and electric bikes for rent - a perfect opportunity for a 'mountain bike camping rental'. The trails start directly at our door. The nearby village, 4 km away, offers all amenities as well as a mountain bike base offering more than 300 km of marked trails. Our campsite in the Gers is the ideal starting point for a multitude of activities and places to visit, enriching your holiday.

name: Self-sufficient camping in Rabenau near Marburg
description: Ahoy! My camp offers space for three self-sufficient self-catering people with a camper, caravan or van in the middle of the area. As a family, dog lover, couple or solo traveller, make yourself comfortable in front of the campfire and let your soul dangle. IMPORTANT: No parties are allowed at the campsite. There is a supply/disposal station in the village next door. After booking you will receive detailed directions from me. In the neighborhood: The area is ideal for hiking, cycling and paddling on the nearby Lahn. Visit the historic old town in Marburg. There is an ice cream parlor and supermarkets in the villages next door. Everyone is guaranteed to get their money's worth here. Take care!

name: Castle campsite between the Rhön and the Thuringian Forest
description: Rest at Geyso Castle Welcome to Hohenroda-Mansbach. We offer you space for one or two tents on the meadow and a pitch for a camper in the parking lot. We don't have sanitary facilities for camping yet, but we can of course provide you with water and electricity. We ask you to bring a hose or canister and a long cable with you. You can find wood to make a fire on the site (you have to collect it :-) There is a fire bowl in the basement. Please place on a manhole cover so that the meadow does not burn and put it back after use. Two community grills are available. The spacious area is 8,000 m2 in size, you should pay attention to a quiet night's sleep. You are welcome to marvel at the horses on the premises, but please do not feed them. The W-Lan is best used directly at the castle or in the foyer. What is there to experience with us We offer you a place with a lot of peace and various possibilities to relax. Be it by simply relaxing in the garden, taking walks in the area, swimming in the surrounding lakes and much more. The imagination knows no limits. In the village there is a bakery, butcher and here is the horse farm Arhöna. A small bathing lake is in the next town 2 km away. There are beautiful hiking and cycling routes in the area: for example to Grasburg and Ulster. The historic Celtic village in Sünna is 10km away. Let's go on an adventure!

name: Camperplace Camping Hasselt
description: Welcome to our Camperplace campsite. We, Barry and Stefanie, live on our dairy farm with our 4 sons. Since May 2021 we have a Camperplace/Camping next to our dairy farm in the beautiful countryside between Hasselt and Zwolle. With us you can enjoy the peace, the space, the greenery, but the possibilities of a city nearby; Zwolle center 7 km away and Hasselt center 5 km. We are not luxurious or extensive, but we are lovely in the middle of the grass, with beautiful flowers. Opposite us is the Zwartewater and the mouth of the Overijsselse Vecht; beautiful for supping (inlets can be discussed) or fishing. You can also enjoy walking and cycling with us, we are located on the junction route. There is plenty to do in the region, feel free to email for more information.

name: Gamping at the chateau
description: Opt for a unique gamping experience in Normandy and stay in a 16th century castle, carefully restored by a passionate French couple. Located in the picturesque Vexin Normand, our historic campsite is close to Giverny and only 50 minutes from Paris. Dive into 500 years of history and follow in the footsteps of the White Queen of Castile. Soak up the solidarity and charm of life in a traditional French village, nestled in the most beautiful part of the Vexin. Our accommodation is ideal for lovers of history, art, nature and for those looking for a cultural holiday in Normandy. Experience nature camping in the heart of Vexin Normand.

name: Camping Lindlerhof at the lake
description: Come to the Hohe Tauern National Park and spend a few days away from everyday life at 900 meters above sea level... with the whole family or dear friends! Go hiking or cycling in the beautiful mountain landscape, just relax with your loved ones! And this with all the advantages in the middle of nature. Camping or cottage by the lake Combines closeness to nature with luxury! This special way of relaxing is suitable for everyone who likes to spend their holidays in the middle of nature, but also doesn't want to do without comfort on their days off! At Gut Lindlerhof you will find everything your heart desires: on the one hand, impressive nature at 900 meters above sea level between the Großglockner and the Lienz Dolomites and a huge area with plenty of space for children to relax and play, on the other hand, real, comfortable beds, a fully equipped kitchen, and excellent sanitary facilities! Holiday dreams come true here!

name: An absolute ZEN experience!
description: Relaxation in Provence: Zen and ecological stay in Cotignac | Provencal tranquility, natural well-being, swimming pool, fast WiFi and solar panels Discover the charm and tranquility of Provence, on our 1.5 hectare estate nestled in a forest where cicadas sing. Live an absolute Zen experience by maintaining your privacy with a limited number of guests. No entertainment, no disco, no playground - just nature and natural well-being. Our environmental responsibility is ensured by the power supply via 12 volt solar panels. Enjoy a fast WiFi connection thanks to our optical fiber for a connected Provencal tranquility. Cotignac, a picturesque and classified village, is only 3 km away. Explore the wineries, restaurants and the famous weekly Tuesday market. Visit the must-see sights such as Vins sur Caramy with its lake and beach, Moustier-Sainte-Marie, the Gorges du Verdon and Lac St Croix. From June 6, 2022, you can refresh yourself in our swimming pool for a complete relaxation in Provence. Stay with us for an unforgettable and relaxing Provencal experience. We look forward to welcoming you!

name: The garden of Ateliers Gerny
description: Good morning! We are lucky Stéphan, Sacha our son and I to live in this magnificent region that is La Calestienne. Our property is located on a high plateau and on one hectare of forest and limestone meadow. We can therefore share our space as well as offer you ideas for walks, with geological and naturalist knowledge. During the summer season, we open a terrace where you can cool off and discover excellent local beers. The garden is attached to the "Ateliers Gerny", B&B and creative spaces. If you want to follow the news of the place, do not hesitate to visit the FB page.

name: Unique attractive mini campsite with swimming pond, sauna, privacy and cosiness
description: Come and enjoy our attractive mini-camping site 'Het Zomernest' where you can experience peace, space and privacy for 2 months a year (July 7 to September 3), as well as enjoy the atmosphere. Swim among the fish in our beautiful natural swimming pond and find the ultimate relaxation in our wonderful sauna with outdoor shower. At your disposal is also a spacious fire pit, a trampoline, a football field, a chicken coop with fresh eggs, an outdoor bar with coffee and tea in the morning, an indoor bar where you can enjoy a drink in the evening and a shower building. with 2 spacious showers, 2 toilets, a urinal, a combined shower & toilet and a covered washing-up area. The grounds are park-like with many different shrubs and plants; a true paradise for many birds and butterflies. The campsite has 14 spacious camping pitches, each with its own power point, 2 of which already have a fully equipped folding trailer or camper that can be rented for a small additional charge if you do not own one yourself. Due to the small amount of camping pitches, there is a lot of space, privacy and the possibility for personal contact when desired. There is plenty of room for entertainment for young and old on and around the site. In the evening there are marshmallows to roast in the fire pit with a view of the sunset and twice a week you can watch a nice movie in our outdoor cinema in the evening. Behind the site, a 5-minute walk away, you will find a beautiful nature reserve 'Schans de Katshaar' and there are many walking and cycling routes in the area. The nearest supermarket in Schoonebeek is 10 minutes by bike or 5 minutes by car. If you want to do something more active in the area, the old fortified town of Coevorden is also easy to reach by car. At about 10 minutes drive you will also find Plopsa Indoor and the Hutten Hoogte Center Parcs with AquaMundo and activities such as laser tag, bowling, climbing and Adventure golf as entertainment for everyone. Afterwards you can enjoy all the peace, space and nature on our site.

name: Arvids Garden
description: Beautiful piece of nature on the edge of a recreational area and located on numerous waterways. In the middle of Antwerp and Brussels, squeezed between A12 and E19, yet in an oasis of green and ideal for walking and cycling without ending up in busy traffic. No water, plumbing or electricity. Use of bathroom and toilet in the residence possible after appointments. Contact us if you want extras such as; bicycle rental, tents, electricity, courier, ... if possible it will be provided for an agreed price.  Ideal for mobile homes  Superb spot on the border of a recreation domain, near by the water. In between Antwerp and Brussels, and the two highways between them but never the less in the middle of only green. Ideal spot to walk or bike without strugling the traffic.  There is no water, sanitary or electricity provided on the spot but can be used in the house on agreement. If you want something; like bikes, tents, electricity, grossery,… please ask and we see whats possible  Ideal for campers.

name: Mini campsite with sauna near the Bruges Ommeland
description: Our mini campsite is a unique base for tourist and recreational trips in the Brugse Ommeland. It is a quiet rural site for all ages in a small orchard of plum and apple trees. Clean hot showers, toilets, sauna, ping pong table, kubb, trampoline, picnic tables are available.

name: Farm campsite in De Wilp
description: Our farm campsite is located in the vicinity of the provinces of Groningen, Friesland and Drenthe. Our campspace offers camping space for 10 standing places. You are welcome with your tent, caravan or camper. If you are looking for a fully furnished camping accommodation, then you have come to the right place, The campsite is located just outside the village of De Wilp and within walking distance of the corn maze. The provincial border post from Groningen to Friesland can be seen from the campsite. The provincial border of Drenthe is 10 kilometers away from the campsite. The camping field is surrounded by grassland so that you can enjoy the deer, rabbits and other game that walk across the grassland in the twilight and early dew. Spotting from the jetty at the campsite is a pleasure. In the immediate vicinity of the campsite you can enjoy walking and/or cycling on the various routes. There is the Kale Jonkerspad, the White Nonnenpad, Nanninga's forest, the Slotplaats estate in Bakkeveen and the watchtower in Bakkenveen. Fishing water at Jonkersvaart is only 900 meters away. The village of Marum, which is 2 kilometers away, has various shops including two supermarkets, a LIDL and AH. The weekly market is on Friday afternoon. You can shop in the bustling city of Groningen. The Herenstraat is a very popular shopping street. The city has a weekly market twice a week. Groningen is known for its cozy terraces and nice restaurants. The surrounding villages of Leek and Roden are also a must to visit. For example, Leek has the Nienoord family park and water recreation on the Leekstermeer. In short, there is plenty to do in the area. Services: The site has two coin-free showers, three toilets and a covered washing-up area. There is a refrigerator for general use. The camping site is equipped with 6 Amp power. The containers for separated waste are located at the rear of the shower/toilet block. Parking is located next to the farm. It is allowed to drive onto the camping field on arrival and departure. Pets are welcome.

name: Campsite "Les Pieds dans l'Herbe": Rejuvenating stay 20 minutes from the ocean in Pays de la Loire
description: Discover our charming campsite located in the countryside and nestled in a shady and peaceful setting. Whether you are in a tent, caravan, van or motorhome, our campsite offers pitches adapted to your needs. Enjoy a rejuvenating stay away from the bustle of the city, while being only 20 minutes from the ocean beaches. Our campsite is the ideal place for nature lovers, families and couples in search of tranquility. Located in the beautiful Pays de la Loire region, our campsite is ideal for exploring the surrounding area. Book now for an unforgettable experience in the heart of nature.

name: Wonderfully quiet camping among the olive trees!
description: We have two furnished luxury bell tents, equipped with luxurious beds and comfortable seating areas. The tents are located between the veigen trees and offer a beautiful view over the site. There is also plenty of room to camp with your own camping equipment. There is a spacious outdoor kitchen with all mod cons. In the outdoor kitchen you can cook and eat deliciously. There is a new sanitary building with a shower and toilet. Our place is located in the middle of the orange groves and the area is quiet. Within walking distance is a nice restaurant where live music is often played. The town of Silves is 7 minutes by car. We have a large above ground pool for nice cooling on hot summer days.

name: Small campsite in the middle of nature
description: The Vossenhol is a small, cozy campsite in central Portugal; located near the “Serra da Estrela” (the Star Mountains), the highest mountain range of the Portuguese mainland, a beautiful region in a beautiful country. It is a camping paradise in the middle of nature, the ideal place to explore this beautiful area. There is plenty to do or visit depending on everyone's taste and interest. The "Serra da Estrela", almost 2000 meters high with huge granite stones and unforgettable views, is the perfect landscape for beautiful car or motorcycle trips or beautiful hiking trips using the marked PR tours that cross the entire mountain. Besides hiking, there is still plenty to do: horseback riding, rock climbing, cycling, canoeing, paddleboard and karting. There are also a few rivers with picturesque river beaches, ideal for relaxing on hot summer days. In the region you will also find very nice, small, old villages: Meruge (the old center is built on a huge rock), Linhares (has a beautiful castle), Bobadela (Roman arena and interesting olive museum), Piódão (picturesque mountain village completely built up in slate), ... A few larger towns, about an hour's drive from the campsite, are more than worth a visit: Coimbra (one of the oldest universities in Europe, pleasant shopping streets and old buildings) and Viseu (with its beautiful cathedral, nice shopping streets and a large market every Tuesday).

name: peace, space and nature between beautiful waters in a rustic polder
description: In the rustic polders of East Flakkee, near the town of Achthuizen, time has stood still and tourism is in its infancy. In daily life we work in (elderly) care. That daily bustle washes off us when we get home. We live in the middle of this special environment in our farmhouse. We have partly set up the land, 1.5 hectares, as a mini camping site for camper, caravan and tent. There are also 2 gypsy wagons for rent. And if you wake up in the morning to the call of the harrier that startles the roe deer while the carp in the creek that meanders past our mini campsite through a nature reserve and potato fields, you will fully experience nature, the peace and the space. One grabs his chair and goes to enjoy the rising sun. The other came by boat to go fishing on one of the large waters and a cooling dip a few minutes from our mini campsite. The accessibility of cities for shopping is good, as is a cultural visit to places such as Willemstad or Zierikzee. And our place is also a good base for beach lovers. In +/- 20 minutes you are on the beaches of the North Sea, without traffic jams!

name: Macesen farm
The ZuiderKRIB -Taste-Experience-Enjoy-
description: Spend the night in a quiet green environment, look out over the fields or the water, go on an adventure in the Tiny House on the dike and EXPERIENCE, walk with your feet in the grass, TASTE the espresso at T121 and fall asleep in the hammock. ..Put your tent between the fruit trees, park your camper as you wish, go out with the picnic basket or pick the tea from the garden, splash in the Zwartemeer and cook with fellow campers under the roof on the open fire. Pick your flower from the flower picking garden and ENJOY. We do too!

name: Camping in the orchard of Het Galgenhof
description: We offer 3 retro caravans to spend the night in. Tents and campers are also welcome! You sleep in the orchard under the apple tree or pear tree. Enjoying a beautiful sunset at the fire bowl is daily fare here! Horses are also welcome here! We are located near the Schipdonk Canal and Drongengoedbos. Numerous cycling, horse riding and walking routes. Network of nodes, signposted equestrian routes or guided by myself on horseback. There is a compost toilet with comfortable toilet seat. A cold garden shower can be very invigorating!

name: Farm
description:
The Farm is a family-run organic farm with certified production of fruits and vegetables, guest houses, spaces for events and an art gallery that was created in the property's old cellar. Located in Fernando Pó, the gardens of the vineyards, in the municipality of Palmela, close to Lisbon, Setúbal, Arrábida, Alcácer do Sal and Comporta, provide the best of both worlds for their visitors: unique experiences in the farm and in surrounding areas. 
The houses offer visitors all the amenities for a pleasant stay in the countryside, as reflected in the rating of 9.5 out of 10 that guests assigned to the property. On the farm, visitors can also stay in the orchard using their tents or caravans.
On the farm our visitors can play ping-pong, basketball, volleyball, table football, dive into the pool, visit the vegetable garden and orchard, play in the gardens, feed the chickens, visit the art gallery, do a painting or bread workshop, wine tasting and even watch open-air cinema.
In Fernando Pó, visitors can go on foot and bicycle trails, horseback riding, picnics in the vineyard, taste the local soup, seafood, shellfish and roast suckling pig, but they cannot miss the visit to the most famous wineries in the village.

In the surrounding areas, you can take the catamaran to Cais do Sodré (Lisbon center), take a Sado tour to see dolphins or eat oysters at sunset, take the ferry to Tróia, eat fried cuttlefish in Setúbal, razor clams in Alcácer do Sal or an unique rice in Comporta, visit the beaches and the natural park of Arrábida, visit the Castle of Palmela and the Casa Mãe da Rota dos Vinhos among many other options.

name: Nice micro-camping away from the crowd.
description: Our camping field is located on our 3-hectare site in Lucaswolde in the garden of Groningen, the beautiful Westerkwartier where people are constantly surprised by the changing landscape with its meadows and fields, swamps, heath and peat lakes and woods. A maximum of 5 tents and/or caravans or motorhomes are allowed. Enjoy the beautiful surroundings back to basics and relax. In the common room there is a fully equipped kitchen, there is a pool table, pinball machine, shuffleboard and dartboard, a cupboard full of books, magazines, games and craft supplies. So you can enjoy yourself here if the weather is not so nice. There is a fire pit on the property where you can make a cozy campfire. There is plenty of space for children to build huts or jump on the trampoline, cuddle with our pony Tequila, feed the chickens, and collect farm-fresh eggs yourself. Within cycling distance there is the barefoot path that children often can't get enough of. From our location you can take beautiful walks, our meadow has its own walking path that was made possible by Routebureau Groningen and is included in the walking junction network. You can also cycle through our own surprise cycling routes of various lengths. We have one ladies and one men's bicycle that can be rented. Hiking trails such as Pettenpad, Melle's pad, Pebe's pad, Abel Tasmanpad, Kale Jonkerpad, Witte Nonnenpad, Leedaanzggerspad and the beautiful Curringheveld are all in the immediate vicinity. a better connection”.

name: Forest camping with a private pond near the North Sea coast
description: We warmly welcome you to our micro campsite with a private pond. With us you can enjoy nature in the forest, relax at the lake or swim in the cool water. With us you are independent and can enjoy your time in peace and slow down. Our property offers a short hike through the forest and many other opportunities for hikes and long bike rides in the area. Whether dog lover, hiker, cyclist or water rat - with us everyone gets their money's worth. It drives you to the North Sea coast? No problem, Cuxhaven and Bremerhaven can be reached quickly by car. How about a visit to the Bremerhaven lighthouse or the German Maritime Museum? The possibilities are limitless. We can discuss everything and look forward to seeing you! - Kathrin, Vera, Andrea and our dog Yoko.

name: Glastonbury Orchard
description: Peaceful garden working cider apple orchard. Country lanes, cycling, dog walking, plenty of places of interest to visit locally. Close to the famous festival site. 5 miles from Glastonbury town. Owners live on site but 1.5 acre orchard to hideaway in. Campfire spot. Teepee to gather in, small brook running through, beehives, woodpeckers, owls etc. ! Cider to try and buy 🍾

name: Farm campsite in a secluded location on the Franconian Saale
description: Dream place for nature-loving campers in the countryside at the Gaboldsmühle We offer two parking spaces in the middle of nature at the Gaboldsmühle. The mill is still partly in a deep slumber. We would be happy to show you the mill tower (almost "everything" still looks the same as it did back then. You immerse yourself in a completely different world). 1. One parking space is in the middle of the orchard. There are old apple and pear trees here. You look directly at the fields. If you are lucky, rabbits and deer will come into direct view. 2. The second parking space is directly on the Franconian Saale on the mill island. You can see the evening sun going down and the light reflected on the water. From there you can see the village of Großeibstadt and hear the church bells ringing. A fire bowl with wood is available for both pitches. Drinking water, toilet and electricity are available. You are welcome to bring your pets with you. Do you want to discover the area? You can drive into the beautiful and powerful Rhön. The Kreuzberg (mountain of the Franks) with its Kreuzberg monastery to stop off and have a snack is definitely worth a trip. Here you will find many well signposted hiking trails. Another destination is the Wasserkuppe (mountain of the aviators). The climbing garden and the summer toboggan run on the Wasserkuppe are ideal for children. A detour to Thuringia would also be possible. The city of Meiningen, the Thuringian Forest, the Rennsteig and of course Oberhof with the biathlon arena. In our village there is a baker, a butcher, a pizzeria and a wonderful café on the cycle path within walking distance (opening hours: Wed/Fri/Sun 3-8 p.m.) Are you more interested in wellness?
