The spa towns of Bad Königshofen, Bad Neustadt ad Saale and Bad Kissingen with their beautiful thermal baths and sauna area can be reached in a few minutes. Or just be here! Enjoy the space, nature and tranquility! TIP: If you would like an energy massage, talk to RaMona. Through our historical mill you reach the new treatment room. TIP: Have a look at our little meadow house on site!

name: Camping Ferme Bretagne: Emplacements Nature & Agritourisme à Feins
description: Découvrez notre charmante ferme à Feins, en Bretagne, offrant des emplacements camping nature pour votre camping-car. Vivez un séjour rural authentique au cœur de la nature bretonne, rencontrez nos moutons, poules et savourez nos légumes bio. Profitez de l'hébergement en ferme bretonne et des nombreuses activités de loisirs à proximité pour un agritourisme inoubliable.

name: Quiet camping spot with a view of the Pieterpad
description: A quiet spot has been reserved on the border of the Achterhoek and Twente, in our yard, on the edge of the meadow. In the Gelders Laren you can indulge yourself in a culinary way or enjoy the weekly snack in Markelo. Cycling across the Verwolde estate, with the thick tree, is very close. Hikers can be brought or picked up in consultation.

name: Cuevas Andalucia, rest and tranquility in the Andalusian desert.
description:
Cuevas Andalucia: 
Very quiet private bivouac area in a farm with no neighbors with its own sanitary area within an 8.5 hectare organic olive-growing property with 7 tree-lined 4x4 pitches with roof tents, vans, camper vans, vans, trucks or tents. 3 km from the motorway to Morocco and close to 4x4 routes, mountain biking, hiking and horse riding. We will suggest tracks to visit the region. If you have a smartphone, we will download a free GPS with around fifty unusual activities pre-programmed to discover our beautiful region. Family and friendly atmosphere on the property. No emptying for chemical toilets but toilets are present. Surprising region for its environment remained intact. Shops and supermarkets in the historic town of Baza 7 minutes from the property. Possibility to do your laundry for  4€ / machine and sleep on the entire property in adventure mode if you need space. Property intended for clients who like tranquility. No party allowed. Very good wifi on the property. Dogs accepted if they do not make noise.  A must see !
Electricity supplement of 4€/night to be paid on site

name: Farm campsite near Flensburg on the Baltic Sea
description: Farm camping at the Baltic Sea My camping pitches are on a meadow adjacent to my farm and are perfect for caravans, mobile homes or vans. With a view of the forest and fields, it should be an "oasis of calm" for campers. Power connection, fresh drinking water, toilet, a warm shower and firewood for the grill provide the necessary comfort. Four-legged friends are also very welcome. On a discovery tour My camper place is in Sörup, near the south lake. 18km from the Baltic Sea and 70km from the North Sea. A day trip to Flensburg is definitely recommended and can be easily reached by bike. Visit the Maritime Museum and let your soul dangle on the Baltic Sea. Whether as a family, couple, friends or solo traveler, everyone gets their money's worth here Welcome!

name: Farm campsite near the Utrechtse Heuvelrug
description: Farm camping holiday. Campsite near the Utrechtse Heuvelrug in Odijk (Bunnik) Camping is booming: enjoying nature, the healthy (farmer's) outdoor air. And whether you do it old-school, with a tent under the trees, or comfortably and luxuriously, with the camper or caravan: at our campsite in Bunnik / Odijk you always have a beautiful view. On our quiet camping fields you have a view of the meadow birds and the meadow cows. When you wake up you will see the sun is already rising for a wonderful new day and enjoy breakfast with of course a delicious free-range eggs from our own chickens. We regularly hear that our guests are surprised because it is so beautiful here. come for nothing there are so many guests back at the campsite because they are far from bored. Camping is a real farm experience at our campsite. The camping pitches at our campsite in Odijk are spacious. This means there is sufficient distance between the tents and caravans. The pitches have their own tiled plateau, electricity connection (6 amps), free WiFi on the pitch and well-maintained (heated) sanitary facilities are nearby. Our motorhome pitches are located at the front of the field with 6 amps of electricity, free WiFi and a water tap nearby. We use a maximum size of 6.5 meters for both a camping pitch and a motorhome pitch. You will experience optimal freedom on our tent field for bicycle campers. A special piece of meadow with the ultimate view of the cows and sheep that pass behind your tent. Here you can camp freely with your tent with lots of space, a unique camping experience! Our completely renovated sanitary building (2022) consists of a men's and women's side with shower, toilet, urinal and a washing machine. From our campsite in Odijk near the Utrechtse Heuvelrug and in the middle of the Kromme Rijnstreek you can go in all directions for walking, cycling or good food. Walking along the Utrechtse Heuvelrug, shopping in Utrecht, discovering a picturesque town in Wijk bij Duurstede or cycling along the Forts in Houten. There is plenty to see, do and experience for everyone! Plan a week's holiday in your own country, enjoy camping and discover the unique spots in the region.

name: mini camping / motorhome site view near the beach 2.5km!
description: In addition to our flower bulb company, we have a mini camping view between Julianadorp and Den Helder. we have 20 places suitable for every camping equipment. 2.5 km from the beach, texel is also easy to reach from here

name: REWILD PROJECT
description: Discover a haven of peace where nature welcomes you in tents equipped with all the necessary comforts. Whether you prefer a tipi, a safari tent or a bell tent, our unusual accommodations will take you back to carefree childhood. Enjoy a moment of conviviality with your loved ones while being in harmony with the environment. Free yourself from all the constraints of everyday life and embrace the simplicity of the outdoors. Dream, lose yourself in time and contemplate the stars until sunrise from your equipped tent.

name: Kalissehof presents a quiet meadow between the hills.
description: View of Kemmelberg, Rode Berg and Northern France. Ypres and Poperinge nearby. Walking and cycling routes. Delicious picon in nearby affordable restaurants. Well-equipped convenience store within walking distance. Sheep on site and sheep herding training with border collies. If electricity consumption, billing according to consumption.

name: Hofcamping between the Baltic Sea and Plön
description: Child-friendly courtyard campsite Warm welcome! I offer you two quiet, idyllic pitches with electricity and fresh drinking water for vans, caravans, mobile homes or tents on my romantic Wilhelminian-era rest farm. You stand elevated and partly in the shade of an oak tree in a meadow next to cherry trees with a view of Knicks and willows. This is what you can discover with us: Children are happy about the large trampoline, playing in and by the stream and visiting our curious chickens in the mobile home. In spring, a colorful flock of lambs romp across the adjacent meadows. Happy breakfast eggs can be purchased :) You are only a few steps away from the gently babbling Schwentine. A day trip to the Baltic Sea and the Hanseatic city of Lübeck is always worthwhile.

name: Farm campsite with a natural bathing lake
description: Discover our small, idyllic campsite by the lake, embedded in the unspoiled nature of France. Our unique environment, free from pesticides, offers you an authentic nature experience. Your children can actively participate in the daily animal care and take responsibility for our lovable animals at the lake campsite. Live unforgettable moments immersed in nature at our campsite for tents, campers and caravans.

name: Spend the night between the hot air balloons
description: Rural green place to enjoy. Sky is easily accessible and is located 2.5 km from the A58 on the west side of Tilburg. We are located next to the city forest013 with a unique MTB route of 20 km. It is also a nice environment for hikers. The city center is 8 km away from us. When the weather is nice, a hot air balloon rises in the garden every evening.

name: Farm Koeune
description: Small quiet corner in the middle of farm animals. A brazier corner on the ground where you can spend your evenings with family or friends. You also have to do activities on the farm such as golf or country footgolf. You can camp with us in a tent or mobile home. Ideally by reservation. 100% nature without water and without electricity.

name: Campsite in Occitanie at Lac de la Selve en Aubrac with exceptional views
description: Welcome to Camping en Occitanie, ideally located in an idyllic setting on the shores of Lac de la Selve en Aubrac. Our small campsite is perfectly equipped to accommodate campers in tents, caravans, vans or motorhomes and offers breathtaking views of the lake and breathtaking sunsets. Surrounded by lush forests, our campsite guarantees absolute tranquility, just 5 km from the nearest village. Book now your unforgettable stay at the water's edge at Camping in Occitanie near Lac de la Selve in Aubrac!

name: Vintage car camping in the Upper Palatinate
description: Would you like to go on vacation in the Upper Palatinate? Would you like to explore the area around the beautiful Steinwald in a vintage car? Or would you like to take a look at our vintage car museum at the GRANDLHOF. Then you've come to the right place! We offer a large lot with free walking ducks, electricity and fresh water. We have 3 parking spaces in the garden in front of our vintage car hall with electricity and water connections, as well as an open parking space in front of our house (on the property) as an alternative. WiFi (limited on the property) terrace and our newly built grill kota will inspire you. Outdoor sockets and extension cords are available. As a sanitary facility, there is a small guest bathroom and a guest toilet in the house. These can be used for a fee of €5/day. With the Grillkota there's BBQ in any weather and if you feel like it, you can enjoy our cinema room for €5/day. Watch as many films as you want. Great fun, especially for kids. If you don't feel like making your own breakfast, you can also have breakfast with us. Depending on your taste, coffee, orange juice or cocoa, bread rolls, various spreads are available for €8/person, and if you wish, we can also whip up an organic egg for you. ;-) Adventure tours at the foot of the Steinwald: Krummennaab is a small tranquil place at the foot of the stone forest. Regensburg and Nuremberg are each 100 km away. The Bavarian Forest and the Steinwald with its quiet location and the many bathing lakes invite you to go hiking, mountain biking and swimming. With us it is quiet and decelerated and you can relax. A 70-year-old stock of trees on the west and east side, fruit trees and a 2,700 sqm plot await you. For the kids we have 2 newly created playgrounds in the village - in the immediate vicinity - shopping is possible in 4 large supermarkets in the neighboring village 4km away, and from August there is our new village shop with products from the region, a café and a terrace just a stone's throw away View of the beautiful Bürgerpark. We are vintage car fans and offer you the opportunity to visit our small farm museum. You can also rent one of our classic cars from us and explore the area with it. In the surrounding area there are many hiking and biking opportunities, bathing lakes and shopping miles. We are happy to help you with the planning. We look forward to seeing you! ;-)

name: peace, space and nature between beautiful waters in a rustic polder
description: In the rustic polders of East Flakkee, near the town of Achthuizen, time has stood still and tourism is in its infancy. In daily life we work in (elderly) care. That daily bustle washes off us when we get home. We live in the middle of this special environment in our farmhouse. We have partly set up the land, 1.5 hectares, as a mini camping site for camper, caravan and tent. There are also 2 gypsy wagons for rent. And if you wake up in the morning to the call of the harrier that startles the roe deer while the carp in the creek that meanders past our mini campsite through a nature reserve and potato fields, you will fully experience nature, the peace and the space. One grabs his chair and goes to enjoy the rising sun. The other came by boat to go fishing on one of the large waters and a cooling dip a few minutes from our mini campsite. The accessibility of cities for shopping is good, as is a cultural visit to places such as Willemstad or Zierikzee. And our place is also a good base for beach lovers. In +/- 20 minutes you are on the beaches of the North Sea, without traffic jams!

name: Farm camping near Eisenach in Thuringia
description: Welcome to the Lindigshof! The Lindigshof is located in Thuringia between Bad Salzungen and Eisenach. Our farm is in an idyllic location with an unobstructed view over fields to the forest. A dam is directly opposite. Our idyllic mini campsite with electricity is perfect for a tent, caravan, camper or van. Here you can relax alone or in company by the fire and have a wonderful time. Sanitary facilities with drinking water, warm showers and toilets offer you the necessary comfort. Four-legged friends are also welcome guests What is there to discover with us! Our mini campsite is located directly on the Werra-Suhltal cycle path. Various bike tours with a connection to the Werratalradweg or the Rennsteig are available for you. It is also a suitable starting point for various hikes. For city and culture enthusiasts, a trip to the nearby state capital of Erfurt is always worthwhile.

name: Camping at the farm on the Dokkumer Ee.
description: Come and enjoy the peace, nature and farm life at our farm. We are located in a hamlet in a natural environment in Friesland on the river Dokkumer Ee. There are cows, sheep, horses, chickens and a dog on the farm. We would like to let you enjoy the farm life. You can camp in the 'hôf', a field that borders the cycle path between Leeuwarden and Bartlehiem. From here you have a beautiful view of the river Dokkumer Ee. There is a simple shower, washing facility and a toilet car. The village of Stiens is 4 km away. There is a waterfront restaurant within 1 km. The city of Leeuwarden is 8 km by bike. The departure point of the boat to Ameland is half an hour by car. The area is suitable for multiple activities such as: - To walk - Bicycles - Fishing - Canoeing (2 canoes available) - Swimming (open water) We look forward to seeing you!

name: Eco Nature Campsite Klein Schoor
description: Small eco campsite where nature and people go together. 12 spacious camping spots offer the opportunity to explore the area through the many cycling and walking routes. On the property is a fire pit, swimming pond, outdoor kitchen, compost toilet and much more. Of course there is also a neat toilet room. More than enough for everyone

name: Quiet camping in the green along a river
description: Spacious and easily accessible camping meadow suitable for campers and tents. Idyllic location along a river. Ideal to enjoy the silence and beauty of nature and to swoon in the evening by a lovely campfire!

name: Traun(m)tal Camping
description: Camping on a former farm in Chiemgau. Beautiful parking space on the edge of a herb meadow with mountain views. Our farm is in a quiet location on the outskirts. A stay with us is therefore also ideal if you have children. A shady adventure playground is within easy walking distance. Pets are always welcome, but we ask that you contact us in advance. The local village shop with many local products is only a 5 minute walk away, as is the train station and a bus stop. There are more shops in the neighboring towns of Ruhpolding and Siegsdorf. In the middle of the Chiemsee/Chiemgau holiday region and with the neighboring towns of Ruhpolding, Inzell, Reit im Winkl and the district town of Traunstein, we are very centrally located. The tourist highlights such as Chiemsee, Waginger See, Winklmoosalm-Steinplatte can be reached by car within a few minutes. Likewise, the Chiemgau Alps with many mountain railways and the famous peaks of the Sonntagshorn, Rauschberg and Hochfelln. A mountain tour can also be started directly from the farm on foot or by bike. In the immediate vicinity, many smaller peaks, valleys, paths and bike trails invite you to hike and cycle in untouched nature. There is something for every age and fitness level. In summer, in addition to the many lakes, the newly renovated outdoor pool in Siegsdorf, the Vita-Alpina indoor wave pool in Ruhpolding, also with an outdoor pool, or the natural bathing lake in Inzell offer refreshment. For those who love nature, there is a beautiful natural bathing area on the Traun in the immediate vicinity. In Ruhpolding there is an 18-hole golf course, mini golf and adventure golf, a fairy tale park and a summer toboggan run. Munich, Salzburg, Innsbruck, Berchtesgaden and Rosenheim are easy to reach for a day trip. The transport connection is very good, the A8 Munich-Salzburg motorway is only 5 km away, as is the German Alpine Road. The federal roads in the direction of Berchtesgadener Land, Tyrol and Salzburg are practically on the way. Enjoy the peace and quiet on the pitch and the beautiful view of the mountains. We can give you lots of tips for excursions in the region, even if the weather doesn't play along. Electricity and water are possible on request. We look forward to you!

name: Resthof Camping in Ottenbüttel
description: Wide view over the fields: With us you stand with tent, camper and mobile home parking space on our beautiful rest yard with a wide view over the fields. We offer you an individual toilet and washbasin for your private use. There is also WiFi and electricity. You can reach the bakery, supermarket or the nearest restaurant in just 10 minutes by bike. With us you can take part in one of our handicraft workshops, the Klüter courses. You can find out whether a course is taking place during your stay on our homepage (#klüterkram). For late risers: The farm next door starts work early in the morning. So far, our guests have not been bothered by this. Explore the area: The next (free) bathing pond is in Hohenlockstedt. With the bike you are there in about 25 minutes. After the bathing fun, a visit to the Eisitaliener in the same place is worthwhile. Those who prefer to go to the outdoor pool (or indoor pool in winter) will find what they are looking for in the neighboring small town of Itzehoe. If you are enthusiastic about cycling or hiking tours, you will find what you are looking for in the small Ottenbüttler forest "Halloh" or drive/hike a little further to the beautiful Stormsteich. Other excursion destinations by bike include the renatured clay pit Muldsberg, the old inland lock in Kasenort (with cafe) or the nature reserve inland dunes Nordoe with the adjacent Deckmann'schen Kuhlen. Popular destinations for trips by car are the North or Baltic Seas or the Kiel Canal. Animal lovers will get their money's worth in the Eekholt wildlife park, in the Friedrichskoog seal sanctuary or in the Hagenbeck zoo in Hamburg. We look forward to you. Michael and Sarah

name: Relax, Refresh, Reconnect in the French countryside
description: Discover our 6 hectare estate nestled in the peaceful farmlands of the Creuse in New Aquitaine, France. Stay in our luxuriously appointed guest rooms or Sibleybell tents, ideal for families and couples looking for a countryside break, a relaxing retreat or a stay in nature. Enjoy facilities such as a football/badminton court, play barn, lake, swing and trampolines. Shared outdoor kitchen and convivial meals available. Our rural accommodation also offers a holiday home for two people, a bed and breakfast and space for caravans and tents. Discover the green Creuse, its hills, lakes, castles, historic villages and flea markets. Contact us for advice on excursions and walks in the area. Enjoy an unforgettable stay with your family, as a couple or alone in our charming establishment in New Aquitaine.

name: Farm camping at the Baltic Sea
description: Camping on a farm by the Baltic Sea - Welcome to the Altenhof! We offer you 2-3 pitches for van, caravan or mobile home with electricity, toilet and drinking water. Our farm is conveniently nestled in meadows and is within walking distance to the beach on the Baltic Sea. You are also very welcome to come on holiday on horseback, we offer you guest boxes! Adventure calls! We offer riding lessons and guided rides. Unwind on the beach or take a day trip to the port and state capital of Schleswig-Holstein, Kiel. We look forward to you!

name: La Bassotta: talking about permaculture and climbing
description:
La Bassotta is a villa located in a quiet neighborhood in the middle of Valgandino. 
It's an ideal hub for discovering the province of Bergamo, sightseeing, relaxing, enjoying typical food, hiking and climbing. 

We are just a few minutes from the old village of Gandino (with its Basilica and Museum), 15 minutes from Monte Farno (with its scenic trails) and from the small city of Clusone, 30 minutes from the city of Bergamo, the amazing mountain of Presolana and the Iseo Lake.

If you aspire to an eco-friendly lifestyle, or if you are interested in permaculture, sociocracy and the Transition Towns movement, at our property we can talk about it for a long time...

And if you are a climber, within half an hour you will find dozens of crags, and I can offer you many useful tips...

Available services: there is a small independent and always accessible building with toilet, sink and solar shower (hot water only when it's sunny!). Wi-Fi available near the house, table and chairs under the porch, loungers, electricity in the WC building and under the porch, extension cord, possibility of recharging devices; bus-stop at 300 meters, rail station and Bergamo airport at about 30 minutes by car with transfer possibility.

Possibility of visiting local organic farmers and buying their products.

There is room for a minivan (the entrance gate is 2,40 large). Please consider that the car and van parking is not next to the tent's meadow.

name: Farm camping in the Rhön
description: Welcome to the Rhön! Our farm is located outside of Fladungen, in the middle of the border triangle of Bavaria, Hesse and Thuringia. Are you looking for rest and relaxation? Then you've come to the right place. Sunbathing lawn, barbecue hut, sauna and Kneipp pool - all this awaits you. Our pitches are separated from each other by bushes on the lawn and are 10x7 meters in size. Electricity is available, shower and toilet can be used in the holiday home, a separate supply house for campers is under construction. Would you like to stay on a farm and discover it? Our animals look forward to your visit: We have ponies, alpacas, rabbits, cattle, chickens. You are also welcome to visit the biogas plant, machine halls and stables. Supply from the farm: We have a mill shop (muesli, sausage, cheese, meat, milk, etc.), breakfast buffet, bread roll service, and home-made sourdough bread from our bakery. Our vending machines also offer all sorts of regional delicacies such as ice cream, grilled meat and drinks. Do you want to discover the Rhön? Explore the beautiful landscape with our e-bike rental! We look forward to you!

name: Always a wide view and quiet environment
description: You can relax on this calm, small-scale campsite. There is a fantastic view. The campsite is located behind our monumental farm, with walking and cycling routes directly from the campsite.

name: Green break
description: "Green Timeout": We look forward to welcoming you to our "island". Our garden is located in a quiet colony in Wandlitz and is a wonderful place where you can enjoy your weekend and vacation. There are shops nearby. We can accommodate a maximum of four people with electricity and well water supply. Drinking water, camping furniture and accessories, barbecues, campfires, bicycles, ... many things are possible on request for an additional charge. We are well connected to the public transport network. What you can do here: Embedded in numerous lakes such as the Wandlitzsee, Stolzenhagener See, Liepnitzsee, Rahmer See and Werbellinsee, we are the perfect starting point for hikes, bike tours, city tours and swimming trips. From here you can visit green, historical and current places such as Berlin, the ship lift, wildlife park Schorfheide, Hubertusstock, forest settlement by Erich Honecker and Bogensee Göbbels-Villa.

name: Rural farm camping in Stemwede
description: We live in beautiful 32351 Stemwede. This is in East Westphalia near the beautiful Teuteburg Forest, between the River Weser and Lake Dümmer. We have 2-3 pitches for mobile homes, campers, caravans, tents, etc. A toilet, shower and electricity would be available. Fresh water can also be refilled at any time and waste water can be disposed of. Camping on the farm The farm is rural with many animals such as chickens, horses, donkeys, etc. directly on the Stemweder Berg. With just a few feet you can take beautiful walks either directly in the mountain or in the Diepholzer Moor. On request, our two great donkeys can accompany you on walks. Pony rides can be booked in advance for families with children, but of course also for adults without children. In autumn you can also watch the gathering of the cranes. Here numerous cranes gather on the bog to travel south. The event is simply spectacular, worth seeing and definitely not to be missed. But even in summer you can explore the quiet area by bike and even make a small detour to Lake Dümmer. This can be reached quickly via a nice bicycle network. The Dümmer See offers numerous opportunities to have a small snack, eat an ice cream, play mini golf or simply relax on the small beaches. There are also beautiful cycle paths on the Weser directly on the water, which can be reached quickly by car. There is plenty of space for the evening hours, so that a set of furniture can be set up outside with enough distance and you can also have a barbecue. The nearby shops can be reached in a few minutes by car. If you then forget to get something for Sunday, a nearby gas station with an adjacent supermarket also offers the opportunity to shop on Sundays and public holidays. The price per night does not include water, toilet and shower. If you need this, you can book it. We also offer 60-minute pony rides. Many greetings from the north Anna and Dennis

name: Micro camping between the Frisian lakes
description: Are you looking for peace, space, an unobstructed view and do you want to enjoy the simple farm life? A place where you can escape from the hectic pace of everyday life? Then you are very welcome at our small, active dairy farm located on the Grote Gaastmeer in Southwest Friesland. Advantages of our campspot: - very small scale - you will find peace, space and privacy - there are 40 dairy cows in the meadow that are your closest neighbors on some days - we have a sweet farm dog, cats and a brown laying hen - there are many meadow birds in the area - The cozy Eleven Cities town of Workum is 7 km away. Here you will find several cozy eateries, museums and 2 supermarkets - the farm is located along the Oersetters Pontjesroute Enough to see and experience. We hope to welcome you. Oant Sjen! Martin & Esther

name: Fun and cheerfulness in the polder between the Biesbosch and the Efteling
description: Our mission is to bring joy. We have a nice place that we would like to share with other people! We are almost on the Maas, your view is the dike of the Maas. From here there are beautiful cycling routes to, among other things, the Loonse and Drunense dunes and the Biesbosch. We are in the middle! And the fortified towns of Woudrichem and Heusden are also worth a visit! It is also a beautiful area for walking in the countryside. Efteling is easily accessible by bicycle and car! To increase this cheerfulness, in addition to a beautiful environment, we also have cozy fellow residents that we would like to introduce to you: We have 1 African mountain goat, 2 piglets and a chicken coop with a rooster that likes to be heard during the day. The 2 dogs are also ready to greet you! Joey is our old grandpa who is a bit deaf but really wants to cuddle! And next to that we have Storm who is a big teddy bear and thinks he's a lap dog :) Finally, we have our hunters Josha and Sjimmie (cat) who are responsible for pest control. Mice in particular are a favorite. But you can also come for an inspection as soon as the awning is up :) There is plenty of space for children to discover and play creatively. There is wood everywhere to make huts. We are also located on the old mesh, so there is also plenty to discover on the waterfront. They are also allowed to use the playground. There is, among other things, a playground with a swing and slide, a sandpit and a trampoline! In other words, a cheerful place to enjoy the peace in these troubled times!

name: A stay in the heart of nature surrounded by animals
description: Hello to you, we offer you our 3000 m2 garden including a one hectare pond, a space dedicated to permaculture and a second dedicated to breeding. You will not hesitate to glean some vegetables and fruits in the heart of our vegetable garden The natural aspect of the site is preserved. There are countless birds. Since 2007, a beaver family has built their lodge on the pond. You will undoubtedly be able to observe it during your wanderings in the boat on the pond. We reserve a space for you located away from the house and the street in order to guarantee your privacy and your serenity. We are surrounded by nature in the heart of Fagne-Famenne. We are near a lake, in the countryside. The nature there is lush. You will observe the murins at nightfall. Be lulled by the croaking of green frogs. We will put maps showing the most beautiful hiking routes in our beautiful region. Our donkeys can accompany you on a ride.

name: Campspace in dn Haof
description: Would you like to stay in a park-like natural garden in the outskirts of Meterik? Also a base for walking, cycling (junction route), swimming channel available, nature reserve the peel at about 7 km, forests at about 2 km. Toverland amusement park approx. 8 km. Campsites with a beautiful view over the garden. A "huijskamer" / roof with cozy seats. Add to that the high average of sunshine hours in this corner of the Netherlands...et voila...your outing can't go wrong. With your visit you also contribute to the Hartekind Nederland Foundation.

name: Child-friendly campsite in the Eifel
description: Our micro-campsite in the fairytale Eifel is an absolute insider tip for families with children, hikers, dog lovers and all those who long for peace and relaxation in the idyll. With us you can enjoy the beautiful view over the valley, during the day or during dramatic sunsets. Breathtaking walks and hikes have been set out around our cozy and child-friendly micro-campsite, both in the vicinity and easily conquered as a day trip. After a long day of hiking in the Eifel, we invite you to a warm campfire by our fireplace on our spacious lawn, and the next morning you can strengthen yourself for your next adventure with fresh bread from the bakery and eggs from our chickens. (Insider tip: pick fruit from the tree as provisions!). Your privacy and comfort is of the utmost importance to us, we provide sanitary facilities and invite you to cook in our guest room. A warm welcome!

name: Pure nature - on the edge of the Veldensteiner forest
description: Pure nature on the edge of the Veldenstein Forest: We offer two self-sufficient tent and mobile home pitches with fresh drinking water and electricity for camping: an unfenced meadow next to a small road near Auerbach in the Upper Palatinate ("Hohe Tanne") and our large orchard below our house in Michelfeld in the Upper Palatinate. To experience in the area: We have the perfect starting point for extended day trips in the region. For climbers, the Franconian Jura is not far away.

name: Farm camping in the Eastern Allgäu
description: Camping on a farm in Ostallgäu Our small farm campsite is perfect for camping guests with a tent, van, mobile home or caravan. We also have drinking water and electricity. Feel free to bring your pets and end the evening with a cozy campfire. Our farm is outside the village. This location is characterized by a beautiful, quiet and natural landscape. Excursions in the area With us you are in beautiful Upper Bavaria. Our small farm campsite offers the perfect starting point for long hikes or bike tours. How about a day trip to Mindelheim, Landsberg am Lech or Lake Ammer, for example? Munich is also easily accessible by car and is always worth a visit. Come and have a look, it's worthwhile!

name: Camp with a view of beautiful Filsø
description: Scenic location in the middle of nature. Primitive but with access to toilet/bath, sink, water and electricity.

name: Back-to-Basic camping in our backyard
description: We welcome you in our back-to-basic backyard of about 3000m2, consisting of a large lawn, vegetable garden, trampoline, fruit trees with lots of other greenery around it. In 2021 there was still an old cowshed with lots of concrete around it, but we have now transformed this into a wonderful green grass landscape. Pitch your tent sheltered under the large maple tree behind the shed or in the open field. Look out over the fields of potatoes, onions, beets and grains. Small campervans are also welcome, but there are limited spaces available. (please send a message to see the possibilities). There is also a bathroom with toilet, sink and cold shower. Several well-known supermarkets are about 2 km away. Activities in the area: cycling tours, Basilica of Oudenbosch, Splasj outdoor swimming pool (former Bosbad Hoeven), (Forest) Walking, Hoevense cycling four days (Ascension weekend), Hoeven Live and much more. Our location is also ideal for a day visit to the beach or an outdoor swimming pool/puddle. We are easily accessible by car, bicycle and on foot. In addition, the bus stops in front of the door.

name: Wide open spaces campsite in the Cévennes National Park
description: Discover the Domaine, a campsite in the heart of the Cévennes National Park, on the preserved plateau of the Causse Noir, located 900m above sea level between Montpellier and Millau, famous for its iconic viaduct. Dive into the heart of an almost wild nature and immense spaces where tranquility and serenity reign. Enjoy stunning starry skies, without light pollution. The Domaine offers a variety of accommodation for all tastes and budgets, as well as facilities such as a swimming pool, games, a reception offering tourist information, and in the summer, a small grocery store and a catering point in the evening. Ideally located on a plateau and surrounded by the majestic Tarn, Dourbie and Jonte rivers, our campsite offers unparalleled opportunities for canoeing, swimming and activities by the water, in the heart of the great natural spaces of the Causses & Cévennes. Enjoy the tranquility and calm in this secluded setting, while being strategically positioned to explore the region and admire the magnificent landscapes that await you. Don't miss this unique opportunity to discover the wonders of the Causses & Cévennes! Book now your stay at the Domaine and let yourself be charmed by our exceptional environment, in the heart of the Cévennes National Park.

name: Fifty shades of green, a place for those seeking tranquility
description: Discover our quiet and spacious campsite, located in one of the most beautiful spots of the Haute-Saône. Enjoy large flat areas with a beautiful view and brand new sanitary facilities. There are no frills or children's facilities here. Our ideal location in Colombotte is perfect for outdoor activities such as hiking, cycling, horse riding, motorcycle and car rides. We also offer the possibility to camp with your horse on a part of our terrain that is intended for grazing. If you do not wish to camp, an adjoining B&B is available. With 3 bathrooms for 6 people, our sanitary facilities are cleaned daily and well ventilated. In addition, our dishwashing area is spacious, with two separate sinks. Campers can take advantage of La Tourelle's saltwater pool, ideal for cooling off after a day of outdoor activities. We also offer pitches with electricity (10amp) for a comfortable camping experience. In addition, our fridge freezer in the bathroom makes it easy to store your food and drinks. Book your stay with us now for a peaceful and enjoyable camping experience in an ideal setting for those who want to recharge and enjoy nature.

name: Yoga Eco Farm, 5 min walk from the Mediterranean!
description:
We are a non-profit Yoga Eco Farm based in the Italian town of Otranto.
Following the principles of Yoga and Permaculture, our main goals are regenerating ecosystems, and inspiring people to follow their most uplifting and loving inner voice, raising awareness about eco-conscious and mindful living in a fun inclusive environment.
We are part of a worldwide grass root movement, and your support and participation is key to make a difference!

name: In the heart of Nebrodi, a few steps far from Etna
description:
We live on a mountain and we have 4 hectares of land with hazelnut, apple and other fruit trees. 
You are welcome to camp in our land, we have a lot of quiet and beautiful spots where you can enjoy your stay.
In the surrounding area you have a lot of possibilities to enjoy your free time.
We can provide different spots, depending on your equipment, if you're travelling by car or not.

name: Farm campsite near the Baltic Sea
description: Welcome to the meadow orchard! Here you can experience close-to-nature camping on a former farm near the Flensburg Fjord. Showers, electricity, fresh drinking water, composting toilets and a fireplace provide the necessary comfort. You are in direct contact with goats, sheep and chickens. Four-legged friends are seen guests on this camper place. On a tour of discovery! The Baltic Sea invites you to walk along the beach or to swim, and the beautiful landscape for cycling. Flensburg attracts with its colorful cultural and alternative scene. An organic farm shop is within walking distance. If you are interested, small carving and Wipp turning courses are possible by arrangement.

name: Small-scale green campsite in the middle of the Blauwestad water area
description: The camping site is a nature camping site, ie a small-scale green camping site with peace and quiet and affiliated with De Groene Koepel. The Green Book (€ 15.95) serves as proof of membership and is available at the campsite in addition to De Groene Koepel. The campsite has 15 spacious camping pitches, including two paved camper spots. The campsite is located in the middle of the Blauwestad, a lake area of 800 hectares, with plenty of opportunities for various water sports. The area, the Oldambt, is a wide landscape with the characteristic Oldambtster farms and is ideal for walking and cycling. A campfire is possible in consultation. Also breakfast service and vegetables (unsprayed) from our own garden. Lots of privacy between beautiful plants. Bad weather facility, with fridge, outdoor seating and possibility for campfire.

name: Camping La Vaugelette - dans la Drôme aux portes du Vercors
description:
Découvrez le Camping de Montclar-sur-Gervanne, un havre de paix en Drôme à l'orée du Parc Naturel du Vercors. À 15 min de Crest, profitez d'un séjour au cœur de paysages époustouflants, avec rivière et piscine pour vous rafraîchir en été. Optez pour un hébergement unique : roulottes, tipis, mini-maisons, tentes lodges avec ou sans sanitaires, tous nichés dans un cadre boisé et relaxant.

Vivez des moments inoubliables en famille au Camping : baignade dans la rivière Gervanne, détente sur ses rives, et rafraîchissement dans notre piscine. Explorez les vignobles et pistes de ski en automne et hiver, puis dégustez de savoureux plats dans notre bar-restaurant.

Attention : entrée étroite, pas de camping-cars de plus de 7 mètres. Réservez dès maintenant votre séjour paisible au Camping Montclar-sur-Gervanne et découvrez les merveilles de la Drôme !

name: Countryside location near a pond
description: Come and enjoy a calm and simple family holiday at our campsite in Vendée, located in the heart of nature. Discover our many activities such as the visit of the farm, the swimming pool, the fishing and the games on site. We also offer the loan of bicycles to explore the surroundings of this rural tourism in Loire-Atlantique. Book your accommodation in Pays de la Loire now for an authentic camping experience in the countryside!

name: inspiring garden with a view of the lake
description: our garden is an inspiring adventurous place. a large vegetable garden, a campfire place, a view of the lake, tree house, sauna and a house on wheels. we have an outside toilet, a water point and electricity for our guests. and all that a stone's throw from supermarket and train station.

name: Enjoy the peace, space, nature and the panoramic view.
description: You can see the sun rise and set here. Moreover, it is possible to see for miles from your lazy camping chair. With a little patience you can spot deer and maybe even a fox in the distance. Pitch your tent behind a hedge and out of the wind, right on an open field. It has a certain charm to watch the squirrels and pheasants walk around you in peace and quiet. Hospitable, comfortable, tranquility and space. That characterizes our Campspace in the beautiful, but still undiscovered Groningen country. Enjoy the beautiful view, the spacious pitches and our excellent sanitary facilities.

name: Domaine la Chabanne campsite
description: It is in the heart of the Montagne Bourbonnaise that Gérard and Nikè welcome you to their domain. We offer you our family campsite located about 7 km from Châtel-Montagne. Surrounded by forest and fields, our campsite will suit families, nature lovers and outdoor sports activities. The campsite consists of 17 spacious pitches, 8 lodge tents, 6 of which have private sanitary facilities. plus 3 unusual luxurious dome type accommodation. Electricity is accessible to all. Hot showers, individual sinks, toilets and the baby area are available at all times. On our 2 hectare site you will find an indoor swimming pool, a petanque court, ping-pong tables and a playground for children. In our small restaurant with covered terrace, we offer pizzas, quiches, salads, steak frites. Every morning, breads, croissants and pain au chocolat are baked on site. During the week, sometimes, we organize barbecue evenings or ham on the spit.

name: base for fun bike rides
description: Welcome! We offer a basic camping spot in the back part of our large garden, which is fairly separated from the front part that we use. Access to outdoor toilet, electricity, BBQ, sofa and primitive outdoor kitchen (not very clean because it is outside, but nice to shelter when it rains or is very hot). Water through tap on the wall. You can eat the eggs of the chickens. We also have trampoline and swimming pool (unheated).

name: Quiet camping on a river in beautiful surroundings
description: Escape the crowds and enjoy the tranquility of our secluded camping meadow in the middle of nature. With us you can camp back to basics with your tent, caravan or van and be completely off-grid. With a limited number of guests you can enjoy the silence and the beautiful starry sky. Choose your own spot on our site, in the meadow or along the stream. Enjoy almost wild camping, but with the luxury of an outdoor toilet and fire bowl with firewood. For nature lovers who love comfort and luxury, we also offer a fully equipped Glamping tent. Discover the area with the many cycling and walking routes nearby, and visit the Achelse Kluis. Use our Campspace and experience the ultimate camping experience in Pelt. Book your stay now and enjoy the peace and nature, together with your family and friends! Activities in the area: Dommel afvaart, curling balls, bicycle rental, bicycle package "Happen and stairs in Pelt".

name: La Maison du Bonheur - Outdoor campsite in the Périgord Vert in the Dordogne
description: Located in Dordogne, in New Aquitaine, the Maison du Bonheur campsite in the heart of Périgord Vert offers an exceptional and peaceful natural setting for an unforgettable holiday. In the heart of the French countryside, this campsite offers spacious pitches for tents, caravans and motorhomes, as well as authentic and warm trailers. Nature lovers will appreciate the nearby hiking trails, as well as the fishing, canoeing and cycling opportunities in the surrounding area. Within this green setting, you can also enjoy the presence of various animals that move freely, adding a touch of authenticity and friendliness to your stay. By staying at this campsite in the Dordogne, you will be ideally located to explore the region and its historical and cultural sites, such as the caves of Lascaux, the medieval town of Sarlat, and the many castles and picturesque villages that dot the landscape. Whether you are looking for a family getaway, a romantic stay or an adventure with friends, this outdoor campsite offers you an authentic experience of New Aquitaine.

name: Wonderful free space, far outside the village of Stokkum.
description: A great location in the middle of nature near a former farm near the village of Stokkum. It is a place where there are no designated camping places, but where you choose a place that you like. Pretty back to basic, there are no toilet facilities and showers so being self-sufficient is recommended. That makes this place a unique place to stay. Stokkum is located in the middle of the Montferland in the east of the country. A great nature, forest but also floodplains and dikes where you can enjoy walking or cycling. Many cycling, hiking and mountain biking trails! Many villages in the area with a rich history and the associated historic buildings. There is a lot of wildlife to see, including roe deer, buzzards, many other species of birds and even the fox and badger regularly walk through our meadow! Our own chickens and rooster scratch around the yard, the eggs of which are free to use.

name: Farm camping in the Allgäu
description: Our farm campsite is located in the middle of the Allgäu and offers everything a nature-loving camper with a caravan or van could wish for. Electricity and drinking water are available. Since our dairy farm is run full-time, you and your children also have the opportunity to experience agriculture up close and at its best. On a journey of discovery between Munich and Lake Constance On our farm you can decide for yourself whether you want to relax between fruit trees and enjoy the unobstructed mountain view, or whether you prefer to use the wide range of leisure and local recreation offers in the immediate vicinity. Our farm is close to two villages and is the perfect starting point to discover the Allgäu. We look forward to your visit!

name: Quiet campsite between sea and mountains in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur
description: Located in the heart of a magnificent park of century-old oak trees, our campsite in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur is a real haven of peace and tranquility for outdoor holidays by the sea and in the mountains. Enjoy a stay on a human scale in a little corner of paradise, ideal for recharging your batteries and resting surrounded by nature. Discover our family accommodation and outdoor activities such as mountain hiking or nautical activities for an unforgettable holiday. Book now and live a unique camping experience combining sea and mountains in a place full of charm.

name: CamperCamping Alpedrinha
description: Do you want to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life? The need to withdraw into nature? Then this is the perfect place. Between the fruit trees and Aloe vera it is wonderful to enjoy with a view of the Serra da Gardunha. Alpedrinha is a historic village in the center of Portugal with countless hiking trails, viewpoints and day beaches to cool off in the summer. This place is close to Serra da Estrela, Monsanta, Penha Garcia and Fundao this is the cherry region of Portugal. A spacious and safe place with a beautiful sunset to disconnect from the busy world.

name: mini campsite near Weerribben
description: A friendly farm campsite with rural views. From the campsite you can easily walk into the nature reserve or cycle. We have gypsy wagons and safari tents that can be rented. With a caravan, camper, camper bus or tent you are most welcome. Our campsite is located near the Rottige Meente nature reserve and the Weerribben. We have free wifi and hot water in the showers is free. the sanitary building has just been renovated. The campsite is surrounded by farmlands, we have many fruit trees and some hobby animals sheep, goats, calves and 2 pigs. There are many cycling and walking routes to choose from from the campsite. Also think of wonderful trips to Blokzijl, or Giethoorn and in Lemmer you can visit the UNESCO woudagemaal. There is also a tearoom at the campsite for delicious cakes, coffee, high tea or lunch.

name: Farm camping in the Teutoburg Forest
description: Welcome to the Menzelhof! We offer child-friendly nature camping on the farm for mobile homes, trailers, tents and vans. Who we are? We are two adults, two children and a small dachshund. Make yourself comfortable on our paved courtyard or our orchard. There is enough space to maneuver. If required, we also offer you the use of electricity and charge a flat rate of 4 €/day for this. Four-legged friends are welcome guests with us. Camping in the Teutoburg Forest - that's what you can experience with us: Whether you are passing through or just want to get out for a weekend and enjoy the sights of the Osnabrück region - with us you have an optimal starting point. You can quickly get to Osnabrück or explore the spa towns of Bad Rothenfelde, Bad Laer or Bad Iburg by bike. Worth it! And if the children still have energy after a long bike ride, they can let off steam in our large garden on the swings, playhouses or the cable car. The Teutoburg Forest is only 200m away.

name: Camping on the farm in a calm and flowery place!
description: Discover camping in the Somme, an optimal relaxation break during your trip. Enjoy nature and calm holidays 10 minutes from Péronne (80) and Saint Quentin (02), in a green park of 6500 m2 offering 15 spacious pitches. Live a unique experience in the heart of nature with your motorhome or caravan in our Somme campsite, whether in autumn or winter! Explore the Somme Valley and the captivating history of the region by staying at our campsite. Discover the historical battlefields, the circuit of remembrance and the museum of Saint Quentin. Roam freely in the picturesque countryside of the Somme whatever the season. Get away from everyday life in Vraignes-En-Vermandois in our campsite in the Somme and enjoy a peaceful holiday on the farm, surrounded by generous spaces and flowers according to the seasons. Benefit from modern facilities and well-equipped sanitary facilities, including showers, toilets, kitchenette and washing machine. Also enjoy free Wi-Fi and delicious breads and pastries every morning at our Somme campsite. Come and discover the Somme valley, the history of the region, visit the battlefields, the circuit of remembrance, the museum of Saint Quentin or simply take a walk in our beautiful countryside in all seasons. Come and forget your everyday life, in Vraignes-En-Vermandois, you can enjoy a quiet farm holiday in vast spaces delicately flowered throughout the seasons... You will have largely proportioned equipment and sanitary facilities: showers, toilets, kitchen area, washing machine, electricity. You will also have WiFi and bread and pastries every morning.

name: Sleep&Feel sLOVEnian Istria
description: In Slovenian Istria, 15 minutes drive from the centre of Koper, is the Kozlovi? familys tourist accommodation. Set in a peaceful location in the middle of the countryside, with stunning views of the sea and surrounding nature. We offer camping space to set tent on your own, park your own car or van, or you can decide to sleep in our tent or you can choose the double rooms, as well as bigger rooms, apartments and small holiday houses - glamping. We are much more then an ordinary accommodation, we like to give you tips what to do and where to go, we enjoy when you have fun. We prepare delicious Istrian breakfast prepared only by local producers and included in the price you get also 5 local experiences!

name: Organic farm stay in Mountain retreat in Paradise!
description:
Follow us on instagram @thevalleyitaly and @fruitarianfarmer
Wild nature, uncontaminated, so much to explore, that smell of fresh clean air that is rare these days and nights so silent all you can hear is the crickets. Feel free to come and go as you please there is so much to explore in the areas near by. 

This is a tent space on private land where you will have privacy. You can bring your own or we can rent you a tent for an added extra prepared lovingly with clean bedding, towels and organic toiletries. We are 4 paws friendly bring along your animal friend!
Most importantly if you want to enjoy this wild glamping experience without giving up on your home comforts, we happily offer the preparation of a lovely double bed with fresh bedding, cozy blankets, clean towels and eco soaps. (Extra price)

Perfect for singles, couples or small group of friends to escape the rest of the world and get back to nature. The surrounding area is spacious, full of nature, wild medicinal herbs and plants.

There is also all natural bathroom zone complete with eco toilet/ shower and sink with eco soaps. There is water to use for washing, food preparation and an eco compost heap for any food scraps.

If you want to completely RELAX, avoid all cooking and be pampered, let us take care of you. Enjoy some delicious home cooked, 100% organic meals. All freshly picked from our gardens the same day, brought directly to you, to enjoy under the stars!

From farm to plate, come and pick your meal! (We cater to all tastes/diets) We are proud to share our passion for organic farming and good authentic food. We produce our own olive oil, fruits, olives, vegetables, wine, flour and my father makes goats cheese and other traditional Italian delicacies that are rare to find! Optional Meal packages avaliable extra price just ask for info.

Don't have a torch? Gas stove cooker or even a tent? Rental options are avaliable for guests! 

Lastly you are more than welcome to come and VISIT US on our farm, meet the animals, see our organic gardens, come taste our amazing food, do some yoga with us and learn our artisan willow weaving and lot's more!

name: On the meadow in Erbswiesen
description: Hello dear campers, with us you stand directly on our fruit tree meadow (well, there is also a nut tree) in the middle of fields and only a stone's throw away from the forest. 🌳 Located almost in the middle of Germany and only two minutes away from the Autobahn (BAB7, exit no. 100, Gramschatzer Wald), the site is perfectly suited as a stopover solution for all travelers passing through. The journey is via a paved dirt road (coming from the autobahn, turn right just before the sign for Erbshausen-Sulzwiesen). It is about 300 meters to the village. Also within walking distance are: - our own sheep pen in about 100m - Alpaca enclosure (guided tours bookable) approx. 500m - Ostrich farm about 900m - Fallow deer enclosure approx. 1000m - Barefoot path about 700m In the area you will also find: - Restaurant with beer garden approx. 3km (Hubertushof Fährbrück) - Pilgrimage church in Fährbrück - Forest adventure center Einsiedel with beer garden and climbing garden approx. 4km - Autohof with Shell petrol station approx. 600m (incl. shop and restaurant with terrace and toilet (use 1€)) - Motorway chapel (approx. 500m) We look forward to seeing you :)

name: Organic farm with active agriculture
description: Our beautiful organic farm offers pitches on the nearby meadow with breathtaking views Panoramic view. We offer our guests at the farm: - 1 heated shower/toilet - Possibility of rinsing with hot water - Washing machine for a fee

name: Forest camping with a private pond near the North Sea coast
description: We warmly welcome you to our micro campsite with a private pond. With us you can enjoy nature in the forest, relax at the lake or swim in the cool water. With us you are independent and can enjoy your time in peace and slow down. Our property offers a short hike through the forest and many other opportunities for hikes and long bike rides in the area. Whether dog lover, hiker, cyclist or water rat - with us everyone gets their money's worth. It drives you to the North Sea coast? No problem, Cuxhaven and Bremerhaven can be reached quickly by car. How about a visit to the Bremerhaven lighthouse or the German Maritime Museum? The possibilities are limitless. We can discuss everything and look forward to seeing you! - Kathrin, Vera, Andrea and our dog Yoko.

name: Mas Tres Puig
description: Big Area to Camp 20 hct. Like a farm, we have animals: donkeys, chickens, dogs, cats and a big organic garden. We produce and sell organic vegetables. Great place to camp with families or big groups. Placed at 15 km to the Costa Brava beaches ( Roses, Llançà, 25km Cadaqués).We are in the middle of three natural parks (Cap de Creus, Aiguamolls Emprodà, PNIN Albera) in a region full of megalhitic monuments and middle edge emplacements ( Peralada, Sant Pera de Rodes, Sant Quirze de Colera). And at 20km from Figueres and the Dalí's Museum. Gran Area de Campamento 20 hct.

name: Rittergut Positz - casual time out under the meadow orchard or by the lake
description: The Positz manor is much more than a historic four-sided farm with a manor house, gatehouse and various barn buildings that has grown over the centuries. The imposing appearance of the fortified, almost monastery-like building and the secluded location - idyllic between meadows, forests and ponds, make it unmistakable. Perhaps it is the longing in our high-tech world for authentic and natural things that make this place so beautiful and relaxing. The spirit of past centuries blows here! With us you can leave everyday life behind you from the very first moment and can do everything that makes a successful holiday: be active and relax, have space for yourself and time for each other. Lovingly designed details such as the arcade and small romantic seating areas conjure up a cozy atmosphere.

name: Campsite Weißenthalsmühle in northern Hesse
description: Relax in the middle of the forest: We are a beautiful small campsite with electricity and water connection in the Grimm home of northern Hesse, located in a small forest directly on the Ems. There are pitches for tourist and long-term campers, as well as two pretty little tiny houses for overnight stays. Sanitary facilities with warm showers, warm water and toilets provide the necessary comfort. We also run a small kiosk with a beer garden. To discover in the area: Our campsite has a direct connection to the hiking and biking trails in the Habichtswald Nature Park. Hike, for example, around the fish ponds - Engels Ruh round from Niedenstein or enjoy the view from the Bilstein - basalt formation on the Bensberg round from Niedenstein. Welcome!

name: Experience the joy of the country side
description: Near the Kagerplassen, in the middle of 't Groene Hart, near city center Leiden, is our paradise piece of land on the dike. At the end of the dike you can rent a (sailing) boat. The area is also perfect for a walking or cycling trip. In ten minutes cycling or driving, you are in the beautiful historic center of Leiden; the birthplace of the famous Dutch painter Rembrandt van Rijn. There are many wonderful museums and lovely restaurants in Leiden. At our property you can camp in the shade, between the sheep or in the apple orchard: you can choose your own spot and if desired we mow the grass for you. You have some sweet neighbors with our sheep, pigs and chickens. Tell us what you are up for: volleyball, go-karting, tomato picking or a campfire? In case you would like to invite any friends or family we would appreciate if you discuss with us before hand.

name: Always a quiet place, near the forest, near the horses
description: You can always go here with your motorhome, tent or caravan. Electricity is available with the camper or caravan. If you don't have a place to sleep yourself, we have tents and a caravan available. Use of shower toilet is of course possible. The toilet and shower are only for the guests, so you do not have to enter the house. Water and electricity also available.. One can always go!. Are horses and other animals present, so a beautiful view!

name: Farm camping in the Teutoburg Forest
description: Welcome to the Menzelhof! We offer child-friendly nature camping on the farm for mobile homes, trailers, tents and vans. Who we are? We are two adults, two children and a small dachshund. Make yourself comfortable on our paved courtyard or our orchard. There is enough space to maneuver. If required, we also offer you the use of electricity and charge a flat rate of 4 €/day for this. Four-legged friends are welcome guests with us. Camping in the Teutoburg Forest - that's what you can experience with us: Whether you are passing through or just want to get out for a weekend and enjoy the sights of the Osnabrück region - with us you have an optimal starting point. You can quickly get to Osnabrück or explore the spa towns of Bad Rothenfelde, Bad Laer or Bad Iburg by bike. Worth it! And if the children still have energy after a long bike ride, they can let off steam in our large garden on the swings, playhouses or the cable car. The Teutoburg Forest is only 200m away.

name: Camping in the yard of a farmhouse in the fruit orchard
description: Enjoy the wide view with lambs and cows 100 meters away, spot the lighthouses of the Wadden Islands in the evening, swim in the Elfstedenvaart, beautiful sunrise / sunset. Natural location, simple facilities, small-scale but spacious. We like to let more people enjoy our beautiful place located on the Elfstedenvaart between Harlingen and Leeuwarden. An ideal base for making all kinds of trips from here. We are not a real campsite. You can choose a spot upon arrival. The chickens and cat Mormel will welcome you. For the first time this year, a furnished glamping tent in a beautiful spot in the orchard. There is 1 spot for a small campervan and 3 spots for tents in the fruit orchard. The basic “WC, sink and a cold “shower” is there. An additional fee is charged for the use of electricity. Depending on the period, fruit, vegetables and/or herbs are for sale, with a cash box next to it. In Franeker there are supermarkets, (pastry) bakers, butchers, nice fashion shops. A small market on Wednesdays and Saturdays. Don't forget to visit the world famous Planetarium. 10 minutes from Harlingen, 20 minutes to Leeuwarden, If you are on your way to one of the Wadden Islands, it is an ideal stop to spend the night 1 day in advance.

name: Lovely camping in peace and quiet in a beautiful environment.
description: Quiet campsite Occitanie - Domaine Troteligotte : Space, Charm & Nature in the heart of the Lot, South West France Discover our beautiful Lot campsite, Domaine Troteligotte, a spacious and peaceful retreat nestled in a beautiful setting in Occitania, in the heart of South West France. With its 6 spacious pitches spread over 2 hectares, our nature campsite Lot offers you a quiet and cozy stay for an outdoor holiday in Occitania. Enjoy the freedom of unmarked pitches to choose the ideal place to relax in this peaceful campsite in Occitanie. Just 7 km from the charming village of Prayssac, you will have access to all the amenities you need to enjoy your stay, such as restaurants, supermarkets and various shops. Enjoy an unforgettable experience and recharge your batteries during your peaceful stay in the southwest of France at Camping Domaine Troteligotte, near Prayssac.

name: Hofcamping in the beautiful Münsterland
description: Camping on a former farm in Münsterland Hof Brüggemann is located in the middle of the beautiful Münsterland. The farm is located in the gold village of Hoetmar​,​ a district of the well-known horse town of Warendorf. Children and dogs are of course very welcome. There is no leash obligation! With electricity and fresh drinking water, this camper place provides the necessary rest and relaxation. On a journey of discovery in the Münsterland Warendorf is the equestrian metropolis and internationally known for its stallion parades. Anyone who loves romantic city centers, likes cycling or horseback riding is in the best of hands here. Our farm is the ideal starting point for beautiful bike tours or walks. Rest guaranteed 🙂 Welcome!

name: Special overnight stay in straw, in a covered wagon or at the farm campsite
description: At our farm campsite you can camp like in the old days. The pure nature camping experience where 'nothing is necessary and everything is possible'. At our farm campsite, we combine simplicity, nature and freedom with friendly and cheerful hospitality. Distributed over our entire site of more than 1.7 ha. we have 15 spacious camping spots: beautiful places with sun and a fantastic view, some sheltered spots with sun and shade and when the orchard is free, you have a fantastic place with a small tent. Find the most beautiful spot and place the tent and/or caravan as you prefer. If you'd rather not have to worry about all kinds of stuff, but still want to enjoy the beautiful Groningen countryside, choose one of our covered wagons. Or are you more of a glamping type - bed is ready and made, and no worries about a packed car? Then the straw igloo (part of the straw hotel) is a pleasant and adventurous solution. In addition to a beautiful camping spot, you can make use of our range of activities. We work together with various locals and companies in the region. Feel free to ask about the possibilities.

name: Fishing and siesta
description: Come and recharge your batteries surrounded by nature in our peaceful and quiet campsite in Liencourt in Hauts-de-France, ideal for relaxation, fishing, hiking and outdoor activities. Take advantage of an exceptional natural setting to relax in complete peace of mind.

name: Spacious garden within walking distance of the beach and sea.
description: Beinvenue chez nous. Welcome. I am Anais and I have 3 children. Of which 1 boy is still in the house. We also have 1 cat, 1 large dog and chickens. I enjoy getting to know and meeting new people. There is always something to do in our spacious garden within the city of Ostend (Mariakerke) The location is an 18-minute walk from the sea. You sleep in an authentic environment, the horse stables that used to be used for horse races Ostend. All amenities and leisure facilities are accessible within a radius of 850m. Bakery, shops, restaurant, swimming pool,... Over the door walking path, bike path, playground. 3 charging stations for electric vehicles within a radius of 500 m. We also put a refrigerator and a dry room at your disposal . Rainwater is provided. Anais

name: Riverside retreat in superb location
description:
Set in a 120ft garden of a family home in a beautiful location on the banks of the River Thames, in the historic town of Egham. Within a mile of main line train and bus services to London / Windsor / Ascot / Reading. Less than 10 minutes drive to the front door of Heathrow. Local attractions include Windsor Castle, Legoland, Thorpe Park, Hampton Court and Windsor Great Park, as well as the Runnemede flats (where King John signed Magna Carta), near the Royal Airforce and John F Kennedy memorials, and close to Savill Gardens. Easy access to/from M3/M4/M25/M40/A30, and extremely easy to find. On the towpath of the Thames - beautiful walks from the doorstep. Main shopping centre (Staines) less than 1 mile away.

Family rates negotiable.

Facilities: Toilets / Hot Water / BBQ / Wireless Internet / Powerpoints - all for a reasonable degree of use - are included.

Additional facilities (Dedicated fridge / Microwave / laundry etc.) offered as chargable services, subject to availability.

Transport can be provided subject to availability and negotiation.

name: Nature camping near the Mecklenburg Lake District
description: Our small campsite is located directly on the river in the middle of the most beautiful Mecklenburg nature near the Mecklenburg Lake District and is ideal for guests who are looking for a quiet, natural and relaxed place in the countryside for their bus or tent. Electricity, gas, sanitary facilities with warm showers or a covered kitchen - you will find what you are looking for with us. We offer you a sunny meadow with a small harbor bar, a cool, shady forest and you can jump directly into the Elde to swim. Or how about a canoe tour on the water? You can rent canoes, SUPs or bicycles from us for your little bike tour through the woods and fields. Is there a desire for more culture? No problem, the beautiful state capital of Schwerin is easily accessible by car. Arrival on the day of booking from 3 p.m. We warmly welcome you!

name: Vesterhede tent and motorhome pitch
description: For tenters: Sleep in tents wherever you want in our beautiful nature. We offer accommodation in nature with access to fine facilities, and you choose where you want to pitch your tent - whether it should be close to our facilities, in our small orchard or perhaps in the old plantation. Access to the facilities in LOasen Vesterhede. For campers: Our motorhome pitch is arranged in connection with LOasen Vesterhede with access to fine facilities and beautiful nature. To everyone: Very child-friendly with many good activity opportunities for the children. You are very welcome to go for a walk on our landscaped footpaths. Here you walk along the fields, come through small beautiful small habitats, the old plantation or maybe around our small lakes. Really rich opportunity to enjoy our beautiful flora and fauna. Access to shower and toilet as well as use of electricity and water are incl. in the price (except electricity for electric cars). You are also very welcome to use our guest kitchen and dining room if you need it. Free WiFi inside. Possibility of using washing machine and dryer for a fee. Free use of fire place with firewood, pans and puff pastry sticks.

name: Quiet natural campsite near the Wadden Sea
description: Just 600 km from the Netherlands, we welcome you to our quiet and sheltered nature campsite on the edge of the Wadden Sea National Park in southwest Denmark. Just 20 minutes from the Wadden island of Rømø with the widest sandy beach in Northern Europe. The site is located in beautiful Marskland with its rich bird life, a paradise for bird watchers, walkers and cyclists, not far from the historic towns of Tønder, Møgeltønder and Ribe. Enjoy the peace, space and nature with us! We speak Dutch!

name: On the border at the farm, waking up with the cows
description: We have a number of very spacious pitches on our farm for tent, caravan, camper or van. Enjoy the owls at night, wake up with the cows. Baarle Nassau, the most unusual village in the world with the most enclaves. Lots of cycling opportunities and history It is possible to participate in milking or calf feeding. There is plenty to do in the area. Swimming near the sand in Alphen, candle museum, discover the borders of Baarle with a guide, cycle along t Bels line, many chapels and much more. The places around the company can be supplied with electricity and water. If you opt for the camping pitch at the back of the land, you opt for real back to nature. There is no electricity and water available here. Enjoy the peace around you, the wide view and the rising and setting sun Fresh bread rolls can be ordered every Sunday morning, which we get fresh from the bakery. A delicious breakfast can also be provided at an additional cost Emptying of the mobile toilet is only permitted if no toilet paper and cleaning agents, etc. have been used. Dogs are not allowed. Smoking is only allowed on camping pitch due to fire hazard. We have an evening rest at our company from 9 pm.

name: Pure nature in the middle of the forest near Trier
description: Forest camping in the North Palatinate mountains Anyone who loves the peace and quiet of nature and campfire romance will get their money's worth here. Our pitch is ideal for tents, caravans, vans or mobile homes. Cozy up around a campfire at the picnic table. Pets are also allowed. Explore the Palatinate mountains on foot or by mountain bike, or simply enjoy the peace and fresh air of the forest.

name: BIO Meadow Pitch Organic
description: Family-run farm with lots of space and tranquility

name: Private camping in the Dohrener mini forest
description: Idyllic private camping area in the middle of a quiet little village. If you want to set up your camper or caravan centrally but relaxed, between fir trees and fruit trees, you've come to the right place. We are a 3-generation household and look forward to our guests. The two parking spaces are located at the rear of a large property - in the middle of the small village of Dohren. The parking spaces can be reached directly via a quiet side street. The property is completely fenced. The pitches are surrounded by a small pine forest and some fruit trees. The ground is a mixture of moss and lawn - very pleasant to walk barefoot. Well and drinking water are available and included. Unfortunately, we cannot offer toilets and showers. Barbecue is possible with us. A grill can be provided. Electricity is available and is billed on top per day. Since there are no shops in town, we offer a few basic foods in case of an emergency. We are at the gates of Hamburg and in the immediate vicinity of the Lüneburg Heath. In every season of the year, nature in the Lüneburg Heath provides a special spectacle. Great sunrises in spring, the cotton grass bloom in May, the heather bloom in summer, the fog over the moors in autumn, or the dark green junipers in the snow heather in winter. The Lüneburg Heath is always worth a trip and the excursion destinations are numerous. - Carriage rides in the Lüneburg Heath (from Undeloh) - Black Mountains Wildlife Park (Rosengarten) - Lüneburg Heath Wildlife Park (Nindorf-Hanstedt) - Treetop path in the Lüneburg wildlife park (Nindorf-Hanstedt) - Barefoot Park (Egestorf) - Natural swimming pool in the Egestorf barefoot park - Outdoor swimming pool (Tostedt, Hollenstedt) - Lauenbrück country park - Various hiking trails and small excursion destinations: Heidschnuckenweg, Brunsberg, Büsenbachtal, Wilseder Berg, Tiste Bauernmoor Dohren itself also provides the only Bundesliga baseball team based in a village. The Dohren Wild Farmers play their home games just a 10-minute walk from us. Entry under 10 euros. Dohren is not far from Hamburg - reachable with "Der Metronom" within 30 minutes. The regional train stops in Tostedt - about 4km from Dohren. In Tostedt there are also all the necessary shops as well as a bakery, post office, ice cream parlor, drugstore, butcher, etc. There is a small market on Tuesday and Friday.

name: Farm camping in the Altmühltal
description: Camping on a farm in Bavaria Welcome, you can spend the night on my farm in our large orchard. If the apples and plums are ripe, you are welcome to help yourself. The garden is on a road, but it is not very busy. You stand in our orchard on a gravel surface, or alternatively with the tent on the grass. Electricity is not always available. What there is to experience in the Altmühltal Visit the beer garden in the neighboring village, which is easy to reach by bike (approx. 3 km). You can feed the deer in the deer park directly opposite your pitch. Insider tip from us? Canoeing on the Altmühl (the slowest river in Germany) is a lot of fun. Otherwise there are many great hiking routes in the area. Welcome!

name: Quiet place in the countryside near the dam and the beach
description: We offer a cozy mobile home bell tent and pitches in the beautiful village of Graça. It is quiet and has plenty of space to relax, hike, swim or just walk in the woods. There is much to discover in the surrounding villages. Such as water sports, hiking tours, cycling and much more. **Since we are under construction and there are still a few blemishes here and there, the prices are cheaper**

name: Nature campsite with swimming lake
description: Discover Camping La Brugère, an authentic nature campsite in New Aquitaine, located in the heart of the picturesque Dordogne. This campsite with private swimming lake offers a peaceful retreat at the end of a quiet road and invites you to relax in a protected environment, without barriers or flags. As an ecological campsite in the Dordogne, our commitment to sustainability is evident in our waste management policy and our support for ecological mobility. In high season, enjoy pizzas baked in a traditional wood oven and take advantage of our bread delivery service, a solution for a natural holiday in Nouvelle-Aquitaine, reducing the number of trips to the bakery. Whether you are a walker or a mountain biker, the Dordogne, with its outdoor accommodation, is full of opportunities to explore. Discover the many attractions of this unique region from the comfort of our eco-friendly campsite.

name: Camping Meet Must
description: Camping is a place to relax, enjoy and share new experiences. We have many different fields with spacious places, and a canteen as a common living room. Make use of the jeu de boules court or fishing pond. And maybe there's some fruit in the food forest.

name: Sheltered lawn in the yard of a farm in the IJsseldelta on the Kampereiland
description: You can pitch your tent or caravan on spacious pitches in the yard of our farm in the middle of the endless green. Kampereiland is located in the IJsseldelta, it is very quiet here, 7 km from the city of Kampen and on the other side the Noordoostpolder. There is a general power supply. The unique "sanitary building" is equipped with a toilet and shower and a washing-up area, completely intertwined with nature, and self-built, from wood and recycled materials. Dogs are allowed if kept on a leash! Tips for an outing: -World Heritage “Schokland” -Day Urk -Visit to Nagele and the museum house in Nagele - Day of camping -Cruise from Kampen -Day in Zwolle -Cycling around Ketelmeer or around Zwartemeer

name: Dans le Cantal en campagne entouré de champs  dans un petit hameau
description:
Discover our charming peaceful hamlet "Péruéjouls" in the Cantal, surrounded by vast farmfields, just 10 minutes from Aurillac. Our property of 5000 m2, including 2000 m2 dedicated to the campsite, offers you an idyllic stay in the heart of Auvergne.

Staying with us, you can enjoy fresh products from our farm, such as milk, cheese and butter, all made by the local producer.
