Our campsite is ideally located, close to the beautiful lake of St Etienne de Cantales, as well as the main attractions of the region, such as Salers, Lioran, Jussac, Arpajon sur Cère, Vic sur Cère and the ski resort of Super Lioran.

You will also have direct access to the Cère Valley, offering stunning views of iconic sites such as Puy Griou, Puy Mary and Plomb du Cantal, a volcano emblematic of the Cantal Mountains.

Take advantage of the many hiking trails of the Auvergne to discover breathtaking panoramas of the Chain of Puys, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

Book now your stay in our campsite in Auvergne and let yourself be seduced by the natural beauty, tranquility and authenticity of our hamlet in the heart of Cantal. An unforgettable stay awaits you.

name: Campsite & Guesthouse "Goûte la Vie" | Nature & rejuvenating stay in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes
description: Guest house & Campsite "Goûte la Vie" | Peaceful & authentic stay in Ain | Family campsite in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes | Hikes, lakes, waterfalls | Private and professional events Discover "Goûte la Vie", a charming guest house and ecological campsite located in the heart of Bugey, in Ain, in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes. Ideal for a stay in nature, this family campsite welcomes you to the picturesque village of Cerin. Live a relaxing stay in the mountains and enjoy the hikes, lakes and waterfalls to explore on foot. Noura and Gregory, nature lovers, invite you to "Goûte la Vie" for a rejuvenating weekend or a getaway in the countryside. The establishment is nestled between plain and mountain, offering authentic open-air accommodation for lovers of outdoor activities in the Bugey region. The "Goûte la Vie" campsite is also the ideal place to organize your private and professional events in the Ain, in a peaceful and green setting. The health precautions and barrier gestures recommended by the government are rigorously applied to ensure everyone's safety. While staying at "Goûte la Vie", you can also visit the famous paleontological museum of Cerin and discover the history of this time when Cerin was a lagoon, long before the era of the dinosaurs. The locals are friendly and welcoming, making your experience even more enjoyable. Live an unforgettable and rejuvenating experience at the "Goûte la Vie" campsite, the haven of peace for nature lovers in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes.

name: Camping in Lisbon's famous wine region
description: Are you ready to escape from everyday life? We're talking about the kind of escape that takes you deep into nature, where you can sleep under the stars and wake up to the smell of fresh coffee. If you are looking for a way to experience the Portuguese countryside with its cultural and culinary traditions then look no further than Palmela. Portugal's famous wine region south of Lisbon is the perfect place if you want to experience nature and wine at its best. You'll stay right in the vineyards, not far from the medieval town of Palmela, perched high in the Serra da Arrabida Nature Reserve. We offer a genuine experience for nature and wine lovers - not to mention for those who love to feast their way through Portugal! Some of Portugal's best wines are grown here, so you can visit wineries and enjoy what they have to offer during your stay! In the immediate vicinity you can visit a donkey sanctuary or the Quinta das Riscas - an event venue and themed garden with kangeros and zebras. If you feel too hot in the summer, you can cool off in a small, cozy outdoor pool within walking distance. And if you want to sample some local wines or eat the famous Leitao de Pocéirao suckling pig cooked in a wood-fired oven, there are several adegas (wineries) nearby. The area is also a great base for exploring more of Portugal - there's even a motorway nearby that takes you north and south in 15 minutes! 20 minutes you are already in the Alentejo with its unique cork oak forests; and in 25 minutes you can reach Setubal, a small fishing town with its beautiful turquoise beaches and an incredible range of fish. But why leave when there is so much to see here?

name: Meadow camping in the Franconian Lake District near Nuremberg
description: Meadow campsite with swimming area: We are happy to give away a part of our beautiful country life. Our quiet orchard on the outskirts offers space for caravans or mobile homes. Your pets are also welcome with us. We are happy to provide electricity on our farm for a small fee (3 € per night). However, there is no direct connection and no sanitary facilities on site. If you want, you can also get bicycles for a small fee. We are also happy to offer you a bread roll service from the best baker in the region - reliable quality and the best craftsmanship are still delivered here. What you can discover with us: On foot you reach a small bathing place at the river. Not far are the Franconian lake district (5 minutes), with the Altmühlsee and Brombachsee and many other lakes and the best beer gardens with beaches. Within 15 minutes you can reach the Hesselberg region with the Hesselberg for perfect hiking trips or mountain tours followed by swimming fun. You can get all excursion and insider tips on site. Welcome - we look forward to your visit!

name: The place for peace seekers and nature lovers!
description: 'Le Peyret Bas' - restored farmhouse and peaceful campsite in the hills of Villefranche-du-Périgord (Périgord Noir) Discover 'Le Peyret Bas', an authentic farmhouse partially restored, located in the beautiful hills around Villefranche-du-Périgord, in the heart of the Périgord Noir. This haven of peace offers an ideal environment to relax in tranquility, enjoy the sun, nature, clean air and local culinary delights. Located in the southeast of the Dordogne, on the border of the departments of Lot and Lot-et-Garonne, 'Le Peyret Bas' is an excellent base for cycling, walking, canoeing, horse riding, visits to flea markets, castles, museums, medieval villages and picturesque towns. The land of 'Le Peyret Bas' covers 5.5 hectares and offers a gently sloping meadow and forest with majestic beech, oak and chestnut trees, as well as an old farmhouse converted into a charming holiday home for 4 to 5 people. You will be enchanted by the murder of the stream that meanders through the forest, fed by a spring located upstream. Spacious camping pitches, in the shade of trees and on the edge of the forest, are arranged in such a way that you can enjoy a real Eldorado of peace and space. The set exudes a rustic charm that will seduce you. Book your stay now at our quiet campsite 'Le Peyret Bas' and dive into a true haven of peace in the heart of the Périgord Noir, in Villefranche-du-Périgord.

name: Idyllic pitch with access to the lake
description: Idyllic and centrally located parking space Passing through from north to south or east to west and looking for a stopover? No problem! In the middle of Germany, a little south of Göttingen, right on the Drammetal triangle (A7/A38), we offer three pitches with electricity for full campers in idyllic Klein Schneen, in the middle of nature with access to the Kiessee. activities This can be explored with our Stand Up Paddler. There are quiet spots for a picnic or a campfire with a barbecue in the countryside. Individualists are guaranteed to find relaxation here. Anglers get their money's worth for a small premium in the strong pike area. Feel free to talk to us about our cozy hobby room, where you can play billiards, darts or table football. We also have a table tennis table! meals We are happy to offer you a fresh salad from our vegetable garden or wild sausages from the local area. In addition, fresh eggs from happy chickens or milk can be bought locally within walking distance. Pets are also welcome.

name: Relax, rest and space at 't Heuvelken
description: 't Heuvelken is located on the edge of the 500+ hectare Merode domain and the Gerhagen park, close to the three-province point of Antwerp/Limburg/Flemish Brabant. 't Heuvelken has everything to recharge your batteries, in connection with nature: relax, tranquility and space. You can place your tent or camper on the edge of the forest, with a beautiful view and the sound of the birdsong. Electricity, potable water and optional sanitary facilities are available, as are a wide range of leisure options in the immediate vicinity.

name: Camping in a quiet location, laid out in tiers, surrounded by natural landscape
description: Pure nature! Rest and relaxation, hiking and cycling. We have something for everyone at an affordable price.

name: Benvenuti in our Sicilian citrus orchard!
description: We have 12 spacious RV spots in our citrus grove overlooking the valley. Our camp space is located in the Natural Park of the Alcantara River. That is why we are limited with facilities. We can somewhat offer you the experience of wild camping! There is a natural water outdoor shower and a sink. No drinking water. No electricity. There are solar lanterns. The camper place is located between orange and lemon trees with a few other fruit trees, such as fig, mulberry, olive, apricot and plum. Feel safe surrounded by the hills covered with Mediterranean vegetation and as soon as night falls under a twinkling starry sky. Because there is no light pollution, it is wonderful stargazing. Enjoying peace and quiet, being connected to nature and feeling free, that's what we stand for! We ourselves live a few hundred meters away, going down the path. Through a gate in the orchard there you can reach the Alcantara River on foot. Ice-cold meltwater from the snow of volcano Etna flows impressively through hollowed out lava rocks. This is especially visible at the Gole d'Alcantara, a tourist spot a few kilometers away. With us, the river is hardly visited and you bathe in the intimacy of nature. The water meanders here between the trees, past scattered lava rocks and via waterfalls. It is about a 10-minute walk from the camper place; so down the path, through our garden, then through a deserted field, occasionally populated by a herd of cows, to finally arrive at the riverbed. You can go with the flow and find the necessary refreshment during the hot summers. In the winter months, the river transforms into a swirling stream of water. Explore Sicilian rural life from your motorhome. In the respective seasons you can help us or our neighbors with the picking (grapes in September, olives in November, mandarins and lemons in the winter months, apricots at the beginning of May and oranges at the end of May) or by buying products from the vegetable gardens around. For the camper guests we offer small meals of local products accompanied by home-produced wine or fruit juice. You can also use the Wi-Fi connection on our terrace. 2 km away is a bakery with an extensive range of food and drinks; by appointment it also functions as a restaurant. Opposite is a gas station with a bar where you can go for your Italian coffee or a beer. The village of Gaggi is 5 km away; here are supermarkets, a bank with ATM, bars and various shops, as well as pizzerias with delivery service. (They know where to find us!) The nearest beach is (by car) a fifteen minute drive. The picturesque town of Taormina with luxury shops and the Roman-Greek theater about 20 minutes. While Etna-North is an hour away. Sicily is very diverse and has a lot to offer and to see. Tour around with the camper and discover the island in all its facets. Then it is wonderful to arrive or return to our orchard to chill out, or simply as a stopover while traveling through. Benvenuti!

name: Enikerhof on Lake Zug
description: Camping at the lake: Welcome to our farm by the lake. You can really relax and unwind on our tent and mobile home parking space. Electricity and mobile home connection, toilet and a warm shower provide the necessary comfort. We have been working intensively in direct marketing for over 20 years and, as an active family business, we always do everything we can to ensure that our offer is always of the highest quality. In the neighborhood: On a short walk around our farm you can enjoy the wonderful view of Lake Zug and the surrounding area. The area is ideal for long hikes, walks and bike rides. A visit to the lido in Zug is worthwhile on hot summer days. Bathing fun for the whole family. See you soon!

name: Camping at the historic 14th century mill in Bourgogne Franche-Comté
description: Stay at our charming campsite in Bourgogne Franche-Comté, on the banks of the La Guye river, located at the entrance to the property in case of dry weather or along our path in case of rain. Meet our adorable neighbors, the dwarf goats, and expect to be greeted by the geese and ducks that live nearby. Take advantage of our green facilities for an eco-friendly stay, including dry toilets and a shower. Share friendly moments around our local table d'hôtes, where you can enjoy carefully prepared meals. During your visit, we will be delighted to introduce you to our farm in a discovery farm and to present our activity to you. If you wish, you will also have the opportunity to spend time with the animals and learn more about their way of life. Come and enjoy an authentic and rejuvenating stay in the heart of nature, while discovering the daily life of a responsible and committed farm in our Bourgogne Franche-Comté campsite.

name: Kong Hill - Overnight at the Rio Zêzere
description: We are currently realizing our dream in the middle of nature in central Portugal and would like to share this beautiful piece of earth with you. If you are looking for a few quiet days in nature​,​ is right here. This place with a wide view of the surrounding mountains and at night usually a great starry sky is perfect for relaxing and doing nothing. If you get bored here and need more action, the region is also ideal for climbing, bouldering, hiking, fishing at the lake or a quad excursion. Visits to restaurants or browsing through the weekly market are of course also possible in the nearby village. Our property is currently still in the construction phase and therefore not yet perfect, but it is not a construction site either. We currently offer 3 different pitches with a great view over the Rio Zêzere, which can then be visited and selected on site. Tent pitches are located on the lower terraces. That means a small descent is necessary. The property has its own small spring from which smaller water tanks could also be filled. In addition, after a short descent, you can simply hop into the lake for refreshment, which is of course particularly valuable in the warm months (sturdy shoes are recommended). Please note: Our property is a bit off the beaten track and does not have a normal tar road (see pictures). But don't worry, our old VW Crafter without all-wheel drive makes it up and down the "hill" even with these road conditions ;-).

name: Meadow orchard between Allgäu and Ulm
description: Relaxation is calling! Welcome to my natural pitch. This is a parking space for self-sufficient vans or motorhomes in the middle of greenery, perfect for families, couples, dog lovers or solo travelers who long for peace and relaxation. The site is only about 5 minutes from the A7 motorway and is therefore ideal as a stopover or for a short stay of up to 2 nights. Access is via a grassy path for vans or small mobile homes as well as cars with small caravans (approx. Max 5.5 m). This is what you can experience here: Whether as a stopover on the way through or a starting point for extensive bicycle or hiking tours, everyone gets their money's worth here. Located between the Allgäu and Ulm, our campspace is the perfect starting point for excursions in the area. The onward journey to Lake Constance is also an option, Lindau and Bregenz can be reached in about an hour's drive.

name: Camping Les Eaux Vives, a unique and enchanting place!
description: AN EXCEPTIONAL SITE TO FIND THE PLEASURE OF ACTIVITIES IN CONTACT WITH NATURE Chapeauroux, a peaceful village located on the border between Margeride and Pays du Velay, is the ideal place to recharge your batteries in contact with nature. Located in a preserved natural area, the village is nestled at an altitude of 750 meters, in the Haut Allier gorges, on the borders of the Allier and Chapeauroux rivers. Its impressive basaltic cirque, shaped by the Allier, offers a unique setting for outdoor activities. Nature lovers can swim in the cool waters of the river, go hiking on the wooden paths or take the Roman roads to reach the GR 470 or the famous Stevenson path. Fishermen will be able to indulge their passion in first-class waterways offering great diversity and exceptional quality. Chapeauroux is also renowned for white water sports such as canoeing and kayaking. The courses, offering grandiose and wild landscapes, guarantee unforgettable thrills. In summary, Chapeauroux is a charming and peaceful little village, offering many outdoor activities in a preserved natural setting.

name: The ZuiderKRIB -Taste-Experience-Enjoy-
description: Spend the night in a quiet green environment, look out over the fields or the water, go on an adventure in the Tiny House on the dike and EXPERIENCE, walk with your feet in the grass, TASTE the espresso at T121 and fall asleep in the hammock. ..Put your tent between the fruit trees, park your camper as you wish, go out with the picnic basket or pick the tea from the garden, splash in the Zwartemeer and cook with fellow campers under the roof on the open fire. Pick your flower from the flower picking garden and ENJOY. We do too!

name: The Benardier
description: Relax at the Bénardier: Peaceful garden of 5000 m², surrounded by greenery, majestic trees and colorful flowers Treat yourself to a well-deserved break at Le Bénardier, a true haven of peace nestled in the heart of a 5000 square meter space. Surrounded by lush vegetation, majestic trees and colorful flowers, our place invites you to recharge your batteries and marvel at the beauty of nature. Take advantage of this enchanting environment to take a refreshing break from the hectic pace of everyday life. With its vast green spaces, the Bénardier offers an ideal setting to relax, walk or simply contemplate the splendor of nature. Book now your moment of tranquility at Le Bénardier, a place of healing in the middle of a peaceful garden of 5000 m², where calm and serenity reign supreme.

name: Resort for lovers of nature, spaces and heritage
description: Discover a haven of peace in New Aquitaine, far from the hustle and bustle of coastal summers. Enjoy a peaceful campsite surrounded by nature, open all year round, offering an idyllic setting for ecological holidays and green tourism. Located in the heart of New Aquitaine, our campsite is the perfect starting point for regional excursions and unforgettable adventures. Immerse yourself in relaxation and serenity during your stay, while exploring the charms of this beautiful region. For fishing enthusiasts, a picturesque pond awaits you in New Aquitaine, where you can indulge in your favorite pastime in a rural setting. Join us for a unique and rejuvenating getaway in New Aquitaine, where you will live an experience of accommodation in the heart of nature, combining comfort and tranquility.

name: Quiet camping with the horses in the middle of nature
description: At the back of our very large garden there is enough space to spend the night while enjoying the peace and nature. You sleep next to the horses in the middle of the green. This is the ideal place to completely withdraw and come to yourself or to enjoy each other in peace. The horses will keep you company. The view of the animals gives you the chance to observe them closely and enjoy the movements within the herd. These animals are so authentic and pure. This teaches you to enjoy the little things in life. Having a nice chat around the campfire about the experiences of the day, about what the horses had to tell us, makes you realize how much these animals can still teach us. If desired, you are responsible for their care. The horses are also used during coaching sessions where they give you more insight into who you are. They show you what you need at this moment in your life to break through certain patterns and make the right choices. They can also reveal dynamics within a family or group. You can also experience beautiful walks and bike rides in the beautiful Hageland. If you cross the street, you walk straight into the Demer Valley to get lost in the beautiful nature for hours. We live on the mountain bike trail. So you leave directly on the gravel into the Demerbroeken. My husband has everything you need to tinker with your bike: Bike Wash, compressor, and knowledge of bicycle mechanics. Your bike is safe and dry here under the shed or in the garage. Other fun activities nearby: - Sail down the Demer (full or half day) from Aarschot or Scherpenheuvel - Walking in the Merode (Averbode Abbey) - Visit Horst Castle (Castle of the Red Knight) - Multi-day hiking trails to nearby bivouac sites (Rillaar, Walenbos). The pleasant city of Aarschot is also nearby. You can go there for cultural trips, swimming parties, delicious dinners, cinema, fun shopping, etc.

name: Time-out & pleasure meadow on the edge of the Spreewald
description: description Beautiful and quiet place to stay in the middle of a meadow orchard. Picking apples, pears and cherries from the meadow orchard for immediate consumption is expressly permitted. An ideal starting point for long hikes and bike tours with excursion destinations in the immediate vicinity. The circumstances Little paradise on the outskirts of town. The ideal place to escape the stress of everyday life. With the exception of one or two tractors and the buzzing of the bees, the noise is kept within reasonable limits. You have a wonderful view over the adjacent fields and you can even see the top of the Calau church tower. The places You can sit down on all mowed areas. The subsoil is meadow, partially in the shade of neighboring oaks. The sanitary facilities There is no sanitary facility. If required, drinking water is available on a neighboring property (100 liters = 1.00 EUR) The Activities An ideal starting point for long hikes and bike tours with excursion destinations in the immediate vicinity, such as the Sagenpfad & Goldborn in Werchow, the "Calauer Schweiz" lookout tower, the "Niederlausitzer Landrücken" nature park, "Fürst-Pückler-Park" in Fürstlich Drehna, the Gutskapelle Reuden or the Sielmann Nature Experience Center Wanninchen. A children's playground is in the immediate vicinity (distance 100m) to the meadow. Calau, the "healthy little town with a joke", is about 2 km from the place to stay. In the city there are several supermarkets, two gas stations, Sparkasse and Spreewaldbank, as well as a medical center and a tourist information office. In the city center are the Witzerundweg, the town hall, many small shops, several iced coffee shops and restaurants. The Spreewald with its many rivers as a destination for paddling, boating or cycling can be easily reached in about 10 km. Other things Other hotspots and day trips: Tropical Island (50 km) Visitor mine F60 (30 km) Berlin (90km) Dresden (90km) Leipzig (120 km) Rules Outside the meadow, the dog must be kept on a leash. All legacies and rubbish must be taken away. There is no waste disposal facility on the meadow.

name: Lake Constance peninsula Höri Natural idyll
description: Our farm is an emigrant farm and is located in a beautiful nature and landscape conservation area on the southern slope of the Schienerberg on the Höri peninsula on Lake Constance, just 3 km from Lake Constance, the small town of Öhningen and the Swiss border. We offer 3 quieter or more central places on the courtyard. Sanitary facilities are available. A barbecue area for shared use. There are also holiday apartments and a barn for overnight stays and events. Dogs and horses can be brought along. In the near vicinity there are many great excursion destinations, 2 beautiful beach resorts with a sandy beach right in town, wonderful hiking, downhill and cycling routes across the Bodensee peninsula Höri, Stein am Rhein CH 6 km or the Rhine Falls, Constance, Reichenau Island and much more.

name: At the pond at the edge of the forest
description: Parking space right on the pond at the edge of the forest! With a small jetty in the pond. A small rowing boat is also there. The place has about 350 square meters. Electricity and water available Just right for those looking for peace. Secluded but still central. Bakery about 1 km away. beer garden. Gastronomy. Shops about 5 km away. We are an estate in the Aischgrund. Our focus is on carp farming and poultry geese and ducks for Christmas. We manage over 50 farms. Parking spaces are also available directly at the pond. Or in the middle of the forest, our farm area is about 22 hectares, there is something for everyone.

name: Hofcamping in Billerbeck near Munster
description: Welcome to nature Our idyllic country house with a pond and friendly cats that need to be cuddled and called Mokka & Tonic is located on a beautiful orchard. Our dog Eddi lives with us in the house and yard. The pitch is located on the old horse meadow and is ideally suited for tents, caravans, campers or vans with a power connection. We welcome dogs as long as they are cat-friendly. This is what you can experience with us: Our farm is located directly on the Ludgerus hiking trail and offers a great starting point for hikes and bike tours in the Baumberge. A day trip to Münster is also worthwhile. Visit the 13th-century St. Paul's Cathedral, built in the Gothic and Romantic style, stroll in the gardens of the baroque Münster Castle and visit the Pablo Picasso Art Museum. I can only recommend the suggestions of the komoot app for bike tours or hikes. Welcome to nature Our idyllic country house with a pond and friendly cats that need to be cuddled and called Mokka & Tonic is located on a beautiful orchard. Our dog Eddi lives with us in the house and yard. The pitch is located on the old horse meadow and is ideally suited for tents, caravans, campers or vans with a power connection. We welcome dogs as long as they are cat-friendly. This is what you can experience with us: Our farm is located directly on the Ludgerus hiking trail and offers a great starting point for hikes and bike tours in the Baumberge. A day trip to Munster is also worthwhile. Visit the 13th-century St. Paul's Cathedral, built in the Gothic and Romantic style, stroll in the gardens of the baroque Munster Castle and visit the Pablo Picasso Art Museum. I can only recommend the suggestions of the komoot app for bike tours or hikes.

name: small farm campsite in the Luxembourg Ardennes
description: Camping Berkel is a small-scale family and farm campsite located in a valley of the Luxembourg Ardennes, surrounded by a beautiful hilly landscape. The campsite is located on the river 'Sûre' and has a natural, friendly and relaxed atmosphere. In addition to camping at the campsite, you can also enjoy the authentic atmosphere that the farm exudes and the beautiful nature that is ideal for walking, cycling, fishing and mountain biking. There are two beautiful Safari tents on the campsite that can be rented. These are fully furnished, making it an adventurous and luxurious way of 'camping'. Furthermore, the campsite offers the possibility to stay in the farm. Four beautiful rooms with a cozy common dining room are part of the so-called 'Bed and Breakfast'.

name: Pitch - Black Forest
description: Are you ready for a wonderful holiday or just a few days away? Enjoy camping, refueling, enjoying the beautiful nature or sunbathing at our swimming pool. Cycling or walking in one of the challenging surroundings or simply enjoying a drink on the terrace of our Gastsraum. Schwarzwald Camping is a campsite with a beautiful location in the Black Forest. Let yourself be seduced by our unique Dutch hospitality in the most beautiful part of Germany! Besides a beautiful location in the Black Forest, Schwarzwald Camping is also the perfect stopover campsite! If you are on your way to Italy, Croatia, Switzerland or another country in that direction, make sure that you can take enough rest along the way by staying at Schwarzwald Camping for one or two days. The campsite is conveniently located for several interesting places, such as Stuttgart and Strasbourg. Our campsite has annual pitches and pitches. There is also the possibility to rent a chalet or a mobile home. The campsite in the Black Forest is located in a rustic location in the Bad WIldbad valley. The characteristic landscape of the Black Forest ensures that the campsite and its surroundings are a true Eldorado for hikers, cyclists, motorcyclists, anglers and those seeking tranquility. In short, this beautiful campsite in the Black Forest offers something for everyone in any weather and is therefore more than worth a visit!

name: Camping at Villa Helios in Weida
description: With a feeling for nature: Our private and self-sufficient camper place with fresh drinking water, electricity and camper connection is located in a large, listed park with an art deco villa. The property is very quiet despite being in the middle of town. Four-legged friends are very welcome with us. Enjoy the view and relax at the picnic table. Everyone feels at home here. There is to discover: In a few minutes you can reach the historic city center and the almost 1000 year old castle. A visit is always worthwhile. The more than 800-year-old Weida is flanked by three rivers, which are great for hiking or cycling. Weida used to be the leather center of Germany. You can still visit an old tannery today.

name: Pure nature - on the edge of the Veldensteiner forest
description: Pure nature on the edge of the Veldenstein Forest: We offer two self-sufficient tent and mobile home pitches with fresh drinking water and electricity for camping: an unfenced meadow next to a small road near Auerbach in the Upper Palatinate ("Hohe Tanne") and our large orchard below our house in Michelfeld in the Upper Palatinate. To experience in the area: We have the perfect starting point for extended day trips in the region. For climbers, the Franconian Jura is not far away.

name: Camping at the distillery Ulrich near Frankfurt
description: Welcome to the distillery Ulrich Here you are at the right place with a tent, mobile home, caravan or van. On our green meadow, you and your four-legged friends are well looked after with electricity and fresh drinking water. Everyone feels comfortable with us. We cordially invite you to spend your vacation with us and to get to know the region. About us and the area: We, the Ulrich family, have been running a farm and a schnapps distillery with self-marketing for 3 generations. A special feature is the large variety of liqueurs and special brandies, which are known far beyond the region. With us there are numerous activities: many mountain bike and hiking trails, the pond with restaurant, the castle ruins of Lichtenburg and the gliding field.

name: Great spot in the countryside with a view of the alpacas
description: I am offering you a spacious plot of land on the edge of the village at the edge of the forest, surrounded by lush meadows and fields - with a view of the village's own alpacas :) My property has about 400 square meters and is completely fenced. It includes a carport with fireplace and BRAND NEW ☆☆☆ an ECO toilet integrated in the carport ☆☆☆ The property can also be driven on with a camper or extra-long vehicle, as the path from the gate to the carport is completely covered with grass grids ;) The property is all yours at the time of booking :) Of course you can also spend the night with a tent under the starry sky. Beautiful sunsets and balmy summer nights can be enjoyed to the fullest here. The furniture (sun lounger, seating area, fire basket, grill) can be used. Toilet cleaning is included in the above price. Garbage can be disposed of for a fee of €5, to be paid on arrival. Otherwise, the site is to be left clean, tidy and free of rubbish. Since I own two dogs myself, your furry friends are also very welcome here and will certainly get their money's worth while romping around ;) My property is near Pottenstein, in the heart of Franconian Switzerland. The beautiful Klumpertal can be reached directly from the property in a few minutes without crossing a street and the green Püttlachtal with its natural Kneipp facility also offers wonderful refreshment on hot days :)

name: Idyllic parking space on a farm in Delmsen / Neuenkirchen
description: Camping on a farm with great sunsets The pitch is on our farm in the middle of Delmsen, but still very quiet next to the pastures of our Charolais herd. In the evening you can enjoy great sunsets. If you like to grill, you can use the existing grill hut. If you don't feel like self-catering, you can enjoy German cuisine at the opposite Gasthaus Leverenz. Electricity can be provided. The surrounding area is ideal for cycling. Our farm is on the Leine-Heide cycle path. If you are traveling by bike, you can also use the Heide Schuttle (free bus with bike trailer) from July to October to explore different places and landscapes in the area. One of the bus stops is right next to our farm. Schneverdingen with the beautiful heathland can be reached in about 10 minutes by car. The amusement park Heide Park is also only 10 minutes by car from our farm. A LIDL is in Delmsen and within walking distance. The nearest bakery and EDEKA market are in the neighboring town of Neuenkirchen. The outdoor pool in Delmsen is also open during the summer months. We look forward to your visit.

name: Fox regions
description: Camper place on a farm (no longer in operation), behind the barn, next to an orchard. Camperplaays is located approximately one kilometer from the village of Heinkenszand. Supermarket, restaurants, bakery, tea garden, swimming pool in the vicinity. Nice area for cycling. Goes, a nice shopping city, is approximately 10 kilometers away. Middelburg and Vlissingen at about 20 kilometers.  Please note, this Campspace is only for campers. There is no room for tents and caravans.

name: Lose yourself in a little French oasis
description:
Come and experience some Le Poteau magic.  Our little campsite and gites provide a warm welcome, great facilities, and a few touches that we hope make us just a bit special. We aim to ensure a relaxing, chilled holiday with just enough on offer to ensure you won’t be bored.  Many long-term friendships are forged at Le Poteau.  To enhance your experience, we have established relationships with lots of local businesses – some for you to visit, others who come to us.

Delicious meals in the orchard using mainly local produce
Great local wines
Daily bread and pastries delivered
Our small but charming swimming pool
A weekly bio veg stall on-site (grown 50m away)
Appointments on-site with a lovely local masseuse 
Lots of  suggestions on where to go and what to do in this beautiful, undiscovered part of France

name: Quiet night in Cognac at Laure and Nans
description: Welcome to our campsite in Cognac in New Aquitaine, the ideal place for camping holidays in the heart of nature. Our nature campsite in Nouvelle-Aquitaine offers a dream setting with a bamboo grove and a peaceful garden for a relaxing camping holiday. Our campsite also has a swimming pool to refresh you on sunny days. Cyclists will be delighted to discover our ideal location on the Flow Vélo route leading directly to Chemin du Rutelier. Book your camping holiday in Cognac now and enjoy a camping holiday in New Aquitaine, in an idyllic setting surrounded by nature.

name: Nature camping in Münsterland
description: Nature camping in Münsterland Warm welcome! For partially self-sufficient campers, we offer three natural pitches on our farm between Sassenberg and Warendorf. From our pitches you can enjoy an unobstructed view over asparagus fields and meadows. A fireplace with seating invites you to cozy evenings. We provide firewood for you for a fee. Electricity is available by prior arrangement. In just a few minutes you can reach shops and the horse town of Warendorf. Freetime activities Canoeists and kayakers have the opportunity to enter the Hessel, which flows into the Ems after just a few kilometers. The nearby Feldmarksee with its sandy beach is ideal for swimming, sunbathing, pedal boating, sailing or eating ice cream. We have over 1,000 km of cycle paths in the parkland district of Warendorf (e.g. the border crossing route, cycle route 72, Unkemann route, 100 castles route, Ems cycle path) and guided cycle tours with trained tour guides. Bicycle and e-bike rental is possible near the campsite. There are hiking trails around the Harkotten Castle complex and the Teutoburg Forest cities in the vicinity Warendorf is 3 km away, Münster is 28 km away, Osnabrück is 36 km away and Bielefeld is 39 km away

name: Lose yourself in a little French oasis
description:
Come and experience some Le Poteau magic.  Our little campsite and gites provide a warm welcome, great facilities, and a few touches that we hope make us just a bit special. We aim to ensure a relaxing, chilled holiday with just enough on offer to ensure you won’t be bored.  Many long-term friendships are forged at Le Poteau.  To enhance your experience, we have established relationships with lots of local businesses – some for you to visit, others who come to us.

Delicious meals in the orchard using mainly local produce
Great local wines
Daily bread and pastries delivered
Our small but charming swimming pool
A weekly bio veg stall on-site (grown 50m away)
Appointments on-site with a lovely local masseuse 
Lots of  suggestions on where to go and what to do in this beautiful, undiscovered part of France

name: Peaceful and panoramic orchard: natural campsite in the heart of the Grand Est
description: Discover our ecological open-air campsite in the heart of the Grand Est, a nature and rural campsite with a peaceful orchard for farmers. Enjoy a unique agrotourism experience in our farm campsite. Enjoy local products and duck specialties (magrets, foie gras, chipolatas, confits, rillettes) for a gourmet camping stay with a farm in the magnificent Grand Est region.

name: Camping in the garden infront of castle nearby Cologne
description:
Welcome to our large but peaceful yard with orchard in Bergheim, near Cologne. We love animals and if you convince us that your dog gets along with rabbits, our dogs, peacocks and donkeys, you are welcome to bring it along. The campsite is available to people who are travelling, touring, visiting or backpacking, but is not intended as a long-term place to stay. Two nights is the rule, if you want to stay longer or shorter, please contact us. 

From Stommeln railway station it is a 20-minute drive to Cologne city centre. Restaurants and supermarkets are within easy walking distance. Our tip for you is horse riding and boating on the river Erft nearby Bergheim.

The use of the campsite is a privilege, not a matter of course. If you book a reservation, please stick to it, because once a reservation is made, we have to refuse other people. No-calls/no-shows ruin the opportunity for others to attend. 

Backyard camping is one way people can travel and stay cheaply. There is a large network of people who allow camping in their yards, gardens, etc. We are participants in this network. We like to meet people from all over the world. Just to clarify, don't think of us as a cheap campsite, so don't expect or demand all the amenities that campsites usually offer.

Camping is at your own risk. We are not responsible for objects or people slipping / falling / injuring themselves etc. The manor house is currently being restored.

name: Rustic mini campsite in Voisey
description: Camping Cozy Voisey : Mini Camping Nature Haute Marne, Relaxation & Family in Champagne Ardenne Discover this charming Camping Cozy Voisey, a mini campsite in Champagne Ardenne, located 600 km from Utrecht, in the heart of the Haute Marne in France. Enjoy the authenticity of a traditional French village and the tranquility of a small-scale family campsite, with ten spacious pitches for tents, caravans, campers or folding trailers and three furnished Waard tents that you can rent. This nature campsite in the Haute Marne is the ideal place for country lovers to rest while enjoying a beautiful view and good French wine. Relax in an old orchard with plum, cherry, walnut and apple trees, the fruit of which you can taste in season. Enjoy the beautiful countryside around the village of Voisey, with meadows, hills and forests as far as the eye can see. Listen to the birds, see local wildlife such as foxes and deer, and see a starry sky far away from the city lights. Enjoy French cuisine and local organic wines in the many restaurants and tastings in Coiffy-le-Haute. Discover the cycling and walking routes in this ideal area for a relaxing camping in the countryside, discover the charming surrounding villages and enjoy children's activities such as the swimming pool, mini golf and mini farm in Park de Bannie. Camping Cozy Voisey is the perfect option for a relaxing and rejuvenating stay, or a pleasant stopover on your way to the sun, offering comfort and conviviality in an exceptional natural setting in the Champagne-Ardennes.

name: Tiny rural campsite with great facilities
description:
Our small picturesque campsite in Nouvelle-Aquitaine offers a unique rural experience, with a limited capacity of 6 spacious pitches for tents, caravans and campers. Easily access our nature campsite in Nouvelle-Aquitaine by a chalk path gently tilted 6 degrees. The pitches are mainly flat and ideally host caravans and campers of small to medium size. Enjoy a refreshing shade from noon.

Our campsite is a haven of tranquility where it is not uncommon to see deer and wild boars. Although you can hear trains during the day and evening from the nearby line, they do not run at night.

Ideally located not far from the A10 and N10 roads, our small campsite in Nouvelle-Aquitaine is a perfect stopover for those traveling to or from Spain and Portugal.

Facilities: Our campsite with swimming pool in Nouvelle-Aquitaine is equipped with a modern sanitary block with 2 showers, 2 toilets, 2 sinks, dishpans, a washing machine, a board and an iron. Each location has a 10 amp power connection. We offer free broadband connection on the campsite and around the pool.

Campers have access to a common swimming pool of 12 x 6 m surrounded by a beautiful garden with sun loungers, umbrellas and plenty of shade under the trees. A playground is nearby with swings, table tennis, croquet, badminton, volleyball, football nets and other ball and racket games. A small library and a selection of board games are also available.

name: Nature camping near the Baltic Sea
description: Camping with a Baltic Sea feeling: Directly behind the orchard of our farm community you will find a wonderful place for your tent, bus or small mobile home with a rustic fireplace. Next to it you will find a solar shower (on cool days, hot water can be prepared with the wood-burning stove), running water and a toilet. Electricity can be laid in the garden if necessary. To experience in the region: Here you can enjoy nature above all. The way to the Flensburg Fjord is not far, on foot through the beautiful beech forest of the nature reserve. Pay a visit to the picturesque port city of Flensburg with its Scandinavian flair and numerous beaches.

name: Not perfect, but cozy
description: Our location is located in Angeren, located between Arnhem and Nijmegen. You camp in our garden. This is also a special garden also shop. It is possible that customers walk past your camper, and that cheerful children jump on the trampolines in the garden. According to real cycling connoisseurs, it is a great environment. Millingenwaard - De Veluwe - Park Lingezegen - Montferland

name: Wonderful camping spot in the middle of the Achterhoek nature!
description: We live in beautiful Toldijk located in the municipality of Bronckhorst. You can camp with us in the bongerd (fruit orchard) where you have a nice and quiet and secluded spot. Here you can enjoy the tranquility, the wild animals or just go out and about. You can relax here and discover the area by experiencing one of the many cycling or walking routes. Or rent one of our inflatable supboards to discover the area on the water! (Book in advance! Op=Op) In our farm shop we have a wide range of delicious local products such as juices and drinks, salads, potatoes, vegetables and fruit, meat and dairy and so on. It is also possible to order freshly baked Achterhoek spelled bread for the next morning. In the vicinity are several swimming, shopping centers and supermarkets. Toldijk is located between Doetinchem and Zutphen and is 30 minutes by car to Arnhem. * The shower is a cold water outdoor shower so bring a swimsuit if you want to use it *Power is NOT included in the price *We have fire pits and wood for sale in our shop

name: middle forest, pure nature
description: Beautiful place in the middle of the forest. Enjoy the forest sounds and the tranquility; Pure nature, so suitable for autonomous guests. Welcome

name: Alpaca farm in the apple forest near Dresden
description: Alpakahof am Apfelwald - An animalistic natural pleasure for young and old Embedded between Galgenberg, Picho, Kapellenberg and Tschelentsy on both sides of the "Long Water" lies our alpaca farm with apple forest on the outskirts of Dretschen. Thanks to the central location in the middle of the beautiful Bautzen Oberland, nature and city explorers alike get their money's worth. We also have a small selection of delicacies and wines for you. With us you can use the kitchen, sauna and grill, there is a toilet house and a fireplace. You are welcome to set up your tent in the shade of our old apple trees on our meadow orchard. Shower and lockable charging stations are also available. Cars and trailers have no place on the meadow, there is a nearby parking lot. We offer a mobile home parking space for short overnight stays on our farm. From hiking to city trips, everything is possible in the area Visit our alpacas in their enclosure at the house, petting is allowed. Rent bikes from us and explore the area, go bouldering or take a day trip to Dresden. If required, we will be happy to provide you with bread rolls in the morning so that you can start your adventure well strengthened. We warmly welcome you!

name: Camping Johanna's Bos in a young food forest in the middle of the polder landscape
description: Are you looking for a beautiful campsite with your friends, family or company? Then book a place at Johanna's Bos now. If you like vastness and views, you can enjoy our beautiful place in the polder. Near the Amstelmeer. If you want to make your stay special with a theater or music performance, please let us know.

name: Walnuttreeorchids and ornamental gardens to pitch your tent or caravan
description:
Immerse yourself in the tranquillity of our lakeside campsite, a serene and organic farm stay nestled in the heart of the picturesque Limousin region. Experience organic farming and enjoy a unique selection of accommodations, be it in a comfortable tent camping spot amongst blooming orchids, verdant fields, or peaceful forests or in a secure caravan campsite with all necessary amenities.

For the adventurous, engage in authentic farm activities - try your hand at digging up fresh potatoes or help shepherd our sheep as the day winds down. Enjoy the bounty of our land, with a range of fresh, organic vegetables and homemade confitures available for your taste buds.

But our farm stay is more than just a peaceful retreat. It's a family-friendly campsite and a gateway to explore the stunning surroundings of the Limousin area. Cool off with a refreshing swim in the nearby lakes during the summer, an ideal camping near lake experience. Or embark on a leisurely stroll around quaint local villages and the expansive natural parks of the Dordogne region in the autumn and winter seasons.

name: Farm camping - get close to nature and animals
description: You can arrive here on foot or by bicycle directly from the Ringsted Experience Trail, and cars, campers and caravans are also very welcome. At our farm you can relax, greet the animals and perhaps find some berries or herbs to pick. There is a fire pit, outdoor kitchen and plenty of opportunities for play.

name: Circular mini-campsite on sustainable Landgoed Rorik in the polder.
description: Come and stay in one of our unique circular houses or pitch your tent at our mini campsite in the North Holland polder. Our location is a new place where we figure out how we can live together as sustainably as possible, (organically) farm, build, work and relax. We are still working hard to make our dream come true, we are not done yet but it is already a very nice and inspiring place! In addition to the campsite, the estate consists of a wine garden, an apple and pear orchard, an organic market garden and 30 hectares of organic farming. The restaurant is open from Wednesday lunchtime to Sunday lunchtime. We are 25 minutes from Amsterdam and 15 minutes from the beach of Wijk aan Zee. There are beautiful cycling routes in the area. Bring your boots, because with rain it is muddy. Also, pack your guitar for a campfire session around the large fireplace. And don't forget your binoculars, because the buzzards / harriers / kestrels are flying around you! Blue metal birds also fly over every now and then 🛩. After all, we are very centrally located on the edge of the Randstad. Children are welcome: no seesaws here, but real ones. No animation team, but plenty of clay, water and nature to discover and adventure. Atse and Maartje and their children Lux and Borre welcome you!

name: Cozy and familiar, your Campspace with views of nature
description: Welcome to our campspace for relaxation, Granja La Carmela! Relax and enjoy the forest and mountains and listen to the wide variety of bird species that surround us. The Campspace offers picnic tables in the shade or sun, a viewpoint for sunset and views of the Santomera reservoir dam. Our fruit and vegetable garden and swimming pool are there for relaxing moments. We can prepare a delicious dinner according to availability. Ample parking and gated area for safety.   The area offers lots of possibility of hiking, we have at your disposal routes in the area (in forest and mountain), a beautiful bike paths and rural tourism.  There are several restaurants close to the campspace. The center of Murcia is only 15 minutes and Alicante 40 minutes, shopping centers 5 minutes, the beach 30 minutes. We are improving the services for our clients, we will inform you about the improvements.   We have two lovely dogs guarding the yard, we love animals, but for security reasons animals are forbidden.

name: Peace, green & space In Wouw...
description: Looking for a camper place in the countryside in Wouw (North Brabant) green, peace and space? You are very welcome at our Camperplace in Wouw

name: Oasis of biodiversity in a permaculture farm - La Ferme de la Goursaline
description: La Ferme de la Goursaline is a 3.3 hectare permaculture farm located in New Aquitaine, offering a real immersion in nature and a wild camping experience in the middle of nature. We offer different types of unusual accommodation such as two safari tents (35 and 45m2), a caravan and wild camping pitches for tents, vans or motorhomes. The safari tents have two separate bedrooms with a bunk bed in one and a 160x200cm bed in the other, a kitchen area with fridge and gas hob, a dining area and a furnished terrace. The caravan is equipped with a 140x200cm bed, a kitchen area with fridge, sink and gas hobs, gas heating, a dining area and outdoor furniture to enjoy the beautiful summer evenings. We also offer free camping pitches for wild camping enthusiasts, as well as a supply of drinking water to be filled in the sanitary room not far from the tents. The sanitary room is a common area that includes electricity, 2 indoor showers with hot water, an outdoor solar shower, 2 dry toilets and an outdoor kitchen area. La Ferme de la Goursaline also offers pizza evenings, musical evenings and half-day introduction to permaculture for an even more immersive experience. Located in the heart of the Périgord-Limousin Regional Natural Park, our farm offers many activities such as hiking or cycling, swimming in the surrounding rivers or in the leisure area lake in Bussière-Galant, just 5 minutes from our house. You can also visit the pretty villages, caves and castles of Limousin. Note that the tents are available from May 1 to September 30, while the caravan and camping pitches are available all year round. Prices include bed linen, tourist tax and cleaning costs. Pets are allowed, dogs must be kept on a leash. Welcome to La Ferme de la Goursaline, where you can discover a small oasis of biodiversity in permaculture, enjoy a wild camping experience in the heart of nature and recharge your batteries far from the stress of urban life.

name: Peace and Space, spend the night in our pasture between the ponies
description: Our farm is located in a quiet spot in Wenum, on the edge of Vaassen. Close to the Crown Domain, Paleis 't Loo, the Apenheul, beautiful cycling routes and within walking distance of the clog path. You can set up your tent with us in one of our meadows between the ponies. Or spend the night in a gypsy wagon or in our caravan. You can pick fresh mint for a nice cup of tea. You can also play a game with us. We have various games and books (mini library) Of course you can also just enjoy nature. In our clog shed we have a toilet and shower. We also have a microwave, oven, kettle and coffee maker available. You can possibly charge your phone here. Outside we also have one electric point. You camp with us on a meadow between the ponies, we do not have fixed spots with electricity and water facilities. We do not have WiFi and the telephone range can also be disappointing. Well, that's what we call going back to nature! If the weather permits, you can make a fire on the designated fire pits. Bring your own firewood, we no longer sell firewood. Every day you see birds of prey here and if you are lucky the storks are in the meadow, or you see an owl. Hares sit here in the meadow and sometimes you see a group of deer at dusk. I haven't managed to spot it yet, but the tie seems to come by here very often. So does the fox, which is why the chickens and our rabbit have to be locked up. The canal is within walking distance, you can cast a fishing rod here. We live on a gravel road, not a real through road. So if you opt for Peace, Space and Respect for nature, then you have come to the right place. De Flesse farm in Wenum.

name: cozy farm with fruit orchard and beautiful views
description: On our cozy farm we have a heated and comfortable caravan in the yard and a number of camping spots, where you can enjoy the view of the fruit orchard with trees that are almost two centuries old and the roaming animals, including chickens, cats, sheep, goats, a calf and horses. Located in the West Frisian countryside, 3 km from the IJsselmeer and 10 km from Enkhuizen, Hoorn and Medemblik. In the yard you can cuddle and care for all the animals, help in the vegetable garden, have a barbecue, sit around the campfire, participate in yoga classes, play games in the barn, look up at the sky in the tall grass, and much more: ) There is an outside toilet and we have a nice communal bathroom with toilet, sink and hot shower. You can also use the outdoor shower for an adventurous, refreshing (cold) shower :) A delicious breakfast with fresh local products, firewood and barbecue can be ordered/rented for an additional fee. Breakfast: €14.50 pppn Firewood : €5 / bucket BBQ : €5 / time, excluding coals (reserve this on time!)

name: Thriving Natural-oasis of Peace
description:
In our garden between 2 villages, you will live the magic of being in the middle of olive groves but in a unique oasis of great plant diversity with large pines, holm oaks, fig trees, and therefore a great variety of birds and birdsong.
You will enjoy nature, hammocks, being able to grill your own food on a barbecue and with caution campfire at night to have fun. You have access to filtered ground water, an individual equipped kitchen, a dry bathroom / outdoor cold shower and the property has an enclosed area to park bicycles, car, van or small caravan, safely.
The property has a shaded camping area, specifically for small tents and where there is a safari tent / Belltent for rent (see separate announcement). It also has a flat area with semi-shade where there is space for 3 places to park campered vans, or 2 cars with trailer caravans of max 2.5m height x 5.0m long.
Be aware:
In most Spanish country side there are dogs that watch the neighbours houses. From time to time they bark, even at night. Its something I cant control. I highly recommend for those with light sleep not book with me or bring good earplugs in case. Thank you!

name: Camping in the Schaffhausen Nature Park
description: In the middle of the nature park: Warm welcome! Here I offer you something very unique. I invite you to spend the night in the middle of the nature park under old apple trees with a biotope. You are cordially invited to set up your own camp on my camper place. Electricity and sanitary facilities are available to you. Alternatively, I offer you a rustic circus wagon with a spacious terrace, large double bed and a sofa bed. In addition, the car is equipped with heating, toilet, shower and a small kitchen. In the neighborhood: Hikers, cyclists, walkers and all nature lovers get their money's worth here. The area is ideal for bike tours to the Rhine Falls Schaffhausen Rheinau. It's just a quarter of an hour to cycle to the Rhine Falls Rheinau and Schaffhausen. Explore the vineyards or the Black Forest, the possibilities are endless. See you soon!

name: Rustic campsite in the Apuseni Mountains
description: The Camping is located in the garden behind our house where we have about 5000 square meters available for tents and campers. You can choose where you put your tent or place your camper. You can also use our hammocks to lean back or make a fire at one of the fireplaces. The bathrooms are located in the old barn, which we have renovated inside. All guests can use a spacious, partly covered terrace with kitchen and for coffee lovers we serve a delicious espresso or cappuccino in the morning. On the campsite there are 2 spacious Bell tents fully equipped for 2 people and on a separate site there is a large Mongolian yurt with private kitchen and bathroom which is equipped for 2 people. In the immediate vicinity there are many hiking or cycling opportunities, there is also a beautiful waterfall. For culture lovers it is possible to visit the fortified town of Alba Iulia or the castle of Deva and also the Corvinilor castle in Hunedoara is recommended.

name: Eco village and campsite
description:
You’ll get to enjoy…
A biodynamic living experience
Free Wifi
Electricity outlets in all accommodations and power points for caravans / RVs
Nomad working area for those who need to catch up on work
Indoor & outdoor hot shower
Bio eco-friendly compost toilet
100% vegetarian / vegan community meals prepared fresh with 100% organic vegetables from our garden
A la carte breakfast
Minimarket available for snacks, refreshments, and necessities 
Home made bread
Activities / workshops
Relaxed and fun atmosphere
Closest town, Almonte, 10-mins drive
Located beside Doñana National Park, 1-hour away from Sevilla
30 mins drive to the beach
Public transport 10 mins walk away

name: Camp under chestnut trees
description: Mountain eco camping and chalets in Montesinho National Park. Cosy and calm (family business) with a restaurant, swimming pool for adults and children and an eco-efficient shower/toilet building.

name: At the edge of the forest, cozy mini camping Westenenk
description: Our camping spot is surrounded by forest. Which means you can see the most beautiful birds and animals!  Hours of cycling and walking pleasure in the area.  For the children there is an indoor and outdoor playground, trampoline, go-karts, rabbits, ponies, chickens and cats to cuddle with.  In short, ultimate enjoyment for everyone in the beautiful Wijster in Drenthe.  If you are coming with a tent, please let us know when booking.  This is due to the fact that we have many paved areas and can therefore take into account a suitable standing plate.  Please pay tourist tax of € 1.30 pppd at the location.

name: Wild Camping-Rural and quiet pinetree haven with stunning views
description:
Wild camping we also have for hire Robens teepees  furnishings at separate prices
We have on site running water and external power points / washing / laundry facilities 
Choice of fields offering peace and tranquility 
5 miles from Helston
9 miles from Falmouth 
15 minutes from the coast in any direction
Local bus route
Many cycle routes with beautiful scenery
Amazing Horizon sunrises on a clear day and fantastic Sunsets to be experienced 
Family farm setting, growing Yule trees. (Possible room for caravans depending on size of van) as access is via a bridletrack 
Please message with any further requirements and we’ll do our best to help you!

name: Mid Wales smallholding
description: Small farm in the mid Wales hills. Stunning views, quiet fields, compost loo.

name: Idyllic natural campsite near Neuenkirchen
description: Near the Netherlands: Our self-sufficient parking space is secluded in a meadow on the edge of an old farm between fruit trees and forest and invites you to linger and rest. There are a total of three pitches for caravans, mobile homes, vans or tents on the old horse paddock. Pets are welcome to bring along. To discover in the area: Whether it's a bike trip to the Lüneburg Heath, a visit to Heide-Park Soltau, a visit to the Soltau thermal baths or simply a walk through forest and meadows, the parking space is an ideal starting point for all of this. Furthermore, the Serengeti Park Hodenhagen, the bird park Walsrode, the Snow Dome in Bispingen, Schumacher's go-kart track and many other destinations on the Lüneburg Heath and the Heidekreis are easily accessible and nearby. We look forward to your visit to the Levermanns-Hof.

name: Camper place in the Achterhoek
description: Nice Camping in the beautiful countryside between the cows. The area is wonderfully quiet. Wake up with the chirping of the birds. The farm is a wonderful base for cycling or walking routes or just relaxing in the silence of the Gelderland landscape. Our farm is located in the beautiful town of Zwiep. (municipality of Lochem) In Zwiep you will find the De Witte Wieven and De Zwiepse mill, where you can go for a nice lunch or dinner! It is accessible within walking distance. At our location there is a Rest Point stall, where you can buy coffee, tea, walking / cycling routes and homemade products at a low price. The stall will be open again from April 8, 2023! On arrival you will see a sign with my phone number on it and instructions on it. You can call or app me. Am I unavailable? You may park your vehicle in the parking space or on the meadow. In the course of the day I will be back at the location and I will be happy to help you further. You are very welcome here!

name: Atmospheric campsite in Haulerwijk, near Veenhuizen and Bakkeveen
description: Original mini camping with tea garden and special accommodations. You can light a fire with us and we are happy to spoil you with a delicious breakfast and introductory tickets for the Open Air Swimming Pool. Within walking distance of the village of Haulerwijk and within cycling distance of Veenhuizen, Bakkeveen, Norg and Fochteloerveen. Do you want to go a little further away? Assen and Groningen are only half an hour away. There is a bus stop in front of the door and you can rent bicycles within walking distance. We operate as sustainable a business as possible.

name: Campsite Wieringerwaard
description: Are you looking for peace and freedom? Then you have come to the right place! Waking up to the vast meadows in your 'backyard'. Who wouldn't want that? Setting the alarm clock is not necessary at our campsite, the cows are only too happy to do that for you. This farm campsite is located in the North Holland village of Wieringerwaard, which is part of the municipality of Hollands-Kroon. At the moment we have 15 places available for use.

name: Nature camping near the mouth of the Elbe
description: Welcome to our nature campsite Our self-sufficient camper place is located on an idyllic meadow. Despite the secluded location, the district town of Itzehoe is only 5 km away. Our farm is 500m away and offers a milk filling station with a small range of local products. In the near vicinity For the brave campers, the Hungriger Wolf sports airfield is less than 2 km away, where parachuting is offered, for example. Otherwise, a day trip to the Wadden Sea, the Hanseatic city of Hamburg or a leisurely stroll through Itzehoe is always worthwhile. There's a lot to discover here!

name: Nature camping near the North Sea
description: Switch off in a rural setting Welcome to Bokhorst, located between Neumünster and the Wadden Sea. The offered area is located in a very rural area outside of a small town. Surrounded by fields, the environment invites you to switch off and slow down. In the camper or tent I welcome families, as well as couples or single travelers on my nature camping with electricity. A bathroom with shower and toilet is available in a separate building. Shops are available in Schenefeld / Wacken, about 5 km away. Excursions in the area At the top of the list are, of course, the North and Baltic Seas as “must-go-to” excursion destinations. A beach experience perfect for the whole family. The opposite forest is ideal for walking, and the mill pond (Schenefeld, 4 km) is ideal for cooling off on warm summer days. Visit the Kiel Canal (7 km), Eckernförde (52 km), Büsum (37 km), or take a day trip to the port city of Kiel. I am happy to help you with daily planning and questions!

name: Camping by the stream in the district of Munich
description: Since we ourselves are on the road a lot and then our huge property is just standing around empty, especially in the most beautiful summer months, which is actually a shame, we want to offer campers the opportunity with campspace to enjoy nature in the Munich district. Our fenced, beautiful garden with a large lawn, many old trees with shade, stream access directly in the garden for swimming and fishing, terrace with garden furniture and barbecue, sandpit for the kiddies, ninja slackline, large trampoline, swing, water and electricity access in the garden , offer a wonderful retreat, but in close proximity to Munich. The Unterschleißheim bathing lake can be reached in 5 minutes by car or in 10 minutes by bike.

name: Lisbon/Sintra Coast
description:
We invite you to spend some nights camping at our campspace on our farm Quinta da Requeijada Grande, in Janas village near Sintra. We are located 3.5Km from the sea and 7Km from Sintra. You will be meeting guests from all over the world and experience community sharing facilities. We have an organic vegetable garden, many animals and a swimming pool you can enjoy.

There are coffees bars, restaurants, and grocery shops, within a 5 minutes walking distance. We are only 3km away from the Atlantic ocean, with many beaches, including Praia das Maças, coastal cliffs great for hiking, and even a natural pool in Azenhas do Mar. We are 7km away from the center of Sintra, where you must explore our castle, palaces, the Serra de Sintra and taste our many Portuguese treats. Lisbon is a 30 minute car ride away, or 40 minutes by train, from Sintra.

name: Rustic orchard
description: Hello, everyone. We have a rustic property from around 1827 on the outside. What awaits you there? A lot of nature awaits you on three hectares of land where you can look for a quiet spot. You can also look at the pond in the foresight of nature. You can taste our organic apples on site. At dusk, something extraordinary sometimes comes out of the woods. They are wild mouflons. There are many hiking/pilgrimage routes. In Bitburg (10km away) there is a swimming pool as well as loads of shops and a brewery tour accessible by bus! The Luxembourg border with the Luxembourg "Switzerland" and the Müllertal is not far by car. We look forward to getting to know you as guests.

name: Quiet camping between nature and the city center
description: Unique place to camp in a 1 hectare forest in a park area within the ring of Herentals close to the city center and nature. Perfect place for a city visit or a walking or bike ride. Canoeing is possible at 100 meters and Bobbejaanland can be reached on foot via a walking route along the Kleine Nete without crossing a street! Firewood for the Campfire available on request!

name: Old sawmill
description: We offer three private RV/RV/campervan pitches. For a day break, overnight stay or as a place for a short trip. The pitches are paved, subdivided, green, partially shaded and equipped with a 16A CCE power connection. With a size of 9x5m also suitable for XL vehicles. Vehicles over 10m in length have also found space here. - A separate parking space for trailers is available. Please contact us before arrival. You are on the outskirts in a quiet location with an unobstructed view of a meadow with a forest edge. From time to time you can see deer grazing here, which sometimes come right up to the square at night. On some sunny days, the glider pilots are out and about from the nearby glider airfield and do their rounds quietly. Gray water disposal and fresh water supply is available. Black water disposal possible. Only for toilet cassettes and only for guests. A small, cozy seating area with the possibility of grilling is at your disposal. In a garden hut you will find information about the area, excursion destinations and shopping opportunities, etc.

name: beautiful view over the Italian hills
description: Just imagine..... After a day of traveling you arrive at your destination, a bit overcooked, but that does not matter because now the holiday really starts. You install yourself with the tent on one of the beautiful spots that I Magnoni has and then enjoy the beautiful view in front of the tent. You don't have to think about anything because tonight you eat an Italian meal at I Magnoni. You just sit down at a long table under the grapevines. Italian life has begun. The next morning you wake up and a breakfast with a nice fresh egg is waiting for you, or there is a freshly baked brown bread waiting for you. Just what you order. During breakfast you make plans for the day. What will it be today? Taking it easy for a day, reading in the shade of the large oak tree and an occasional splash in the pool? Fancy a trip to one of the many small picturesque Italian villages in the area? Nice walk through the hills of the Marchegian landscape?. Visiting the impressive caves of Frassasi? Or go on a nice wine tour? There are a number of nice addresses in the information book for dinner, so that will also be fine. Fortunately, you will stay for a few more days, so for today it is “DOLCE FAR NIENTE”

name: Mini campsite with phenomenal views of Alicante and the Sea
description: Are you looking for a nice, cozy and quiet mini campsite? Then you have come to the right place. We have a great promotion for you: Every 7th night for free!!! Book with code: ACTION to take advantage of this offer. Finca Familia is run by a Dutch family who followed their dream in 2020. Our beautiful Finca is quietly located in the campo with phenomenal views of Alicante and the Sea. The cities of Alicante and Elche, the beach and the airport can all be reached in 15 - 20 minutes by car. There are also 2 beautiful golf courses in the immediate vicinity of the campsite. We are small-scale, which guarantees peace and quiet and your pets are also very welcome. For € 15.00 per night (max. 2 pers. + pet) we offer: spacious pitches, showers, toilets, washbasins, a washing-up area, separate toilet discharge area, water, large swimming pool with sunbeds and umbrellas, a common area and the feeling that you are welcome! For an additional fee we offer electricity, shopping service, laundry, pool table, dog sitting, taxi service to any desired location. If you do not have your own tent, caravan or camper or if family and/or friends want to visit you while you are staying here, you can now also book our Carpa Delujo. This luxury glamping tent is fully equipped for a carefree holiday. Overall a lovely place to stay. We look forward to welcoming you at our Finca.

name: Dreaming away in Limburg nature
description: This camping spot is beautifully situated on the hill of the Lodge op de Berg domain, surrounded by lots of greenery and provided with a particularly hospitable service by Gaëlle and Thierry! The camping pitch has a large wooden platform with a unique panorama over the pond and the hilly meadows. 20m further there is a compost toilet and at 300m walking distance right through the domain there is a particularly beautiful outdoor shower in the oak forest with warm running water, only for your use! GSM can be charged in the shed (250m away).

name: Real private campsite, good sanitary facilities and 4 km from the beach
description: For campers we have a place behind our company where no one comes. Set up your camper/caravan and enjoy the view and all the possibilities. At 4 km from the beach and dunes/forest. For overnight stays we have a fully paved location next to the farm.

name: Mini campsite with food forest and off the grid spots in lovely Drenthe
description: The Camping offers camping and off the grid spots in the middle of a beautiful food forest. It is also possible to spend the night in one of our retro caravans. We are a quiet campsite where enjoying nature is number 1. There is much to discover on the site itself and during a walk you can enjoy all the beautiful flowers that bloom. The surrounding area invites you to take a lovely walk or bike ride. For example, take a look at the Hunebeds. Borger and Stadkanaal are 10 minutes away. If you don't come for all the sights, but to come to yourself, then the off the grid places are what you are looking for. Surrounded by greenery you have your own place, with a campfire place. If you would like more information, please contact us, we hope to see you soon at Camping.

name: Babou Maramures campsite and hostel
description: Babous campsite is situated in the garden behind our house where we have around 6000 square metres available for tents and campers.  You can choose where you want to pitch your tent or place your camper. You can also make use of our hammocks to sit back and relax or make a fire at one of the fire places. The bathrooms are located in the old barn, which we renovated from the inside. At our campsite we sell some wine and beer and at 1 kilometre distance there are two small shops where you can buy basic products. Also there are two local village bars but no restaurant. For your bigger shopping or eating out, the nearest options are in Ocna ?ugatag (8 km.) of Sighetu Marma?iei (25 km.).  We have a tent for rent -for a minimum stay of two nights-. In the tent, which is meant for one or two persons, you will find a double matras and bed linen. If you hire the tent, you can use the kitchen in the hostel and of course the bathrooms. From your tent youll have a great view over the mountains! A lot of activities can be done from the hostel,   like hiking in the surrounding fields, forests and mountains, visit local markets and old wooden churches, take a swim in the salt baths of the neighbouring village, and best of all, observe traditional village life. You can also rent one of our mountain bikes and bike in the forest or to the neighbouring villages. If you have any other wishes, things you want to do or questions, please let us know and we will try our best to work it out! Our access road: The last 900 metres through the village are on an unpaved road, which means the road is covered with gravel and small stones. For cars, this is no problem, we drive here every day. Small campers and caravans also can reach our campsite, although we advise you to slow down your speed to a minimum. After all, it are only 900 metres. Unfortunately, the road is not suited for caravans. Campers up untill 6 metres in lenght can reach our place.

name: Quiet rural area near the Hoogwatergeul
description: Small-scale camping spots in a beautiful walking / cycling environment. There are also plenty of rivers in the vicinity where beautiful fishing spots have been created. You can also enjoy canoeing between the bird meadows. In the winter period from October 31 to April 1, the showers and toilets are not available. There is tap water and electricity

name: Lovely place in the countryside
description: It is wonderfully quiet here, a place where the sounds of nature have the upper hand. On our land is a nice bee trail with varied nature and of course an apiary. We have horses, cows, sheep, chickens, peacocks and an aviary with tropical birds. We look forward to welcoming you!

name: Camping at our mini campsite among the horses on the edge of the Eendenkooi nature reserve
description: Mini campsite with 15 camping pitches. Motorhome camping, tents, caravans. Caravan for rent and B&B rooms Pony riding for children up to 12 years. At 3 nights pony rides if you help to take care of the horses. Ride tough like a cowboy with a western saddle Various courses with our ponies and horses, such as horse whispering and horse coaching, meditation, reiki, healing for adults. Camping among our horses and ponies. Coaching conversations. Beautiful walking and cycling routes through the Betuwe and the river area. Many attractions in the area. Like ; The Duck Decoy Nature Reserve in Waardenburg Tennis court Waardenburg Estate Marienweerdt Neerijnen Castle Canoeing on the Linge Go-kart track Zaltbommel Swimming pool Geldermalsen Swimming pool Zaltbommel And of course much more. Prices camping; €18.50 for 1 person with 1 car, caravan or camper, motorcycle or tent, 2 cyclists with tent, including 16 ampere electricity, environmental tax, VAT, including tourist tax € 1.50 per night per person B&B rooms 1 person €105,- including breakfast 2 persons€115,- including breakfast

name: Short break/spa vacation in Bruchhausen-Vilsen
description: Don't feel like "close to close" either? With the mobile home you actually book freedom and individuality and in the end you are back in "row house style". I offer you an individual and private camper place in the Xanadi Heilehaus in the climatic health resort of Bruchhausen-Vilsen/Wöpse. My pitch is suitable for self-sufficient campers and offers a break from everyday life. Here it is important to find peace and quiet in nature. Activities in the region: Walks and long bike tours in Sellingsloh, which is right on the doorstep, are ideal. In addition, the Vilser-Holz (fitness trail/spa gardens/concerts) and the beautiful surrounding area can only be warmly recommended. The town of Bruchhausen-Vilsen has many leisure activities, a small town center and restaurants and events for every taste and age.

name: Mevissen Garden Camping
