description: With us behind the house. With a view of the Heinsberger Land. It is best to drive into the playground via a grass path. This is signposted from the playground. See also the image of the aerial view.

name: Peaceful place on the farm
description: Camping in peace at an old farm. Located 15 minutes from Ypres center, 15 minutes from Diksmuide and 30 minutes from the coast. Zoo de Zonneglow just 2 km away. Ideal for passing through, for cycling in the area or just to enjoy the peace between the fields. There are also flat paved places to park the mobile home. Electricity is possible with an extension cable. It is a real camp space without much luxury (and that is the intention). But lots of peace and wild animals such as pheasants, rabbits, all kinds of birds, ducks, ..

name: Egebæk's shelter site and space for motorhome and tent
description: Welcome to Egebæk's shelter site, where we also have space for motorhomes and tents. Shopping is 600 meters away 800 meters to the train station. 5 meters to the cycle path to Ribe, the Wadden Sea Centre, Rømø, Skærbæk or Mandø, Close to Gränsestien. - Shelter site We have just built a completely unique barbecue hut with 2 shelters. Toilet and shower are included in the price. The barbecue hut with cold and hot water is part of the experience. The two shelters can be rented together or individually. They can also be used for family parties, camp school and scout camps. WIFI and electricity are available. The shelters have a net curtain that reduces the wind by 80%. You can still feel that you are in the middle of nature. In connection with the shelters, we have space for 2 tents or motorhomes. - Motorhome or tent We also have 2 spaces for a motorhome or tent. They have access to a barbecue hut, shower and toilet. There is WIFI, electricity and water. Bath/toilet is shared by the 2 shelters and the 2 campsites.

name: Light Tree Camp
description: The last great forests of Europe invite you in untouched nature with crystal clear rivers, natural waterfalls and fairytale hiking trails for young and old. Our small, protected family campsite awaits you in the middle of wooded mountains (the last primeval forest in Europe). The terrain is easily passable for vehicles with ample ground clearance. The idyllic peace, paired with the sounds of the animals in the surrounding forest, the murmur of the nearby springs where you can relax, make this place a nature experience. A campfire site in the center of the free space and hammocks on the meadow orchard pull you out of the familiar everyday life and lead you back into your primal connection - the natural cycle. A shower and washing machine are available for use. A rustic composting toilet is available a little away from the maximum of 10 camping pitches. In an absolutely secluded location, exploring the area by hiking is an adventure with a 360-degree all-round view of the Bosnian wooded mountain landscape. The spring water springs from a natural stone basin directly on our farm, which freshly drunk invigorates the spirit and cleanses the body. We also offer freshly baked bread every day, as well as homemade and refined alcoholic drinks (liqueurs, fruit brandy...), cakes, jams, our own honey, organic eggs from the farm and much more. All of the animals that live on the farm are tame and are especially fun for children.

name: Permaculture smallholding in walled garden
description: Explore our small one hectare permacultural farm, a gem nestled in a picturesque area, abundantly dotted with sunflower fields and vineyards during the summer months. This secure permacultural farm, protected by a door and surrounded by a robust wall, offers a breathtaking panoramic view that will delight your senses. Home to a traditional barn and two functional sheds, this enclosed permaculture garden also offers shaded areas for well-deserved rest. Our farm, a true haven of biodiversity, invites you to admire our serene pond, a lush vegetable garden and a diversified outdoor poultry breeding, including ducks, chickens, guinea fowl and quail. Immerse yourself in the experience of our small permaculture and poultry farm in the open air - a real treat for the eyes and soul.

name: nomad on the farm
description: Sleep next to dwarf goats, under century-old trees, view of the ribatejana nature next to a stream and a Zen ornamental pond, lulled by the song of birds, crickets and other cicadas.

name: Quiet campsite between sea and mountains in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur
description: Located in the heart of a magnificent park of century-old oak trees, our campsite in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur is a real haven of peace and tranquility for outdoor holidays by the sea and in the mountains. Enjoy a stay on a human scale in a little corner of paradise, ideal for recharging your batteries and resting surrounded by nature. Discover our family accommodation and outdoor activities such as mountain hiking or nautical activities for an unforgettable holiday. Book now and live a unique camping experience combining sea and mountains in a place full of charm.

name: Micro camping in Leipzig
description: Almost in the middle of the city, but still with a lot of nature around We live on the outskirts of Leipzig, the most beautiful city center in Germany, in Böhlitz-Ehrenberg. There is plenty of space for campers (up to 9 m) on our mobile home site. We offer you a barbecue area with gas grill, electricity, cold water and a large meadow where you can feel good. The local supermarket is 100 m away and the tram stop to the city center is just 150 m from the square. A local soccer field, the floodplain forest and a horse stable are centrally located for children. Adventure tours around Leipzig Visit the numerous sights in Leipzig: A visit with the children to the ZOO, a visit to the Monument to the Battle of the Nations, the Nikolai and Thomas Church, the old and new town hall, Coffe Baum, the main train station, the opera, the Gewandhaus, the Panorama Tower - the possibilities are endless . Stroll through the old town, stop in one of the many cafés and restaurants and enjoy the shopping opportunities at Brühl. Welcome! Renata/Egon

name: "Baldi's campsite" on Lake Senftenberg
description: Hi! About our garden pitch: Camping with us is only intended for nice people ;-). You are our guest in our private garden. We are family and employed, so we cannot accommodate every booking request. If we have time and desire, we are happy to receive guests. If you make a booking request, it would be nice if we could learn more about you... We don't run a commercial campsite! Families or groups are welcome. However, we expect mutual consideration. We are located 200m from Lake Senftenberg. in a residential area. If you arrive by car, please book an additional parking space. A dog has recently joined our family. You should be fine with that. We will not "chain" him or lock him up for guests. Electricity, water and toilet are available. There is a small kitchen with a fridge and a coffee maker. What you can discover with us: Of course, the Senftenberger See, The Senftenberger See offers a beautiful lawn, various restaurants and boat rentals just 100m away from our garden parking space. The Senftenberg can also be reached quickly via a footpath and cycle path along the lake shore. The Spreewald is also worth a visit. Our garden parking space offers the perfect starting point for a day trip to Dresden.

name: Waking up in the morning in the middle of the forest on the border of the heath
description: Small private hobby farmer with sheep chicken ducks and pigs close to Heerenveen 1.5 km from the supermarket

name: Family campsite in the heart of a preserved vineyard - Chez Franck et Sophie
description: Come and spend an unforgettable holiday in the heart of unspoiled nature, in our peaceful family campsite nestled in the heart of a magnificent vineyard in New Aquitaine. We offer you a quiet location for a quiet and relaxing holiday, with a multitude of outdoor activities for the whole family. Discover the pleasures of hiking or cycling, go on a sightseeing tour or even enjoy a wine tasting to discover the local gastronomy. Our campsite invites you to relaxation and well-being, for a rejuvenating stay in the middle of unspoiled landscapes. Book now for a worry-free holiday!

name: Ideal for those who like to sleep under the stars with the sound of the river. .
description:
The campsite extends completely along the river and thus allows you to view Kolpa directly from your tent, campsite-trailer or camper van.

All camping sites are spacious and are located on a grassy lawn under the canopy of trees. Our guests can choose their favorite camping area. You can choose from a shady or sunny location as you wish.

All camping sites are close to the toilet, sports and children's playground, restaurants and reception.

New pitches are available for caravans and motorhomes.

The pitches are paved and spacious, equipped with electricity, water and drainage, close to equipped toilet facilities and with the possibility of a campervan drop-off (Chem WC).

name: Camping with a wood fire in Twente? You can do that in our garden! -
description: You will find our Campspace on our own road in Bornerbroek, in the middle of the beautiful country of Twente. Enthusiastic about our own (roof) tent holidays, we like to share this place. Here you can enjoy the peace and nature, walk barefoot through the morning dew or just go out. Our house is located in the nature reserve 'de Doorbraak' near the Nijreesbos. In the meadows around our house you regularly see deer, hares, rabbits, pheasants, many birds and also the sheep of the neighbors. In addition, our chickens (Max, Bliksem, Kota, Fluffy, Blacky, Flanny, Rooster, Maximus, Johanna, Kato & Giraffe), cats (Musj & Wilhelmina) and our dog (Ares) roam around the yard. You will discover the area through one of the many walking/cycling/MTB routes, two of which run past our house. In the pleasant center of Almelo (5 km) there are a number of cultural hotspots such as the Wevershuisje, the Bolletje Museum, the City Museum and Huize Almelo where the current count lives. You will also find fine restaurants and cafes. On the other side of our house you can discover the surprising town of Delden (10km), where the Salt Museum is located. There is also Landgoed Twickel with beautiful gardens and walking/cycling routes. To enjoy the crackling wood fire and the accompanying singing, you can borrow a fire bowl and buy some. wood with us. You will have to sing yourself. Within walking distance (500m) is a fine Twente restaurant with a miniature golf course. So if you don't feel like cooking, want to grab a nice drink on the terrace or hit a ball, you can! Our sanitary facilities are deliberately basic: we offer cold water from the tap at home and a compost toilet. 'Henig An, enjoy!'

name: New: Quiet, romantic view of the Alps from €8 in the Auerbergland in the countryside in 86986
description: Quiet, secluded location in the beautiful Pfaffenwinkel/Auerbergland gives you peace and serenity for a few days or as a stopover Welcome to 86986 Schwabbruck, from here it is not far to many sights and your desired activities in Pfaffenwinkel and beyond

name: El Palmar, Cádiz. FKK/Naturist Space
description: Parking for MH and Campers in the garden of our private house. Swimming pool, solar shower, Wi-Fi, light, water discharge and barbecue. 400 m to the best beach in the world ;). Naturist beach. Clothing optional space. Max 2 parking pitches. FKK.

name: Domain of Villateux
description: Campsite located in the countryside. Ideal quiet place to relax. Possible excursions in the surroundings.

name: Camping at the Eixendorfer See in Bavaria
description: Pure relaxation right on the Eixendorfer See I offer you a van and camper place on my camping meadow right on the lake. Electricity and sanitary facilities with warm showers, toilets and fresh drinking water provide the necessary comfort. Families and dog lovers are welcome here, as are couples, friends or solo travellers. Adventure region "Eixendorfer See" The Eixendorfer See is located near Neuburg directly in front of the forest and is perfect for water sports enthusiasts, anglers, campers and hikers. The lake circuit with 15 km is only recommended. Around the lake there are numerous restaurants and resting places that invite you to spoil yourself with culinary delights and to unwind. Experienced cyclists will get their money's worth on the Schwarzachtal cycle path. There really is something for everyone here. Welcome!

name: Garden campsite with a villa view near Jena
description: Charming villa surrounded by beautiful mature trees The garden of our listed villa offers plenty of space for a camping break. You can explore the garden, sit by the fire, have a barbecue or lie in the hammock. With a bit of luck there will be sheep near the campsite. In the garden there is a separate sanitary building with hot water showers, toilets and sinks. There is also an outdoor kitchen for washing up and (after consultation) cooking. In the area there are many opportunities, especially for nature lovers, such as hiking, cycling and water sports. We recommend, for example, the Hohenwarte Stausee Weg or alternatively the very short but nice hiking trail on the Zechsteinriff directly in Pößneck. How about a day trip to Jena or to the Thuringian Slate Mountains/Upper Saale Nature Park Warm welcome!

name: Vacation at the holiday farm
description: In the middle of the green you can experience a few relaxing days in complete peace. Just a few meters from your pitch is our holiday farm, where rescued animals of all kinds find a home. There is a lot to experience here for young and old. Donkey hikes, riding lessons and much more.

name: Nature camping in the forest in Saxony
description: Welcome to our nature campsite in the forest! We offer two parking spaces for you. The "Bachgemurmel" pitch offers you space for up to three tents and is located in a clearing on a brook loop. Tables and benches are available. You can set up a campfire in two places. There is a forest pond nearby where you can fish with a fishing permit. The second pitch "Dreiländerblick" is located on a mountain with a wonderful view of the sunrise. You can see as far as the Jizera and Giant Mountains On the move! Our nature campsite is part of the "Community" surface sculpture along the sculpture path between Herrnhut and Großhennersdorf. There are shopping opportunities for you in Herrnhut (2 km) and we recommend a visit to the Eulkretscham restaurant just one kilometer away. Within a radius of 30km there are numerous cities worth seeing such as Dresden, exciting museums, large bathing lakes, outdoor pools, high ropes course, rock climbing opportunities, rubber boat tours on the Neisse and much more

name: Motorhome area in the middle of nature with river and waterfall
description: Welcome to our private motorhome and bivouac area in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, located in the heart of nature with a river and a waterfall nearby. Take advantage of a peaceful and green setting to recharge your batteries and spend one or more nights in nature camping in our establishment. We offer motorhome pitches and bivouac areas from €10/night, including tourist tax. Visitor access is €1/person, while picnics are offered at €2/adult for site maintenance. Children under 12 can picnic for free. Our place is protected and private, thus offering a unique and authentic experience in the middle of nature with waterfall, motorhome, bivouac and outdoor stay. To access our site, please introduce yourself to Mr. Guigues, our owner. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information or to book your stay with us.

name: Camping with a sauna
description: Nicely located place right next to our farm, right next to the camp space there is a toilet, shower and sauna

name: Camping by the water
description: Camping on a farm campsite in the middle of nature and near the water. With unobstructed views and beautiful sunsets, where you can relax.

name: Camping Park The Black Water
description: We are a small, cozy campsite with spacious camping pitches of 140 m2, our own water tap, free WiFi, and a cozy campfire place, which can be enjoyed with several campers in the evening. In 2022, the campsite will have the following innovations: - a new sanitary spacious opportunity with 3 showers 3 toilets - a room with a kitchen unit for washing dishes The campsite is located on a large forest area called the Stempelberg and a characteristic forest area called De Sijp. Extensive walking areas, cycling routes, horseback riding routes. We have 3 new walking routes. Discover the nature around camping park the black water and get to know the farmers. Waterplas de Rooie Plas is the possibility to swim this is free and possibly. water ski cozy terrace Large playing field and close to Toverland amusement park, Hemelrijk, strawberry farm Museums, a lot of history in the municipality of Gemert Bakel to visit Just to the peace and space We welcome everyone with a cup of coffee Brabant fun

name: Peaceful and rejuvenating campsite with our donkeys - Ferme la Ravena
description: Discover Ferme la Ravena, a haven of peace located at the entrance to a charming village in Haute-Saonois at an altitude of 310 m, offering superb panoramas in the heart of the Southern Vosges. Easy to access, our donkeys welcome you with their warm braying for an authentic experience in the heart of nature, ideal for a stay on the farm, a weekend in the countryside, a romantic getaway or an unusual family vacation. Carole and Ghislain, passionate about nature and their region, offer you a personalized welcome in this rural gîte, accompanied by our 3 adorable donkeys and other farm animals. Enjoy moments of complicity by brushing them at will for their greatest pleasure (and yours!) and discover the family activities offered by our educational farm. Explore the region through horseback riding, sightseeing tours and rural heritage. La Ferme la Ravena is the ideal starting point for a stay focused on green tourism, ecotourism and the discovery of nature. The toilets: Sanitary block open 24 hours a day with WC, washbasin, shower Outdoor sink with drainer and hot water Tap and jet of cold drinking water Equipment: Large hangar for storing bicycles, motorbikes, quads or horse-drawn carriages Pasture with shelter to accommodate your horse (supplement) and sleep nearby Equestrian accommodation for mountain holidays with your favorite animal Barbecue available Tables and benches in our "unusual barrel" and under the shed Fridge available under the shed Brochures with ideas for outings and activities nearby, for a relaxation and well-being experience Book your stay at Ferme la Ravena now and experience a unique adventure in harmony with nature.

name: Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes campsite: unique stay with sled dogs in the heart of the Vercors
description: Immerse yourself in nature by staying on our one-hectare site in the heart of the Vercors natural park, in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes. Enjoy a memorable stay discovering the joys of sled dogs and sleeping near our kennel, which is home to 7 adorable dogs. However, keep in mind that our dogs can bark at night if a fox or rabbit passes. Our outdoor accommodation is located just 10 minutes from the Col de Rousset resort, offering easy access to mountain activities, whether hiking in summer or winter sports. Many hiking departures are accessible at the foot of our house, allowing you to explore the wonders of the Vercors. In our family campsite in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, you can share our bathroom and kitchen while enjoying the friendliness of the place. Our land is perfect for nature holidays with family or friends, combining relaxation and outdoor adventures. Don't miss the opportunity to live a unique dog sled experience during your stay at our campsite in the heart of Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes. Come and recharge your batteries in an idyllic setting and enjoy the hospitality of our campsite, where we will be delighted to welcome you.

name: Farm camping in the Lüneburg Heath
description: Agricamping on the farm: Warm welcome. I offer you a self-sufficient and private tent and camper place with electricity on a well-kept farm in a quiet location. Perfect to relax and unwind. Fresh water and WiFi incl. In the small regional farm shop you can buy eggs, pasta, potatoes, meat, jam and sausages within walking distance (Hof Brockmann, Weißenkamp). The perfect starting point: Attention active vacationers! There is a lot to discover in the area. Various tourist activities such as Heide Park Soltau, Weltvogelpark Walsrode, Serengeti Park Hodenhagen, Felto-Filzwelt, Soltau Therme, golf course, various museums can be reached within a maximum driving time of 30 minutes. The region is also ideal for cycling tours to Soltau or Riensheide. It is just 5 km to Soltau and approx. 10 km to Dorfmark. See you soon!

name: Camping the sea of the Kattegat
description: Does vacation mean relaxing in nature for you? Then come to our cozy and small nature campsite! With us you can celebrate your holiday and completely relax and all that in the middle of nature. Come celebrate your holiday with us and experience the beauty and tranquility. You can spend the night on the camping field, in a hut, in the tipi, bungalow or in the apartment. The large camping field has electricity for up to 18 places at each pitch. The sea view field is only for tents, has no electricity, but does have a great view. The camping field has a view of the sea of the Kattegat. So you can also choose to just take a shower, or to take a refreshing dip in the sea. Both the sea and the bathing room are a very short walk from your tent or caravan. By the way, from the beach you can spot seals on the sandbank, the seals are showing themselves more and more often.

name: Nice camping in the forest by the alpine river Savinja
description:
Forest Camping in the village of Loke at town Mozirje is a charming campsite in the middle of forest offering various types of accommodations, pitches with electricity for tents, campers, vans, trailers and creative experience of outdoor leisure activities amidst magnificent nature. 
The whole campsite is located in NATURA 2000 area, so there for any stereo music is not allowed in the campsite at any time of the stay. Music of the nature surroundings and its animals will bring you even more satisfaction.

Bathing in the river that flows by the site is virtually impossible to resist, offering perfect refreshment. In addition to accommodation, we also offer a varied range of sports activities, while the easy going types may prefer to relax in the tree crowns, perhaps with a book from our unique library set up for the bookworms among our guests. 
The guests can meet and mingle in different common areas. One is an open air fireplace for grilling or for evening socialising; the other is roofed and includes a fully equipped kitchen where you can get your first morning coffee or tea from our herb garden, as well as any other little thing you may have forgotten to take with you. Is there anything better than grilling a trout against the background music of guitar and rustling of the river? 
Toilets are located near the accomodations area. The area of Forest camping has Wi-Fi internet access, a mobile stage for events and workshops, a mini library, and several sports facilities (backetball playground, small football playground)– all you need to get up close and personal with nature. 
Our offer involves a range of sports activities suitable for guests of all ages. At the campsite, you can play volleyball or speed badminton (or speedminton), put your balance to test in slacklining or rent a bicycle to discover the surroundings. 
Working with the local company, we also organize activities for the adrenaline persons: whitewater rafting, canyoning, kayaking, paragliding, and many others.
Our mission is rounded off with an adjusted offer and organization of a variety of theme-based, arts or popular workshops. There is also a children's playground with a sensory box and many games for our youngest guests.

name: Nature camping on the Müggelspree in Berlin
description: Pure relaxation on the Müggelspree My property is located in Berlin Köpenick in the middle of nature and directly on the Müggelspree, but the center of Berlin is easy to reach in 20 minutes. I have my own caravan on the property, apart from that I do not serve any other guests on the pitch. You can park almost all types of vehicles and tents on the property. Power connection, toilet, hot shower and barbecue provide the necessary comfort. Your four-legged friends are also very welcome. Natural relaxation oasis The Müggelspree extends over a fantastically beautiful forest and meadow landscape. Here you can admire a rich animal world. Dragonflies, kingfishers, gray herons and birds of prey find their home here, with a bit of luck you will see an osprey. Whether on foot, by bike or by boat from the water, there is a lot to discover here. In the north you will find sandy beaches, bathing spots and canoe rentals. A widely branched and well-developed network of cycle paths leads around the lake. Welcome!

name: Cycling, walking, enjoying and relaxing at Camping Lagoudalie
description: Welcome to the nature campsite Lagoudalie in Dégagnac, located in the Lot in France, on the border of the Dordogne. Surrounded by an impressive nature rich in famous villages and tourist sites, our Lagoudalie campsite is the ideal starting point for excursions to must-see destinations such as Sarlat, Roque Gageac, Rocamadour or Cougnac or Lascaux in Occitanie. You can choose from our 25 spacious pitches of 200 m2 each, shaded or sunny, to install your tent, caravan or motorhome. For those looking for a little more comfort, we also offer three fully equipped vacation homes for rent, on our 10-acre property with beautiful views and a variety of wooded and open lands. As a cycling campsite for many years, we are proud of our hilly region that offers many opportunities for cycling, mountain biking and electric bicycles, for cycling enthusiasts. We also offer a range of activities to suit all tastes, such as hiking, canoeing, via ferrata or climbing in the forest, for those who prefer a more active holiday. Our sanitary building was completely renovated in 2023 and offers modern facilities of high quality. You can also enjoy our large swimming pool with bar and cozy terrace to relax and enjoy the sun. In short, if you are looking for a spacious and quiet nature campsite with a relaxed atmosphere and many activities nearby, look no further: Our Lagoudalie campsite is the perfect place for you. Book now for an unforgettable stay in the Lot in France, in Occitanie.

name: Meadow with trees and calm within an organic farm
description: Welcome to our organic farm in New Aquitaine, a haven of peace located in a wooded and green park where you can relax in peace. We offer farm camping with glamping facilities for a luxury wilderness experience. We are proud of our dairy cows whose quality milk is transformed into delicious local products which you can discover and buy in our shop. To enhance your stay, we provide a range of leisure facilities such as a pétanque court, barbecue, trampoline, table tennis table and bicycles for hire to explore the surrounding area. We also have a shower and an outdoor toilet for your comfort. For lovers of walks, we recommend that you discover the magnificent path reserved for bicycles and pedestrians along the Dordogne river, which is located near our village. This 30 km walk offers breathtaking views of the region. In summer, don't miss our gourmet market on Wednesday evenings, where you can discover local products, especially duck, as well as our own beef and homemade fries. You can also dance to the music hosted by a DJ. We also offer farm camping with activities for children. The surroundings are also full of activities for all tastes, such as kayaking, visits to castles and caves to explore, such as the famous caves of Lascaux. The neighboring towns are also to be discovered for their heritage and their cultural activities, such as the Nouvelle-Aquitaine campsite. Finally, we have three adorable dogs who love meeting new friends and making sure your stay goes smoothly. Book now to take advantage of our organic farm, our local products and all the activities it offers for a memorable stay. Come and discover glamping on the farm in New Aquitaine for a return to basics and an immersion in nature.

name: Nice camping in the forest by the alpine river Savinja
description:

name: View of the countryside in the Unterallgäu
description: Idyllic parking space in the Lower Allgäu Welcome to our quiet and idyllic parking space on the outskirts with a wide view of the countryside! Our meadow pitch is ideal for tents, caravans, van der motorhomes, you will find a power connection and drinking water. You are cordially invited to end the evening with a campfire. We also welcome four-legged friends. We have fresh baked goods on site every Wednesday and Saturday! Thanks to our fruit and vegetable garden, there is a free guest gift (if seasonally available). Excursions in the area Our parking space offers the perfect starting point for numerous excursion destinations in the immediate vicinity (Therme Bad Wörishofen, Skyline Park Bad Wörishofen, historic old town of Memmingen and Mindelheim, Katzbrui mill with beer garden, Mindeltal cycle path and much more). The town of Landsberg am Lech (approx. 30 km) and the Ammersee (approx. 60 km) can also be easily reached by car. A field path begins 50m from the parking space, which can be the starting point for numerous walks and bike tours.

name: Camping / parking space on the winery with a view of the Rhine
description: Welcome to our romantic winery with a view of the Rhine! With us you can stay with a tent, caravan, van or mobile home on a winery. On request, there are fixed pitches with electricity for you. Our meadow pitch is in a beautiful spot on a hill. During an evening walk in the neighborhood you can enjoy the beautiful view of blossoming trees and the setting sun. Discovery tour in the vineyards In our area there are vineyards, corn fields and fruit trees to discover. We are the perfect starting point for beautiful hiking and biking trails between two river banks. The nearby town of Bingen and the city of Mainz also have a lot to offer. Hungry after so much activity? Enjoy the best pizza in the nearby restaurant. We also offer wine tastings and wine tastings. We welcome you all year round!

name: Istas Garden: a familar and cosy campspace
description:
It's a familiar and cosy campspace located in our garden, but filled with amenities. It's quiet, peaceful, but well located. From our garden you can ride a bike or walk to the beach. As a guest, you have access to a shared but complete kitchen (with stove, oven, fridge, microwave, coffee machine, plates, pans, cutlery and a washing machine). For cooler days, you can enjoy the indoor pool with heated and salted water, which is open all year long. There's a barbecue area with a picnic table to enjoy a relaxing meal surrounded by nature. All the pitches have access to electricity and water. In the washing sink the water is drinkable.

The campspace is well located, only on a 2km walk from the seaside. Although in a nature environment, it's only 4km from the city centre (Vila Nova de Gaia). 

This campspace is ideal for those that want to visit the Portwine cellars and the city of Oporto.

name: Ivo's campgarden near Tomorrowland
description:
We're offering our garden to camp in during the Tomorrowland festival.  A shower, toilet and water is available for camping guests.
Our small campsite in Ruisbroek is at walking distance (3km) from the Tomorrowland festival site. Shuttles to the festival are available.

Experience some of the best camping Flanders has to offer!

name: Istria, the smallest mini campsite, adults only
description: Istria holiday in a quiet location, in the greenery and within walking distance of the picturesque village of Kringa with shop and restaurant (Danijeli), the sea 15 minutes by car, we offer 2 camper pitches with electricity, shower, toilet and free WiFi. We also rent a chalet for 2 people, fully furnished with a large covered terrace and private Welltub. Vacation away from mass tourism !

name: Rural campsite in Gironde, in the heart of a vineyard - Discover the secrets of wine production
description: Located in the heart of the Domaine de Brandeau family vineyard and near the prestigious Château la Peyraude near Bordeaux, our rural campsite is the ideal place for an authentic wine-growing stay. Discover the secrets of wine production on a guided tour of our winery, or enjoy outdoor activities such as nature walks and wine tastings. Our ecological campsite offers a nature escape with ease and tranquility, ideal for lovers of ecotourism and countryside holidays. Book now your wine discovery stay in our family vineyard and enjoy an unforgettable experience of camping on the farm.

name: The experience of the Pleine Nature on the edge of a pond
description: I welcome you to my 2ha recreation ground, which I call L'île Ô d'Ange 🍃 Place of healing, bucolic, with its 2 charming ponds with trees to allow a total change of scenery. My welcome will be accompanied by the animals that live there, horses, goats, cats, dogs and mermaids (fish that we will not fish ☺️)

name: Soesteheim RV site with tent site on the river Soeste
description: Soesteheim is located directly on the river Soeste, in 26169 Friesoythe. Canoeing, kayaking on the river or fishing with a day ticket is possible. Also ideal for bike tours in the area. The Thülsfeld dam and animal park Thüle, as well as the Cloppenburg museum village are easily accessible.

name: Natural campsite in the heart of Cottet | Panoramic view over the Ardèche valley | Ecological spirit
description: Welcome to our natural campsite located in the heart of Cottet, ideal for nature lovers. Take advantage of our catering service with a panoramic view of the Ardèche valley and discover our ecological spirit, based on a reduction of our carbon footprint and a sustainable initiative to protect our planet. Pitch your tent with us and live a unique experience in harmony with nature.

name: Hofcamping in Hassfurt in the wine region
description: Welcome to the wine region: We run a small pension on the farm. With us you can use the bathroom in the house. We also offer you an optional breakfast on our farm. Hiking riders are very welcome, a stable is available. Our tent and camper place offers the necessary comfort with electricity, fresh drinking water, warm water and a toilet. There is also a barbecue and campfire facility. Into the nature: With us, everyone really gets their money's worth. Numerous cycling, hiking and horseback riding trails start right in front of the door. Anyone longing for city and culture has beautiful Bamberg just 30 minutes away. There is also a lot to offer in culinary terms. Enjoy the best Franconian wine at the wineries around us. See you soon!

name: Camping in the high mountains in Auvergne: enjoy a holiday surrounded by nature!
description: Le Domaine, a family campsite in Savoie, offers holidays in the heart of nature on a human scale for nature camping holidays in Auvergne. Discover our 24 camping pitches, 9 unusual accommodations and 5 comfortable chalets that can accommodate up to 7 people for family holidays in the high mountains. Enjoy a panoramic view of the upper valley of the villages of Arves, at the foot of the Col de la Croix de Fer, and 300m from a pretty body of water with spring water for a stay focused on hiking. Our southern exposure will allow you to enjoy maximum sunshine and go hiking or practice the activities offered in the resort for an active holiday. Relaxation, active holidays, sports, leisure or idleness, we listen to your desires for a successful holiday in Auvergne

name: Campsite in Auvergne: relaxation and nature by the river
description: Discover a unique experience of camping in the heart of nature in the magnificent region of Auvergne, famous for its volcanoes, its exceptional fauna and flora. Take advantage of vast spaces and the wild beauty of nature for your hikes, bike and mountain bike tours, or to relax in the sun. Our facilities offer you the possibility of swimming in natural environments or in a swimming pool, fishing, canoeing or climbing. We also offer a canoe trip on the Loure, punctuated by a lunch break at the campsite, as well as a via ferrata experience for the more adventurous. Camp in simplicity and tranquillity, and take advantage of local culinary specialties, ski resorts, museums, crafts and hydrotherapy in Auvergne. Opt for a nature campsite in Auvergne for an unforgettable holiday.

name: Quiet camping on a river in beautiful surroundings
description: Escape the crowds and enjoy the tranquility of our secluded camping meadow in the middle of nature. With us you can camp back to basics with your tent, caravan or van and be completely off-grid. With a limited number of guests you can enjoy the silence and the beautiful starry sky. Choose your own spot on our site, in the meadow or along the stream. Enjoy almost wild camping, but with the luxury of an outdoor toilet and fire bowl with firewood. For nature lovers who love comfort and luxury, we also offer a fully equipped Glamping tent. Discover the area with the many cycling and walking routes nearby, and visit the Achelse Kluis. Use our Campspace and experience the ultimate camping experience in Pelt. Book your stay now and enjoy the peace and nature, together with your family and friends! Activities in the area: Dommel afvaart, curling balls, bicycle rental, bicycle package "Happen and stairs in Pelt".

name: Quiet camping on a river in beautiful surroundings
description: Escape the crowds and enjoy the tranquility of our secluded camping meadow in the middle of nature. With us you can camp back to basics with your tent, caravan or van and be completely off-grid. With a limited number of guests you can enjoy the silence and the beautiful starry sky. Choose your own spot on our site, in the meadow or along the stream. Enjoy almost wild camping, but with the luxury of an outdoor toilet and fire bowl with firewood. For nature lovers who love comfort and luxury, we also offer a fully equipped Glamping tent. Discover the area with the many cycling and walking routes nearby, and visit the Achelse Kluis. Use our Campspace and experience the ultimate camping experience in Pelt. Book your stay now and enjoy the peace and nature, together with your family and friends! Activities in the area: Dommel afvaart, curling balls, bicycle rental, bicycle package "Happen and stairs in Pelt".

name: Between Montpellier and the Camargue
description: Come and discover the land of cabins! vast shaded and calm ground in the immediate vicinity of the Etang de l'Or with its pink flamingos and its typical huts located a few kilometers from Mauguio not far from Montpellier

name: Camping Montaioncino
description:
Our camping is located in countryside of Tuscany, near the city of Empoli.
It's a very quite place where you can enjoy the typical landscape of the Chianti region.
We have nine equipped( electricity and water) place separated  from each other with bay leaf. We have 2 bathroom and a laundry room.
There is also a playground near the camping spot and the possibility to do a taste of our wines and oil.

name: Camping near the Baltic Sea in the afforestation
description: Welcome to the dog paradise near Wismar and the island of Poel You are standing in a former manor garden reforested with climate-stable tree species - one or the other old fruit tree is still there and can be harvested. The area is completely fenced. It is therefore ideal for dog owners who can let their dog run free on 12,000 m2 (!). Please keep the fence gate always (!) closed, otherwise the deer will slip in and bite the newly planted trees. So drive in, close the gate and enjoy the solitude. The manor was demolished in the 1980s, so you can still find one or the other relic. The forest should reclaim this area - have fun with your enchanted pitch! What there is to discover in the vicinity Whether long hiking or cycling tours with family or four-legged friends, everyone really gets their money's worth here. Explore the forest or take a walk on the beach on the Baltic Sea coast and enjoy the salty sea air and the sand between your toes. Wismar and the island of Poel are also nice destinations for a trip.

name: Camping Amsterdam aan Zee, Small-scale camping
description: This campspace is a simple and fun mini campsite (on the coast) where you can enjoy peace, space, dunes, beach and the many walking and cycling possibilities. The campsite is located in an agricultural environment and has 8 camping pitches for caravans / campers / bungalow tents and some camping pitches for recreationists / passers-by with a small tent. The campsite is open from March 15 to October 15. - Good sanitary facilities (free shower) - Canteen with washing machine. - Free WIFI - Empty / flush chemical toilet. Please note: there are no playground equipment and the like available! Heemskerk is centrally located between Amsterdam / Alkmaar / Haarlem.
